item.name: +1 万能工具
entries: 这件简单的螺丝刀可以转换为许多种工具:以一个动作，你可以触摸这件物品，而后它会转换为一件由你选择的工匠工具(见{@book 《玩家手册》|PHB}的"装备"章节以查看{@item 工匠工具|PHB}的表格)。无论这件工具采取什么样的外貌，你对它都拥有熟练。
在持握这件工具时，你的奇械师法术攻击加值与法术豁免DC获得加值。加值的大小由该物件的珍稀度决定。
以一个动作，你可以凝神于这件工具以引导你的创造力。选择一项你不知道的来自任何职业的戏法。在8小时内，你可以施展那道戏法如同那是一个奇械师戏法。一旦这项特性被使用，那么在下个黎明到来之前它无法再次被使用。

item.name: +1 虔信护符
entries: 这件护符载有一位神祇的圣徽，由珍稀石料或金属雕刻。当持握这枚护符时，你在你法术的法术攻击骰和法术豁免DC上获得加值，加值取决于护符的稀有度。
当你穿戴这枚护符时，你可以使用一次你的引导神力而不消耗使用次数。此属性使用后，直到下次黎明前，不能再次使用。

item.name: +1 奥法秘书
entries: 当你持握着这件皮革封皮的书籍时，你可以将它作为你法师法术的法器，且你在你的法师法术攻击加值与法术豁免DC上获得加值。加值的大小由该书的珍稀度决定。
你可以将此书当做一本法术书。另外，当你在使用你的奥术回想特性时，你能够多恢复一环法术位。

item.name: +1 血源瓶
entries: 为了与这个小瓶同调，你需要将你的一些鲜血滴入其中。直到你与它的同调终止之前，小瓶无法再次被开启。若你与小瓶的同调结束，瓶中之血将化为灰烬。你可以在持握或穿着这个小瓶时将它作为一件法器，同时你的术士法术攻击加值与法术豁免DC获得加值。加值由小瓶的珍稀度决定。
另外，当你使用任意数量的生命骰以恢复生命值时，你可以恢复5点术法点。该特性到下个黎明前无法再次被使用。

item.name: +1 月镰
entries: 这把银刃镰刀闪烁着柔和的月光。当持握这把魔法武器时，你用其发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰，与你德鲁伊或游侠法术的法术攻击检定与法术豁免DC上具有加值。加值取决于武器的稀有度。此外，你可以用镰刀作为你施展德鲁伊或游侠法术的法器。
当你持握这把镰刀，施展一道恢复生命值的法术时，你可以骰一枚{@dice d4}并将所得结果加入回复的生命值中。

item.name: +1 调律者之鼓
entries: 当持握这张{@item drum|PHB}时，你在你诗人法术的法术攻击骰和法术豁免DC上获得加值。加值取决于鼓的稀有度。
作为一个动作，你可以演奏这张{@item drum|PHB}以恢复一次你诗人激励特性的使用次数。{@item drum|PHB}的此项属性，直到下次黎明前，不能再次使用。

item.name: +1 掌契者权杖
entries: 当持握这把权杖时，你契术师法术的法术攻击检定和法术豁免DC获得+1加值。
此外，当持握这把权杖时，你能够以一个动作回复一个契术师法术位。直到你完成一次长休前都不能再使用这个特性。

item.name: +1 战法师魔杖
entries: 当你持握这把魔杖时，你在法术攻击检定中获得+1加值。此外，你在进行法术攻击时忽视半掩护。

item.name: Abracadabrus
entries: An abracadabrus is an ornate, gemstone-studded wooden chest that weighs 25 pounds while empty. Its interior compartment is a cube measuring 1½ feet on a side.

The chest has 20 charges. A creature can use an action to touch the closed lid of the chest and expend 1 of the chest's charges while naming one or more nonmagical objects (including raw materials, foodstuffs, and liquids) worth a total of 1 gp or less. The named objects magically appear in the chest, provided they can all fit inside it and the chest doesn't contain anything else. For example, the chest can conjure a plate of strawberries, a bowl of hot soup, a flagon of water, a stuffed animal, or a bag of twenty caltrops. Food and drink conjured by the chest are delicious, and they spoil if not consumed after 24 hours. Gems and precious metals created by the chest disappear after 1 minute.

The chest regains {@dice 1d20} expended charges daily at dawn. If the item's last charge is expended, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the chest loses its magic (becoming an ordinary chest), and its gemstones turn to dust.

item.name: Absorbing Tattoo
entries: This tattoo incorporates designs that emphasize one color more than others. While the tattoo is on your skin, you have resistance to a type of damage associated with that color, as shown on the table below. The DM chooses the color or determines it randomly.

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: When you take damage of the chosen type, you can use your reaction to gain immunity against that instance of the damage, and you regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage you would have taken. Once this reaction is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: 强酸(小瓶装)
entries: 以一个动作，你可以将小瓶中的内容物泼在一名距离你5尺内的生物、或将小瓶丢到最远20尺，让其在冲击中碎裂。无论是哪一种情况，对目标生物或对象进行一次远程攻击，将强酸瓶视作临时武器。若命中，目标受到{@dice 2d6}强酸伤害。

item.name: 强酸吸收刺青
entries: {#itemEntry 吸收刺青|TCE}

item.name: Adjustable Stilts
entries: The stilts take 1 minute to put on or remove. They increase the height of any humanoid wearing them by 2 to 5 feet. Each stilt weighs 8 pounds and is 1 foot long when fully collapsed.

item.name: Akmon, Hammer of Purphoros
entries: Purphoros's hammer works wonders and disasters, the god of the forge using it to craft ground-breaking marvels and dangerous inventions in equal measure. Purphoros rarely bestows Akmon on mortals but occasionally leaves it unattended at his forge in Mount Velus. When Purphoros does permit a mortal to use the hammer, it's usually so they might bring an important work into being, wreck a force of destruction, or forge something remarkable somewhere the god isn't welcome.

entries.name: Hammer of the Forge
entries: This magic warhammer grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using it, the target takes an extra {@damage 3d10} fire damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Forge
entries: If you are a worshiper of Purphoros, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The hammer has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The hammer has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The hammer has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Purphoros, the hammer has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Reforged
entries: While holding the hammer, you have resistance to fire damage and are immune to {@condition 力竭}. Additionally, you have proficiency with smith's tools and have advantage on all ability checks made using them.

entries.name: Spells
entries: While the hammer is on your person, you can use an action to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18): {@spell 活化物体}, {@spell 灼热金属}, {@spell 鬼斧神工}, {@spell 魔化武器}, {@spell 修复术}, {@spell 粉碎音波}. Once you use the hammer to cast a spell, the spell can't be cast again from it until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Hammer
entries: To destroy the hammer, it must be taken to the realm of Tizerus, in the Underworld. There it must be coated in clay from the Mire of Punishment. The heat of the hammer hardens the clay, which fuses to it after one month. Once fully hardened, the clay-covered hammer must be swallowed and digested by a kraken.

item.name: 炼金总纲
entries: 这本褪色、厚重的订本上附着有辛辣的刺鼻气息。这本书的金属拟合件由能够在铜、铁、铅、银与金子这些金属间转换的的凝固中间物质组成。这本书在被找到时，包含了以下法术： {@spell 变巨/缩小术}, {@spell 羽落术}, {@spell 石化术}, {@spell 气化形体}, {@spell 魔化武器} 和 {@spell 变形术}。你可以将其作为法术书。
当你持握这本书时，你可以将其作为你法师法术的法器。
书具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花费1分钟时间研究这本书，你可以消耗1发充能来将你的一道已准备法术替换为书中的另一道法术。新法术必须是变化学派的法术。
作为一个动作，你可以触摸一件未被着装或携带的非魔法物件，并消耗一定数量的充能将其转换为另一个物件。以1发充能变化时，该物件的边长不能超过1尺。你可以使用更多的充能来使其上限尺寸增加每充能2尺。新物件的价值必须比原物件低或者相等。

item.name: 炽火胶(扁瓶装)
entries: 这瓶黏稠的流体将在暴露于空气时起火燃烧。以一个动作，你可以投掷这个扁瓶最远20尺，让它在冲击中破碎。对一个生物或物体进行一次远程攻击，将炽火胶视作临时武器。若命中，目标在每次它的回合开始时受到{@dice 1d4}火焰伤害。若要结束这个伤害效果，一个生物可以借由使用它的动作进行一次DC 10的敏捷检定以扑灭火焰。

item.name: 炼金工具
additionalEntries: 炼金工具可以用来制作有用的化合物，如强酸或炽火胶。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 炼金工具包括两只玻璃烧杯、一个铁架台、一根玻璃搅拌棒、一个小研钵和药杵，以及一袋常用炼金术材料，包括盐、铁粉、纯净水。

additionalEntries.name: 奥秘
entries: 炼金工具熟练项可以让你在进行鉴定药水或类似物质的{@skill 奥秘}检定中获得更多信息。

additionalEntries.name: 调查
entries: 当你调查一个区域的线索时，如果该区域曾使用过任何化合物或其他物质，炼金工具熟练项将使你对此具有额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 道具制作
entries: 你可以使用这套工具熟练制作炼金道具。角色可以花钱收集原材料，每磅材料花费50金币。DM可以允许角色使用指定技能进行检定时具有优势。

additionalEntries.caption: 炼金工具
rows: 制造一股浓烟
鉴定一瓶药水
鉴定一种物质
点火
中和强酸

item.name: 炼金壶
entries: 这个陶制壶表面上可以容纳1加仑的液体，且无论壶中是空的还是满的，其重量皆为12磅。摇晃壶在被摇晃的时候会发出液体晃动的声音，即使它是中空的也一样。
你可以使用一个动作并从下表中指名一种液体，以让这个壶产出所选的液体。在这之后，你能够以一个动作拔开这个壶的盖子，并将该液体以最多每分钟2加仑的速度倾倒而出。这个壶所产出液体的最大体积取决于你所选择的液体。
一旦这个壶开始产出一种液体，则直到下次日出前，它将无法产生其他种类的液体，且在达到其最大产量之后也无法再产生更多液体。

item.name: Alchemy Jug (Blue)
entries: This ceramic jug appears to be able to hold a gallon of liquid and weighs 12 pounds whether full or empty. Sloshing sounds can be heard from within the jug when it is shaken, even if the jug is empty.

You can use an action and name one liquid from the table below to cause the jug to produce the chosen liquid. Afterward, you can uncork the jug as an action and pour that liquid out, up to 2 gallons per minute. The maximum amount of liquid the jug can produce depends on the liquid you named.
Once the jug starts producing a liquid, it can't produce a different one, or more of one that has reached its maximum, until the next dawn.

item.name: 亚历山大变石
entries: 深绿色的透光宝石。

item.name: 琥珀
entries: 水金色到贵金色的透光宝石。

item.name: 紫晶
entries: 深紫色的透光宝石。

item.name: 强健护符
entries: 当穿戴此护符时，你的体质值变为19。若你在未穿戴它时的体质值就已经为19或更高，则这个护符对你将不会有任何效果。

item.name: 反侦测定位护符
entries: 当穿戴此护符时，你将隐藏于{@filter 预言系|spells|school=D}魔法。你不会被作为这类魔法的目标，或因魔法探知传感器而被给感知到。
item.ENG_name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location

item.name: Amulet of Protection from Turning
entries: While you wear this amulet of silver and turquoise, you have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

If you fail a saving throw against such an effect, you can choose to succeed instead. You can do so three times, and expended uses recharge daily at dawn. Each time an effect that turns undead is used against you, the amulet glows with silvery blue light for a few seconds.

item.name: Amulet of the Black Skull
entries: This amulet is carved from obsidian and shaped like a screaming humanoid skull, with ruby eyes and emeralds for teeth. It hangs from an iron chain necklace.

The amulet has 6 charges and regains {@dice 1d6} charges daily at dawn. While wearing the amulet, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to transport yourself and anything you are wearing or carrying to a location within 100 feet of you. The destination you choose doesn't need to be in your line of sight, but it must be familiar to you (in other words, a place you have seen or visited), and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. This effect isn't subject to the magic restrictions placed on the Tomb of the Nine Gods; thus, the amulet can be used to enter and exit the tomb.

If you aren't undead, you must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw each time you use the amulet to teleport. On a failed saving throw, the black skull cackles as you are transformed in transit. The transformation takes effect as soon as you arrive at the destination, and is determined randomly by rolling percentile dice and consulting the Black Skull Transformation table.

entries.caption: Black Skull Transformation
rows: The symbol of {@creature Acererak|ToA} is burned into your flesh, a curse that can only be removed with a {@spell 移除诅咒} spell or similar magic. Until the curse ends, your hit points can't be restored by magic.
You grow larger as if affected by an {@spell 变巨/缩小术} spell, except the effect lasts for 1 hour.
You grow smaller as if affected by an {@spell 变巨/缩小术} spell, except the effect lasts for 1 hour.
You arrive at the destination wearing nothing but the amulet of the black skull. Everything else that you were wearing or carrying appears in a random unoccupied space within 100 feet of you.
You are {@condition 麻痹} for 1 minute or until this effect is ended with a {@spell 次级复原术} spell or similar magic.
You become {@condition 石化}. This effect can be ended only with a {@spell 高等复原术} spell or similar magic.

item.name: Amulet of the Drunkard
entries: This amulet smells of old, ale-stained wood. While wearing it, you can regain {@dice 4d4 + 4} hit points when you drink a pint of beer, ale, mead, or wine. Once the amulet has restored hit points, it can't do so again until the next dawn.

item.name: 位面护符
entries: 当穿戴此护符时，你可以使用一个动作并指名一个你所熟悉，且位于另一个存在位面的地点。接着，进行一次DC 15的智力检定。若检定成功，则你将施放出{@spell 异界传送}法术。若检定失败，你和距离你15尺内的每个生物和物体将传送到一个随机的目的地。骰一颗{@dice d100}。若结果为1-60，你们将传送到一个位于你所指名位面的随机地点。若结果为61-100，你们将随机传送到一个存在位面。

item.name: 活化盾
entries: 当持握此盾牌时，你能够以一个附赠动作说出它的命令语以使它活化。这个盾牌将跳到空中并漂浮于你所在的空间，如同你正持握它一样保护你，使你得以空出双手。这个盾牌将维持活化长达1分钟，直到你使用一个附赠动作以结束这个效果、或直到你陷入{@condition 无力}或死亡。在这时，盾牌将会掉落在地上，或若你有一只手空着，则它将落入你的手中。

item.name: 解毒剂 (瓶)
entries: 饮用这瓶液体的生物在1小时内获得对毒素的豁免检定优势。它对于不死生物和构装体没有效果。

item.name: 夸力许设备
entries: 这个物体第一眼看上去是一个重500磅的大型密封铁桶。借由成功通过一次DC 20的智力（{@skill 调查}）检定，可以发现这个铁桶附有一个隐藏的把手。扳动该把手将会打开位于这个铁桶其中一端的舱门，让二个体型为中型或更小的生物得以爬入。十个排成一列的控制杆被设置在船舱尽头，各自设置在中心位置，且可以被向上或向下扳动。当特定控制杆被使用时，这个设备将会变形并呈现一只巨大龙虾的外型。
夸力许设备是一个大型物体，且具有下列数据：

items.name: 速度：
items.entry: 30尺, 游泳30尺 (或若设备的足肢和尾巴未被展开，则两者皆为0尺)

items.name: 伤害免疫：
items.entry: 毒素、心灵

entries: 若要被作为载具使用，这个设备需要一名驾驶。当这个设备的舱门被关闭，其舱室将是气密和水密的。舱室内的空气可以提供总共10小时的呼吸，除以其内部正在呼吸生物的数量。
这个设备浮于水面。它也可以潜入900尺深的水中。再往下潜会使这个载具受到每分钟来自水压的{@dice 2d6}钝击伤害。
一个在舱室内的生物可以使用一个动作将最多二个设备内的控制杆向上或向下扳动。在每次使用后，控制杆都将回到中心位置。每个控制杆的功能，由左到右，如夸力许设备控制杆表中所示。

entries.caption: 夸力许设备控制杆：
rows: 足肢和尾巴伸展而出，让设备得以步行和游泳。
足肢和尾巴被收起，将设备的移动速度归零，并使它无法得益于速度加值。
前窗遮板被打开。
前窗遮板被关闭。
侧弦窗遮板被打开（每侧二扇）。
侧弦窗遮板被关闭（每侧二扇）。
二只钳爪从设备的前方二侧伸展而出。
钳爪被收起。
伸出的钳爪各自进行一次下述的近战武器攻击：命中{@hit 8}，触及5尺，单一目标。{@h} 7 ({@dice 2d6})钝击伤害。
伸出的钳爪各自进行一次下述的近战武器攻击：命中{@hit 8}，触及5尺，单一目标。{@h} 目标{@condition 被擒}(逃脱{@dc 15})。
设备向前步行或游泳。
设备向后步行或游泳。
设备向左转90度。
设备向右转90度。
眼状设备将散发出30尺半径的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。
这个光照将被关上。
设备将在液体中下沉最多20尺距离。
设备将在液体中浮起最多20尺距离。
后方舱门将解封并打开。
后方舱门将关闭并密封。

item.name: 海蓝宝石
entries: 淡青绿色的透光宝石。

item.name: Arcanaloth's Music Box
entries: This music box is made of dark wood with gold filigree. Each of its five sides is sculpted with the image of a horned woman playing a different musical instrument: a dulcimer, a flute, a harp, a lyre, and a viol. While touching the box, you can use an action to make it play music featuring one of the instruments shown, which can be heard up to 60 feet away. You can also use an action to stop the music.

item.name: Arcane Cannon
entries: This Large cannon is imbued with magic. It requires no ammunition and doesn't need to be loaded. It takes one action to aim the cannon and one action to fire it. After the cannon has fired, it must recharge for 5 minutes before it can be fired again.
The creature firing the cannon chooses the effect from the following options:

entries.name: Acid Jet
entries: The cannon discharges acid in a line 300 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a creature that fails its saving throw takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns; a creature can end this damage by using its action to wash off the acid with a pint or more of water.

entries.name: Fire Jet
entries: The cannon discharges fire in a line 300 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entries.name: Frost Shot
entries: The cannon shoots a ball of frost to a point you can see within 1,200 feet of the cannon. The ball then expands to form a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced. A creature whose speed is reduced by this effect can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Lightning Shot
entries: The cannon shoots a ball of lightning to a point you can see within 1,200 feet of the cannon. The lightning then expands to form a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures wearing metal armor have disadvantage on the save.

entries.name: Poison Spray
entries: The cannon expels poison gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) poison damage and is {@condition 中毒} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition 中毒}. A creature {@condition 中毒} in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Arcane Propulsion Arm
item.reqAttune: by a creature missing a hand or an arm
entries: This prosthetic appendage was developed by artificers of House Cannith. To attune to this item, you must attach it to your arm at the wrist, elbow, or shoulder, at which point the prosthetic magically forms a copy of the appendage it's replacing.
While attached, the prosthetic provides these benefits:

items: The prosthetic is a fully capable part of your body.
You can take an action to remove the prosthetic, and it removes itself if your attunement to it ends. It can't be removed against your will.

The prosthetic is a magic melee weapon with which you're proficient. It deals {@dice 1d8} force damage on a hit and has the thrown property, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When thrown, the prosthetic detaches and flies at the target of the attack, then immediately returns to you and reattaches.

item.name: 坚不可摧护甲
entries: 你在穿着此护甲时具有对非魔法伤害的抗性。此外，你可以使用一个动作以让你自己免疫于非魔法伤害长达10分钟，或直到你不再穿着此护甲。一旦这个特殊动作被使用，则它直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 易伤护甲（钝击）
entries: 当穿着此护甲时，你具有对钝击伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 诅咒
entries: 这件护甲受到诅咒，这个事实只会在{@spell 鉴定术}法术被施放于这个护甲、或你同调于它时被揭露。与这个护甲同调会使你受到诅咒，并持续直到你被作为{@spell 移除诅咒}法术或其他类似魔法的目标；移除这件护甲并不能终止这个诅咒。当被诅咒时，你具有对穿刺和挥砍伤害的易伤。

item.name: 易伤护甲（穿刺）
entries: 当穿着此护甲时，你具有对穿刺伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 诅咒
entries: 这件护甲受到诅咒，这个事实只会在{@spell 鉴定术}法术被施放于这个护甲、或你同调于它时被揭露。与这个护甲同调会使你受到诅咒，并持续直到你被作为{@spell 移除诅咒}法术或其他类似魔法的目标；移除这件护甲并不能终止这个诅咒。当被诅咒时，你具有对钝击和挥砍伤害的易伤。

item.name: 易伤护甲（挥砍）
entries: 当穿着此护甲时，你具有对挥砍伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 诅咒
entries: 这件护甲受到诅咒，这个事实只会在{@spell 鉴定术}法术被施放于这个护甲、或你同调于它时被揭露。与这个护甲同调会使你受到诅咒，并持续直到你被作为{@spell 移除诅咒}法术或其他类似魔法的目标；移除这件护甲并不能终止这个诅咒。当被诅咒时，你具有对钝击和穿刺伤害的易伤。

item.name: 捕箭盾
entries: 当持握这面盾牌时，你的AC在对抗远程攻击时获得+2加值。这个加值会额外加入这面盾牌原本对AC的加值中。此外，每当一个攻击者对距离你5尺内的目标进行一次远程攻击，你可以使用你的反应以代替成为该攻击的目标。

item.name: 刺客之血
entries: 受害于这种毒药的生物必须进行一次DC 10的体质豁免。若豁免失败，它将受到6 ({@dice 1d12})毒素伤害且陷入{@condition 中毒}状态长达24小时。若豁免成功，该生物将只受到一半的伤害，且不会陷入{@condition 中毒}状态。

item.name: 星界碎晶
entries: 这块水晶是一块来自星界位面的坚硬碎晶，银色的迷雾在其表面上流转。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为施展术士法术的法器使用。
当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，可以在施展法术后立即传送到至多30尺内一个你能看见且未被占据的位置。

item.name: 星卜编集
entries: 这个以铜圆盘为铰接件的同心环能够展开为一只浑天仪。以一个附赠动作，你可以将其展开为浑天仪或使其收回成一个圆盘。这本书在被找到时，包含了以下法术，且在你与其同调后对你视为法师法术： {@spell 卜筮}, {@spell 预言术}, {@spell 寻找捷径}, {@spell 预视术}, {@spell 生物定位术} 和 {@spell 物品定位术}。你可以将其作为法术书，法术被编刻在其圆环上。
当你持握编集时，你可以将其作为你法师法术的法器。
编集具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花费1分钟时间研究此编集，你可以消耗1发充能来将你的一道已准备法术替换为编集中的另一道法术。新法术必须是预言学派的法术。
当一个30内你可见的生物进行一次攻击检定、属性检定或豁免检定时，你可以使用你的反应并消耗1发充能使那个生物骰一个d4并将其数值作为原掷骰的加值或减值（由你选择）。你可以在看见掷骰结束，但在宣布结果之前使用该反应。

item.name: 寰宇图纂
entries: 这本厚重的书被包在暗色的皮革中，皮革上纹有描绘了一张地图或海图的交错银线。这本书在被找到时，包含了以下法术，且在你与其同调后对你视为法师法术： {@spell 秘法之门}, {@spell 次元门}, {@spell 异界之门}, {@spell 迷踪步}, {@spell 异界传送}, {@spell 传送法阵} 和 {@spell 回返真言}。你可以将其作为法术书。
当你持握这本书时，你可以将其作为你法师法术的法器。
该书具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花费1分钟时间研究这本书，你可以消耗1发充能来将你的一道已准备法术替换为书中的另一道法术。新法术必须是咒法学派的法术。
当你被一次攻击命中时，你可以使用你的反应并消耗1发充能，传送到10尺内一个你能看见且未被占据的位置。若你的新位置在攻击的攻击距离以外，那么此次攻击失手。

item.name: Axe Beak
entries: An {@creature axe beak}'s splayed toes allow it to run across snow, and it can carry as much weight as a mule. A domesticated axe beak can be purchased in Ten-Towns for 50 gp.

item.name: Axe of the Dwarvish Lords
entries: Seeing the peril his people faced, a young dwarf prince came to believe that his people needed something to unite them. Thus, he set out to forge a weapon that would be such a symbol.

Venturing deep under the mountains, deeper than any dwarf had ever delved, the young prince came to the blazing heart of a great volcano. With the aid of Moradin, the dwarven god of creation, he first crafted four great tools: the {@italic Brutal Pick}, the {@italic Earthheart Forge}, the {@italic Anvil of Songs}, and the {@italic Shaping Hammer}. With them, he forged the {@italic Axe of the Dwarvish Lords}.

Armed with the artifact, the prince returned to the dwarf clans and brought peace. His axe ended grudges and answered slights. The clans became allies, and they threw back their enemies and enjoyed an era of prosperity. This young dwarf is remembered as the First King. When he became old, he passed the weapon, which had become his badge of office, to his heir. The rightful inheritors passed the axe on for many generations.

Later, in a dark era marked by treachery and wickedness, the axe was lost in a bloody civil war fomented by greed for its power and the status it bestowed. Centuries later, the dwarves still search for the axe, and many adventurers have made careers of chasing after rumors and plundering old vaults to find it.

entries.name: Magic Weapon
entries: The {@italic Axe of the Dwarvish Lords} is a magic weapon that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. The axe also functions as a {@item belt of dwarvenkind}, a {@item dwarven thrower}, and a {@item sword of sharpness}.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The axe has the following randomly determined properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}

entries.name: Blessings of Moradin
entries: If you are a dwarf attuned to the axe, you gain the following benefits:

items: You have immunity to poison damage.
The range of your {@sense 黑暗视觉} increases by 60 feet.
You gain proficiency with artisan's tools related to blacksmithing, brewing, and stonemasonry.

entries.name: Conjure Earth Elemental
entries: If you are holding the axe, you can use your action to cast the {@spell 召唤元素生物} spell from it, summoning an {@creature earth elemental}. You can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Travel the Depths
entries: You can use an action to touch the axe to a fixed piece of dwarven stonework and cast the {@spell 传送术} spell from the axe. If your intended destination is underground, there is no chance of a mishap or arriving somewhere unexpected. You can't use this property again until 3 days have passed.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The axe bears a curse that affects any non-dwarf that becomes attuned to it. Even if the attunement ends, the curse remains. With each passing day, the creature's physical appearance and stature become more dwarflike. After seven days, the creature looks like a typical dwarf, but the creature neither loses its racial traits nor gains the racial traits of a dwarf. The physical changes wrought by the axe aren't considered magical in nature (and therefore can't be dispelled), but they can be undone by any effect that removes a curse, such as a {@spell 高等复原术} or {@spell 移除诅咒} spell.

entries.name: Destroying the Axe
entries: The only way to destroy the axe is to melt it down in the {@italic Earthheart Forge}, where it was created. It must remain in the burning forge for fifty years before it finally succumbs to the fire and is consumed.

item.name: Azorius Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Azorius, allows you to cast {@spell 诱捕打击}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Azorius's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Azorius Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Azorius guild
entries: This keyrune is carved from white marble and lapis lazuli to resemble a noble bird of prey. It can become a {@creature giant eagle} for up to 1 hour. While the transformed eagle is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. As an action, you can see through the eagle's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, and you gain the benefit of its keen sight. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature giant eagle}. If there isn't enough space for the eagle, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the eagle takes the {@action 闪避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Azuredge
entries: Forged by the archwizard Ahghairon, this intelligent battleaxe was crafted to defend Waterdeep. Its current wielder is a former member of Force Grey named {@creature Meloon Wardragon|WDH}, but the weapon is searching for a new owner.

Azuredge has a solid steel handle etched with tiny runes, wrapped in blue dragon hide with a star sapphire set into the pommel. The axe head is forged from silver, electrum, and steel alloys whose edges constantly shimmer with a deep blue luminescence.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. The {@spell 护盾术} spell provides no defense against the axe, which passes through that spell's barrier of magical force.
When you hit a fiend or an undead with the axe, cold blue flames erupt from its blade and deal an extra 2d6 radiant damage to the target.

entries.name: Hurling
entries: The battleaxe has 3 charges. You can expend 1 charge and make a ranged attack with the axe, hurling it as if it had the thrown property with a normal range of 60 feet and a long range of 180 feet. Whether it hits or misses, the axe flies back to you at the end of the current turn, landing in your open hand or at your feet in your space (as you choose). The axe regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Illumination
entries: While holding the axe, you can use an action to cause the axe to glow blue or to quench the glow. This glow sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Azuredge is a sentient lawful neutral weapon with an Intelligence of 12, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 15. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common. It has a calm, delicate voice. The weapon can sense the presence of non-lawful creatures within 120 feet of it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Azuredge is sworn to protect Waterdeep, and it desires to be wielded by a law-abiding person willing to dedicate everything to the city's defense. The weapon is patient and takes its time finding its ideal wielder.

If someone tries to use Azuredge against its will, the axe can become ten times heavier than normal, and can magically adhere to any Medium or larger object or surface it comes into contact with. Once it does so, the axe can't be wielded. Nothing short of a {@spell 祈愿术} spell can separate the axe from the item or surface to which it is adhered without destroying one or the other, though the axe can choose to end the effect at any time.

item.name: 蓝铜矿
entries: 带有深蓝色斑驳纹理的不透光宝石。

item.name: 芭芭·雅嘎的臼与杵
entries: 不朽鬼婆芭芭·雅嘎的造物违逆了凡间魔法的法则。在她所有臭名昭著的劳什子里，让她在无尽的诸界中巩固传奇恶名的神器乃是能够助她穿越位面的：芭芭·雅嘎的臼与杵。这两件芭芭·雅嘎特色鲜明的工具各是一件需要同调的单一神器。若两物件分开，那么杵会在下一个黎明出现在臼旁边。

entries.name: 随机属性
entries: 这件神器具有以下随机属性，你可以通过对着{@book 《城主指南》|DMG}中的"神器"章节掷骰以决定它们:

items: 两项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效增益属性|dmg|弱效增益} 属性
一项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效减益属性|dmg|弱效减益} 属性
一项 {@table 神器属性; 强效减益属性|dmg|强效减益} 属性

entries.name: 臼的属性
entries: 臼是一个微型的小木碗。然而，臼的大小会随着你放进去的任何需要它容纳的东西而扩展、增大至其上限大型——如果它周围的空间足够的话。这意味着它甚至装得下一个大型生物。

entries.name: 杵的属性
entries: 杵是一根六尺长的破木棍。每回合一次，当你持握着杵时，你可以使其伸长至一根长棍或使其缩回一根杵（无需动作）。作为长棍时，杵是一个在攻击掷骰与伤害掷骰上有+3加值的魔法武器。
杵有12发充能。当你使用杵并以一次近战攻击命中时，你可以消耗至多3发充能以额外造成每发充能 {@damage 1d8} 力场伤害。杵在每天黎明时恢复所有已消耗的充能。

entries.name: 完美工具
entries: 当你同时持握着杵与臼时，你可以用动作来说出任何一种非魔法的植物、矿物或液体的名字，这些材料的价格需为10gp或更低。臼立刻会充满指定价格数的那种材料。使用后，直到完成一次长休前，你无法再次使用这个动作。
你还可以将这件神器作为 {@item 炼金工具|PHB}, {@item 酿酒工具|PHB}, {@item 厨师工具|PHB}, {@item 草药工具|PHB}和 {@item 制毒工具|PHB}.你在将这件神器作为以上几种工具使用时所进行的任何检定上具有优势。

entries.name: 原初分解
entries: 当杵和臼都在你的5尺之内时，作为一个动作，你可以命令杵开始捣碎作业。杵会自行行动，将臼中容纳的物品捣成均能够同等用于烹调或炼金的浆糊或精细粉末，持续1分钟或你用一个动作来口头命令它停止。在你的回合开始时，任何处于臼内的东西会受到{@damage 4d10}力场伤害。若目标生命值因此降至0，则其会被捣成适宜的粉末、肉浆或者浆糊。只有魔法物品不受影响。若你愿意，你可以在杵停止工作时让臼把它的内容物分开成不同堆，比如骨粉和骨粉放在一起，药末与药末堆在一起，尚在搏动的机体器官堆在一起。

entries.name: 黑夜穿梭
entries: 若你在臼内持握着杵，你可以用动作发出口头命令，让臼穿穿梭到一处特定的地点或一个特定的生物处。
你不需要知道你的目标在什么位置，但你的目标必须是一个特定的位置——不可以仅仅是"最近的河流"或"一条红龙的巢穴"。若被选定的目标在你的1000里内，臼就会飞向空中而后消失。你与任何处于臼内的生物会穿过一道梦境般的天穹，朦胧的世界映像在你的下方闪过。其他生物可能看见你在夜空中穿梭于你的原点与目标位置之间的影像。你会在1小时后，或在夜间1分钟后到达目的地。

entries.name: 死马识途
entries: 当你在命令臼穿行之时，你可以转而掷出一把附着在臼底的粉末或肉浆，然后说出一个其他存在位面的位置或物质位面的一个其他世界。若那材料来自于那个位面或世界的一个生物，那么臼上的旅行者会穿过一道纯净的夜空，而后在一分钟内出现在目标位置的一处未被占据的位置。

entries.name: 摧毁臼和杵
entries: 若杵和臼被 {@i Dancing Hut of Baba Yaga} 或本鬼婆踩在底下并被挤压，它们会被摧毁。

item.name: 芭芭·雅嘎的杵
entries: 杵是一根六尺长的破木棍。每回合一次，当你持握着杵时，你可以使其伸长至一根长棍或使其缩回一根杵（无需动作）。作为长棍时，杵是一个在攻击掷骰与伤害掷骰上有+3加值的魔法武器。
杵有12发充能。当你使用杵并以一次近战攻击命中时，你可以消耗至多3发充能以额外造成每发充能{@damage 1d8}力场伤害。杵在每天黎明时恢复所有已消耗的充能。

item.name: 背包
entries: 一个背包可以容纳1立方尺或30磅重的装备。你也可以将像是睡袋或一卷绳子等道具绑在背包外侧。

item.name: Backpack Parachute
entries: A humanoid wearing this piece of gear can deploy the parachute as a reaction while falling, or as an action otherwise. The parachute requires at least a 10-foot cube of unoccupied space in which to deploy, and it doesn't open fast enough to slow a fall of less than 60 feet. If it has sufficient time and space to deploy properly, the parachute allows its wearer to land without taking falling damage. Once it has been used, the parachute takes 10 minutes to repack.

item.name: Badge of the Watch
entries: A badge of the Watch is given only to those who have earned the trust of the Open Lord of Waterdeep. The badge, signifying the rank of captain in Waterdeep's City Watch, bears the emblem of Waterdeep and is meant to be worn or carried.
While wearing the badge, you gain a +2 bonus to AC if you aren't using a {@item shield|phb}.

If the badge is more than 5 feet away from you for more than 1 minute, it vanishes and harmlessly reappears on a surface within 5 feet of the Open Lord. While holding the badge, the Open Lord knows your location, provided the two of you are on the same plane of existence and your attunement to the badge hasn't ended.
As an action, the Open Lord can touch the badge and end your attunement to it.

item.name: 魔豆之袋
entries: 这个沉重布袋内装着{@dice 3d4}颗干燥的豆子。这个袋子重1/2磅，再加上每颗豆子1/4磅的重量。
若你将这个袋子内的东西倒在地面，这些豆子将引发一场10尺半径的爆炸。每个范围内的生物（包括你在内）都必须进行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，豁免失败将受到{@dice 5d4}火焰伤害，豁免成功则只受到一半的伤害。这个火焰将会点燃范围内未被穿戴或携带的可燃物体。
若你从袋中拿出一颗豆子，并将它种在土壤或砂石中，并对它浇水，它将在1分钟之后从它被种植的地面处产生一个效果。DM可以从下表中选择一种效果、随机决定、或是创造一个新的效果。

rows: {@dice 5d4}株伞蕈破土而出。若一个生物吃下一株伞蕈，骰一颗任意骰。若结果为奇数，则食用者必须成功通过一次DC 15的体质豁免，否则受到{@dice 5d6}毒素伤害，且陷入{@condition 中毒}长达1小时。若结果为偶数，则食用者将获得{@dice 5d6}临时生命值长达1小时。
一道喷泉从地面喷涌而出到30尺的高空，持续{@dice 1d12}轮。这道喷泉的液体可以是水、啤酒、莓果汁、茶、醋、或油（由DM决定）。
一个{@creature 树人}破土而出。这个树人有{@chance 50}的几率会是混乱邪恶，并会发起攻击。
一尊外型与你相像，被活化但无法移动的石制雕像从地面升起。它将对你进行言语上的威胁。若你离开它且其他人接近到它身边，它将会把你描述成一名最卑劣的恶棍，并引导他们寻找并攻击你。若你和这尊雕像处于相同的存在位面，它将会知晓你所在的位置。这尊雕像将在24小时后变成无生命的石像。
一团蓝色火焰的营火涌现而出，并燃烧持续24小时（或直到被熄灭）。
{@dice 1d6+6}个{@creature 尖叫蕈|mm}破土而出。
{@dice 1d4+8}个鲜艳粉红色的蟾蜍从土中爬出。每当一个蟾蜍被触碰，它将转变成一个体型为大型或更小，由DM所选的怪物。这个怪物将存在长达1分钟，并接着在一阵亮粉色的烟雾中消失。
一个饥饿的{@creature 鲨蜥兽}从土中掘出并发起攻击。
一棵果树从地上长出。它长有{@dice 1d10+20}颗果实，其中{@dice 1d8}颗的效果等同随机的魔法药水，其中一颗的作用则等同一种由DM决定的服用型毒药。这棵树将在1小时之后消失。被摘下的果实仍会保留，且其中任何魔法都将维持长达30天。
一窝{@dice 1d4+3}个蛋将涌现而出。任何吃下蛋的生物都必须进行一次DC 20的体质豁免。若豁免成功，该生物最低的属性值将永久增加1点，若有多个属性同为最低则随机决定。若豁免失败，该生物将受到来自体内魔法爆炸而造成的{@dice 10d6}力场伤害。
一座基底为60尺平方尺的金字塔从地面迸发升起。其内部有着一个{@creature 木乃伊领主}的石棺。这座金字塔将被视为{@creature 木乃伊领主}的巢穴，且它的石棺内将装有DM所决定的宝藏。
一颗巨大的豌豆茎从地上长出，并成长到DM所决定的高度。它的顶端将通往一处DM所选择的场所，像是到一处雄伟的景点、一座{@creature 云巨人|mm}的城堡、或另一个不同的存在位面。

item.name: Bag of Bounty
entries: This is a sturdy leather sack with tiny Siberys shards embedded into the lining. If you have the Mark of Hospitality you can use an action to cast create food and water, drawing a feast from within the bag. You shape this meal with your thoughts. You can create the standard bland fare without requiring any sort of check, but you can attempt to create finer food by making a Charisma check; if you're proficient with cook's utensils, add your bonus to this check. A failed check results in a sour and squalid meal.

rows: Poor
No roll required
Modest
Comfortable
Wealthy
Aristocratic

entries: A bag of bounty can be used up to three times over the course of a day. After that, the bag can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 吞噬袋
entries: 这个袋子表现上与{@item 次元袋}极为相似，但它实际上是某个超巨型异次元生物的进食孔。将这个袋子里外翻转将会关闭这个进食孔。

这个吞噬袋所依附的异次元生物可以传感到任何被放入这个袋子内的事物。被整个放入袋中的动物或植物将被吞噬并永久遗失。当活体生物的一部份被放入袋中时（例如当某人将手伸进袋中时），该生物会有{@chance 50}的几率被拖入袋中。一个进入袋中的生物可以使用一个动作以尝试通过成功通过一次DC 15的力量检定以从中逃脱。另一个生物也可以使用它的动作伸进袋中，通过成功通过一次DC 20的力量检定以将一个生物拉出（只要它没有先被拖入袋中）。任何在这个袋子中开始它回合的生物将被吞噬，且它的身体将被摧毁。
无生命的物体可以被保存在这个袋子中，且这个袋子袋子可以容纳最多1尺立方的物质。然而，每天一次，这个袋子将会吞下任何存放在其中的物体，并将它们吐到另一个存在位面。DM将决定其吞咽的时间和物体被吐至的位面。
若这个袋子被戳破或撕裂，则它将因此被摧毁，且任何它装载的东西都将被传送到星界位面的一处随机位置。

item.name: 次元袋
entries: 这个袋子具有一个比它外部尺寸要大上许多的内部空间，它的袋口直径约莫2尺，且深约4尺。这个袋子可以容纳最多500磅的重量，且体积不能超过64立方尺。无论它装了什么，这个袋子的重量皆为15磅。将一个物品从袋中取出需要花费一个动作。
若这个袋子超载、被戳破、或撕裂，则它将因此破裂并被摧毁，且它装载的东西将散落在星界位面。若这个袋子被里外翻转，则它装载的东西将无伤地掉落而出，但这个袋子必须被恢复原状才能够被再次使用。需要呼吸的生物在袋中可以存活的时间最多等同于10除以生物数量的分钟数（最少1分钟），在这之后它们将开始窒息。
将次元袋放入由{@item 霍华德的便利袋}、{@item 便携式次元洞}或类似物品所创造的异次元空间中，将会立刻摧毁这两件物品，并打开一道通往星界位面的传送门。这道传送门将产生载这两件物品被放入彼此的位置。任何距离这道传送门10尺内的生物将被吸进门内，并被送往星界位面中的一处随机地点。这道传送门接着将会关闭。这道传送门仅限单向传送，且无法再次被打开。

item.name: 魔术袋，灰色
entries: 这个由灰色布料制成的普通袋子看起来空无一物。然而，将手伸入袋中将会揭露一个小型绒毛物体的存在。
你可以使用一个动作将这个绒毛物体拉出袋子，并将它丢出最多20尺的距离。当这个物体落地时，它将转变成一个生物。你骰一颗{@dice d8}，并查找下表以决定该生物的种类。这个生物将在下次日出、或当它的生命值被归零时消失。
这个生物对你和你的同伴友善，且它会在你的回合行动。你可以使用一个附赠动作以命令该生物在它的下个回合要如何移动并采取什么动作，或者你可以给它一个笼统的命令，像是攻击你的敌人。若没有下达这类命令，该生物将依照它的天性行动。
一旦三个绒毛物体被从袋中拉出，则这个魔术袋直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

{@creature 巨鼠}
{@creature 獾}
{@creature 野猪}
{@creature 黑豹}
{@creature 巨獾}
{@creature 恐狼}

item.name: 魔术袋，铁锈色
entries: 这个由铁锈色布料制成的普通袋子看起来空无一物。然而，将手伸入袋中将会揭露一个小型绒毛物体的存在。
你可以使用一个动作将这个绒毛物体拉出袋子，并将它丢出最多20尺的距离。当这个物体落地时，它将转变成一个生物。你骰一颗{@dice d8}，并查找下表以决定该生物的种类。这个生物将在下次日出、或当它的生命值被归零时消失。
这个生物对你和你的同伴友善，且它会在你的回合行动。你可以使用一个附赠动作以命令该生物在它的下个回合要如何移动并采取什么动作，或者你可以给它一个笼统的命令，像是攻击你的敌人。若没有下达这类命令，该生物将依照它的天性行动。

entries: 这个由棕褐色布料制成的普通袋子看起来空无一物。然而，将手伸入袋中将会揭露一个小型绒毛物体的存在。
你可以使用一个动作将这个毛茸茸的物体拉出袋子，并将它丢出最多20尺的距离。当这个物体落地时，它将转变成一个生物。你骰一颗{@dice d8}，并查找下表以决定该生物的种类。这个生物将在下次日出、或当它的生命值被归零时消失。
这个生物对你和你的同伴友善，且它会在你的回合行动。你可以使用一个附赠动作以命令该生物在它的下个回合要如何移动并采取什么动作，或者你可以给它一个笼统的命令，像是攻击你的敌人。若没有下达这类命令，该生物将依照它的天性行动。
一旦三个绒毛物体被从袋中拉出，则这个魔术袋直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: Balance of Harmony
entries: This scale bears celestial symbols on one pan and fiendish symbols on the other. You can use the scale to cast {@spell 侦测善恶} as a ritual. Doing so requires you to place the scale on a solid surface, then sprinkle the pans with holy water or place a transparent gem worth 100 gp in each pan. The scale remains motionless if it detects nothing, tips to one side or the other for good (consecrated) or evil (desecrated), and fluctuates slightly if it detects a creature appropriate to the spell but neither good nor evil. By touching the scales after casting the ritual, you instantly learn any information the spell can normally convey, and then the effect ends.

item.name: 滚珠
entries: 最常见于{@item 滚珠(一袋1,000粒)|phb|一袋滚珠}。

item.name: 滚珠(一袋1,000粒)
entries: 以一个动作，你可以将这些小铁珠从袋中散落，覆盖一个10平方尺的平面区域。一个移动经过被覆盖区域的生物必须成功通过一次DC 10的敏捷豁免，否则摔倒{@condition 伏地}。一个以半速移动经过该区域的生物不需要进行该豁免检定。

item.name: 气球背包
entries: 这个背包里装着一个压缩的皮革气球和一只{@creature 气元素}的精魂。当你穿戴着这个背包时，你能够以一个动作将气球展开，并获得{@spell 浮空术}法术的效果长达10分钟，只能以你自己为目标，且无须专注。或者，你也可以在坠落的时候，以一个反应将气球展开，并获得{@spell 羽落术}法术的效果。
当任一法术结束时，气球会随着元素精魂从中逃逸并返回气元素位面而缓慢地漏气。在气球漏气期间，你向地面徐徐下降最多60尺。若你在下降这段距离之后仍然处于空中，且没有其他方法保持滞空，则你将会坠落。
当精魂逃逸后，这个背包的效果便无法再被使用，除非这个背包在一个风元素节点充能1小时，将另一个精魂束缚装进背包内。

item.name: Band of Loyalty
entries: If you are reduced to zero hit points while attuned to a band of loyalty, you instantly die. These rings are favored by spies who can't afford to fall into enemy hands.

item.name: 条纹玛瑙
entries: 棕、蓝、白、或红色条纹的透光宝石。

item.name: 战争符文旗帜
entries: 这面旗帜是用厚厚的红色织物制作而成，高 5 尺，宽 3 尺。 战争符文显示在织物上， 上面缝有圆形的金属板。 它可以附在 10 尺的杆子上作为旗帜。 卷起或展开旗帜需要一个动作。 旗帜有以下属性。

entries.name: 勇气印记
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以触摸展开的旗帜，使它散发出勇气。 你和你的盟友在距离它 20 尺的范围内对 {@condition 恐惧} 免疫。 这一好处持续 10 分钟或直到旗帜被卷起。 一旦你使用了这个属性，你就不能再使用它， 直到你完成一个短或长休。

entries.name: 哨兵标准
entries: 当 {@condition 隐形} 生物在展开旗帜的 20 尺内时，你可以看见他们。

entries.name: 标准之盾
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以触摸展开的旗帜并调用这个力量。 任何瞄准你或你的盟友的远程攻击骰都有劣势，只要目标在展开的旗帜 20 尺内。 此好处持续 1 分钟或直到旗帜被卷起 。 一旦你使用了这个属性， 你就不能再使用它， 直到你完成一个短或长休。

entries.name: 战斗赠礼
entries: 你可以通过用手指在地上画出战争符文来转移旗帜的魔法。 你所指向的地点，它会变成了一个半径为 500 尺的魔法球形区域的中心。 转移需要 8 小时的工作，这需要旗帜在你 5 尺之内，在这期间你选择生物，生物类型， 或两者都将受益于魔法。 最后，旗帜被摧毁，该地区获得以下属性:
在半径 500 尺的球体中， 你在转移过程中选择的生物对 {@condition 恐惧} 免疫， 并在攻击骰和 AC 上获得 +1 加值。

item.name: Barking Box
entries: This metal cube, 6 inches on a side, has a crank on top. Using an action to wind the crank activates the box for 8 hours. While activated, the box barks whenever it detects vibrations within 15 feet of it, as long as the box and the source of the vibrations are in contact with the same ground or substance. A switch on one side of the box sets the device to emit either a small dog's bark or a large dog's bark.

item.name: 木桶
entries: 一个木桶可以容纳40加仑的液体或4立方尺的固体。

item.name: Barrier Peaks Trinket
entries: At any point while the characters are searching through unusual equipment or detritus in the Monastery of the Distressed Body or the city of Daoine Gloine, roll on the following table to determine what they find. Each character finds one Barrier Peaks trinket over the course of the adventure.

entries.caption: Barrier Peaks Trinkets
rows: A handheld device containing a glowing green gem that darkens when no oxygen is present
A foot-long, egg-shaped object made from stitched leather
A black metal cylinder that dictates the history of an unknown plant or animal species when held
A cylindrical jar containing a pickled crustacean of unknown origin
A small thumb-button storage cylinder that releases a useless iron key when pressed
An unusual heraldic cloak pin that emits a short musical fanfare when tapped
A handheld tube that sucks in dust when squeezed and captures it in a detachable compartment
A scintillating disk of unknown material
A dial that can be twisted to slowly click back to its origin, whereupon it emits a loud ringing noise
A hovering, apple-sized orb of metal that follows you around
The {@condition 石化} cocoon of an unknown insect
A bronze gauntlet set with many slots, and which violently expels any object pressed into those slots
A box that plays an illusory message in an unknown language when opened
A rod that causes you to forget the last five minutes when you press a button near its tip
A palm-sized cylinder that emits a harmless ray of glowing blue light when squeezed
A bead that suppresses your hearing when secreted inside either ear, causing you to be {@condition 耳聋}
An amulet that displays your current health as a green bar above your head, with the bar retracting as your hit point total decreases
A casket containing one hundred tasteless blue pills that produce no discernible effect when swallowed
A metal mechanical puzzle with no apparent solution
A metal spinning top that never tips over when spun
Two strips of cloth-like material, each coated with a soft, hair-like fuzz on one side
A simple wire pyramid that preserves any foodstuffs it is placed over
A star chart labeled in an unknown script
A rectangle of black glass that displays indecipherable arcane runes when you swipe your finger across it
A schematic that shows the inner workings of an impossibly complex device
An odd pair of comfortable shoes made from supple, multicolored material
A mirror that makes you appear more beautiful when you tap your reflection
A mechanical metal puppy that playfully follows you around when activated
A talking bracelet that speaks only to correct your grammar
A bar of soap that can remove any stain
A journal in Common, written by someone in a world similar to but not quite the same as your own
A tub containing one serving of disgusting but nutritious goop that refills itself slowly over the course of one week
An instruction manual for activating a mysterious, world-destroying device
A small supple disk that displays weird moving symbols when placed over either eye
A tiny desk set with large, colorful buttons, each of which plays a discordant musical fanfare when pressed
A pair of tinted spectacles that reduce the glare of the sun when worn
An inflatable bedroll made from an unknown material, and which slowly deflates when used
A rod tipped with a blunt metal pincer whose grip can be adjusted by turning a screw
A battered helmet with a transparent orange visor that flips into place when donned
An animated map of a mysterious city that appears to be tracking the movements of five creatures
A cylinder of mist that holds your hair perfectly in shape when sprayed onto your head
A talking wand that tells you the name of any plant you point it at
A metal bracelet that displays the number of steps you've taken since your last long rest
A tiny handheld device that projects a glowing dot onto whatever you point it at
A rectangular piece of glass that displays a twelve-digit countdown on its surface
A wall chart of mysterious formulae arranged into a color-coded grid
A handheld device that solves any math problem you input using its buttons
A ball of speckled brown fur that appears to be alive
A complicated crystal board game that you don't know how to play
A large glass rectangle that displays a storm of black and white patterns when you press a button on its underside

item.name: 屏障刺青（大）
entries: 该魔法刺青用一根特殊的针制作，用液态金属般的墨水绘有代表防护的图案。

entries.name: 刺青同调
entries: 同调此物品时，你需要将针持握，并抵在你想要让刺青出现的那处皮肤上。当同调完成时，针头会化为墨水再变成刺青。若你与刺青的同调结束，刺青会消失，针头会再次出现在你的位置中。

entries.name: 防护
entries: 当你没有穿戴护甲的时候，刺青会给予你18的护甲等级。你装备盾牌时，仍可以获得刺青的增益。

item.name: 屏障刺青（中）
entries: 该魔法刺青用一根特殊的针制作，用液态金属般的墨水绘有代表防护的图案。

item.name: 基础毒药(小瓶装)
entries: 你可以使用这个小瓶内的涂药涂抹在一把挥砍或穿刺武器、或最多三发的弹药上。涂抹毒药需要花费一个动作。一个被中毒武器或弹药命中的生物必须成功通过一次DC 10的体质豁免，否则受到{@dice 1d4}毒素伤害。一旦被涂抹，毒药将在干涸前维持效力长达1分钟。

item.name: 篮子
entries: 一个篮子可以容纳2立方尺或40磅重的装备。

item.name: Battering Shield
entries: While holding this iron tower shield, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

Additionally, the shield has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you are holding the shield and push a creature within your reach at least 5 feet away, you can expend 1 charge to push that creature an additional 10 feet, knock it {@condition 伏地}, or both.

item.name: Battle Standard of Infernal Power
entries: This hell-forged battle standard is made of infernal iron and fitted with a small, unopenable cage containing a {@creature quasit}. The trapped {@creature quasit} is {@condition 无力}, and its cage has AC 19, 10 hit points, and immunity to all types of damage except force damage. If killed or somehow released, the {@creature quasit} disappears in a cloud of smoke, and a new one appears in the cage, provided the cage is intact.
While you hold the banner, your weapon attacks and those of all allied creatures within 300 feet of you count as magical for the purposes of overcoming damage immunities and resistances.

item.name: 力场珠
entries: 这个小型的黑色球体的直径约莫3/4寸，且重1盎司。通常力场珠会以{@dice 1d4 + 4}颗一组的形式被一起发现。

你可以使用一个动作已将这颗珠子投掷最多60尺距离。这颗珠子将在冲击中爆炸并被摧毁。每个距离珠子落地处10尺内的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否则将受到{@dice 5d4}力场伤害。一个球体的透明力场将封住该区域长达1分钟。任何在该豁免中失败的生物都将被完全困在这个球体内。成功通过该豁免的生物、或部份处于该区域内的生物，则将被自中心推离该球体直到它们不再身处其中。只有可供呼吸的空气可以穿透这个球体的墙壁，攻击或其他效果则无法穿透其墙壁。
一个被困住的生物可以使用它的动作已推动这个球体的墙壁，移动这个球体最多等同该生物步行速度一半的距离。这个球体可以被捡起，且无论内部的生物重量如何，它的魔法将使其仅有1磅的重量。

item.name: 营养珠
entries: 这个海绵般，没有味道的凝胶珠子会在你的舌尖溶解，并提供等同1天份口粮的营养。

item.name: 鲜水珠
entries: 这个海绵般，没有味道的凝胶珠子会在液体中溶解，并将一品脱的液体转变为新鲜且冰冷的饮用水。这个珠子对于魔法液体或有害物质（例如毒药）不会发挥任何效果。

item.name: 镶有珠宝的金丝象牙角杯
item.ENG_name: Bejeweled ivory drinking horn with gold filigree

item.name: Bejeweled ivory drinking horn with gold inlay (Brazen Coalition)
Belashyrra's Beholder Crown
entries: This symbiotic crown is carved from dark purple and mauve stone, with ten points like stalks set with gemstones resembling the eyestalks of a {@creature beholder}. To attune to this item, you must wear it on your head for the entire attunement period, during which the crown's hidden tendrils burrow into your scalp to bond with your skull.
While wearing the crown, you can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The crown has 10 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save DC 16): {@spell 魅惑人类} (1 charge), {@spell 解离术} (6 charges), {@spell 恐惧术} (3 charges), {@spell 死亡一指} (7 charges), {@spell 石化术} (6 charges), {@spell 人类定身术} (2 charges), {@spell 衰弱射线} (2 charges), {@spell 睡眠术} (1 charge), {@spell 缓速术} (3 charges), {@spell 心灵遥控} (5 charges).
The crown regains {@dice 1d6 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The crown can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the crown ends, and it detaches from you.
The daelkyr {@creature Belashyrra|ERLW} made these crowns. While on the same plane of existence as the crown, Belashyrra can see through its eyestalks.

item.name: 钟铃圣枝
entries: 这个银色的小物件看起来就像一根树枝，上面正挂着许多金色的小铃铛。你持握着它时可以将其作为法器。
树枝具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 作为一个附赠动作，你可以消耗1发充能以侦测距离你60尺内的异怪、天界生物、构装体、元素、精类、邪魔与不死生物。若这些生物存在在60尺内且对你没有处于全身掩护，那么金铃便会轻声作响，它们的音调揭示了所存在生物的种类。
以一个动作，你可以消耗1发充能施展 {@spell 防护善恶}.

item.name: 云巨人力量腰带
entries: 当穿戴这个腰带时，你的力量值变为27。若你在未穿戴这个腰带时的力量值就已经等于或高于这个腰带的数值，则这个物品对你将不会有任何效果。

item.name: 矮人腰带
entries: 当穿戴这个腰带时，你获得下列好处：

items: 你的体质增加2点，上限为20。
你在与矮人交互时所进行的魅力（{@skill 说服}）检定中具有优势。

entries: 此外，当与这个腰带同调时，若你能够长出胡须，则你在每天日出时会有{@chance 50}的几率长出大胡须，或若你已经有胡须，则它们将明显变得更浓密。
若你不是矮人，则你将在穿戴这个腰带时获得下列额外的好处：

items: 你在对抗毒素的豁免检定中具有优势，且你对毒素伤害具有抗性。
你具有60尺范围的黑暗视觉。
你可以说、读、写矮人语。

item.name: 火巨人力量腰带
entries: 当穿戴这个腰带时，你的力量值变为25。若你在未穿戴这个腰带时的力量值就已经等于或高于这个腰带的数值，则这个物品对你将不会有任何效果。

item.name: 霜巨人力量腰带
entries: 当穿戴这个腰带时，你的力量值变为23。若你在未穿戴这个腰带时的力量值就已经等于或高于这个腰带的数值，则这个物品对你将不会有任何效果。

item.name: 山丘巨人力量腰带
entries: 当穿戴这个腰带时，你的力量值变为21。若你在未穿戴这个腰带时的力量值就已经等于或高于这个腰带的数值，则这个物品对你将不会有任何效果。

item.name: 石巨人力量腰带
entries: 当穿戴这个腰带时，你的力量值变为23。若你在未穿戴这个腰带时的力量值就已经等于或高于这个腰带的数值，则这个物品对你将不会有任何效果。

item.name: 风暴巨人力量腰带
entries: 当穿戴这个腰带时，你的力量值变为29。若你在未穿戴这个腰带时的力量值就已经等于或高于这个腰带的数值，则这个物品对你将不会有任何效果。

item.name: 鸟笛
entries: 潘神排笛或萨特排笛，也被称做芦笛(shalm)。这种乐器对{@deity 黎儿拉}而言是神圣的，且深受木精灵和野精灵吟游诗人的喜爱。

item.name: Black Crystal Tablet
item.reqAttune: by a creature that has proficiency in the Arcana skill
entries: Any creature that attunes to the tablet must make a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw at the end of its next long rest. On a failed save, the creature becomes afflicted with a random form of long-term madness (see "{@book Madness|dmg|8|Madness}" in chapter 8 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}).

As an action, a creature attuned to the Black Crystal Tablet can use it to cast {@spell 摄心目光} or {@spell 异界之门} (the portal created by this spell links to the Far Realm only). After the tablet is used to cast a spell, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Black Dragon Mask
entries: This horned mask of glossy ebony has horns and a skull-like mien. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: You have resistance to acid damage. If you already have damage resistance to acid from another source, you gain immunity to acid damage. If you already have immunity to acid damage from another source, you regain hit points equal to half of any acid damage you are dealt.

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Charisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense 黑暗视觉} with a radius of 60 feet, or an additional 60 feet of {@sense 黑暗视觉} if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain blindsight out to a range of 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Draconic. You also have advantage on any Charisma check you make against Black dragons.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/Day) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries: You can breathe underwater.

item.name: 黑龙鳞甲
entries: 龙鳞甲是以某一种龙族的鳞片所制成的护甲。有时候龙族会收集自己褪下的鳞片并将它们送给类人生物。其他时候，则是由猎人们小心地剥取并保存死去龙族的鳞片。无论如何，龙鳞甲都具有相当高的价值。当穿着这个护甲时，你的AC获得+1加值，你在对抗龙族的骇人威仪和喷吐武器的豁免检定中具有优势，且你获得对强酸伤害的抗性。
此外，你能够以一个动作专注于你的感官，以用魔法辨别出距离你30里内最近的黑龙所在的距离和方位。这个特殊动作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: 黑蛋白石
entries: 带有黑色和金色斑纹的暗绿色透光宝石。

item.name: 黑珍珠
entries: 纯黑色的不透光宝石。

item.name: Black Sap
entries: This tarry substance harvested from the dark boughs of the death's head willow is a powerful intoxicant. It can be smoked as a concentrate or injected directly into the bloodstream. A creature subjected to a dose of black sap cannot be {@condition 魅惑} or {@condition 恐惧} for {@dice 1d6} hours.
For each dose of black sap consumed, a creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition 中毒} for {@dice 2d4} hours—an effect that is cumulative with multiple doses.

item.name: 黑蓝宝石
entries: 闪耀着高亮光泽的黑色半透光宝石。

item.name: 由银丝缝制的漆黑天鹅绒面具
item.ENG_name: Black velvet mask stitched with silver thread

item.name: 黑刃
item.reqAttune: by a creature of non-lawful alignment
entries: 被藏在白羽山的地下城中，黑刃闪耀就如同一片满布繁星的夜空。它漆黑的剑鞘上装饰着切割精良的黑曜石片。
你在使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+3加值。它还具有下列额外的特性。

entries.name: 吞噬灵魂
entries: 每当你使用它将一个生物的生命值归零时，除非该生物为构装体或不死生物，否则这把剑将杀死它并吞噬它的灵魂。一个灵魂被黑刃给吞噬的生物只能通过{@spell 祈愿术}法术而被复活。
当黑刃吞噬一个灵魂时，黑刃将赋予你等同于被杀死生物的生命值最大值的临时生命值。这些临时生命值将在24小时之后消散。只要这些临时生命值仍然存在，且你正手持黑刃，则你将在攻击检定、豁免检定、和属性检定中具有优势。
若你以这把武器命中一个不死生物，你将受到{@dice 1d10}黯蚀伤害，且目标将回复{@dice 1d10}点生命值。若这个黯蚀伤害将你的生命值归零，黑刃将吞噬你的灵魂。

entries.name: 灵魂猎手
entries: 当你持握这把武器，你将意识到任何距离你60尺内，体型为微型或更大，且并非构装体或不死生物的生物的存在。你也将不会陷入{@condition 魅惑}或{@condition 恐惧}。
每天一次，黑刃可以对你施放{@spell 加速术}法术。它会决定何时施放这个法术，并由它维持该法术的专注，因此你并不需要维持其专注。

entries.name: 智能
entries: 黑刃是一把混乱中立的智能魔法武器，它具有17点智力、10点感知、和19点魅力值。它具有听觉和120尺范围的黑暗视觉。
这把武器可以说、读、并理解通用语，且可以通过心灵感应与它的持用者沟通。它的声音低沉且带有回声。当你与它同调时，黑刃也将理解所有你知晓的语言。

entries.name: 个性
entries: 黑刃的语气带着傲慢，就像是它已经习惯于他人服从于它。
这把剑的目的就是吞噬灵魂。它并不在乎它所吞吃的是谁的灵魂，甚至包括其持有者在内。这把剑相信世间一切物质和能量都源自于负能量的虚无之中，且总有一日一切都将回归其中。而黑刃则希望能加速这个过程。
尽管它信仰虚无主义，黑刃仍对{@item 波涛}和{@item 征服}这两把同样被封印于白羽山的武器抱有莫名的亲近感。它希望这三把武器能够再次重聚并一同战斗，尽管它相当反对{@item 征服}的意见，且觉得{@item 波涛}沉闷无趣。
黑刃渴求灵魂且必须被经常性的喂养。若这把剑超过三天或更久的时间都没有吞噬灵魂，它将会在下次日落时与它的持用者发生冲突。

item.name: Blackstaff
item.reqAttune: by the blackstaff heir, who must be a wizard
entries: The Blackstaff is a sentient, rune-carved staff set with thin silver veins. It is the symbol of office for the Blackstaff, the highest-ranking wizard in Waterdeep. As the rightful owner of the Blackstaff, Vajra Safahr is the only one who can become attuned to it. The staff can, however, choose a new owner (see "Personality" below).

This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class, saving throws, and spell attack rolls.

The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage roll but loses all other properties. On a 20, the staff regain {@dice 1d8 + 2} charges.

entries.name: Power Strike
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@dice 1d6} force damage to the target.

entries.name: Spells
entries: While holding this staff, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: {@spell 寒冰锥} (5 charges), {@spell 火球术} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell 法术无效结界} (6 charges), {@spell 怪物定身术} (5 charges), {@spell 浮空术} (2 charges). {@spell 闪电束} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell 魔法飞弹} (1 charge), {@spell 衰弱射线} (1 charge), or {@spell 力墙术} (5 charges).

entries.name: Retributive Strike
entries: You can use an action to break the staff over your knee or against a solid surface, performing a retributive strike. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it.

You have a {@chance 50} chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existence, avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effect, you take force damage equal to 16 × the number of charges in the staff. Every other creature in the area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes an amount of damage based on how far away it is from the point of origin, as shown in the following table. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

rows: 10 ft. away or closer
8 × the number of charges in the staff
11 to 20 ft. away
6 × the number of charges in the staff
21 to 30 ft. away
4 × the number of charges in the staff

entries.name: Animate Walking Statues
entries: You can expend 1 or more of the staff's charges as an action to animate or deactivate one or more of the {@creature walking statue of Waterdeep|wdh|walking statues of Waterdeep}. You must be in the city to use this property, and you can animate or deactivate one statue for each charge expended. An animated statue obeys the telepathic commands of Khelben Arunsun's spirit, which is trapped inside the staff (see "Personality" below). A walking statue becomes inanimate if deactivated or if the staff is broken.

entries.name: Dispel Magic
entries: You can expend 1 of the staff's charges as a bonus action to cast {@spell 解除魔法} on a creature, an object, or a magical effect that you touch with the tip of the staff. If the target is an unwilling creature or an object in the possession of such a creature, you must hit the creature with a melee attack using the Blackstaff before you can expend the charge to cast the spell.

entries.name: Drain Magic
entries: This property affects only creatures that use spell slots. When you hit such a creature with a melee attack using the Blackstaff, you can expend 1 of the staff's charges as a bonus action, causing the target to expend one spell slot of the highest spell level it can cast without casting a spell. If the target has already expended all its spell slots, nothing happens. Spell slots that are expended in this fashion are regained when the target finishes a long rest, as normal.

entries.name: Master of Enchantment
entries: When you cast an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher while holding the staff, you can make an Intelligence ({@skill 奥秘}) check with a DC of 10 + the level of the spell. If the check succeeds, you cast the spell without expending a spell slot.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Blackstaff is a sentient staff of neutral alignment, with an Intelligence of 22, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 120 feet, and it can communicate telepathically with any creature that is holding it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: The staff has the spirits of all previous Blackstaffs trapped within it. Its creator, Khelben Arunsun, is the dominant personality among them. Like Khelben, the staff is extremely devious and manipulative. It prefers to counsel its owner without exerting outright control. The staff's primary goal is to protect Waterdeep and its Open Lord, currently Laeral Silverhand. Its secondary goal is to help its wielder become more powerful.

In the event that the holder of the office of the Blackstaff no longer serves the staff's wishes, the staff ceases to function until it finds a worthy inheritor—someone whose loyalty to Waterdeep is beyond reproach.

entries.name: Spirit Trap
entries: When the Blackstaff dies, the spirit of that individual becomes trapped in the staff along with the spirits of the previous Blackstaffs. (A Blackstaff whose spirit is trapped in the staff can't be raised from the dead.)

Destroying the staff would release the spirits trapped inside it, but in that event, Khelben's spirit can lodge itself inside any one piece of the staff that remains. The piece containing Khelben's spirit has the staff's Sentience property but none of its other properties. As long as this piece of the staff exists, Khelben's spirit can make the staff whole again whenever he wishes. When the staff is remade, the spirits of the previous Blackstaffs become trapped inside it again.

item.name: Blade of Avernus
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, the weapon ignores resistance to slashing damage.

When you attack a creature that has at least one head with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you cut off one of the creature's heads. The creature dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, doesn't have or need a head, has legendary actions, or the DM decides that the creature is too big for its head to be cut off with this weapon. Such a creature instead takes an extra {@dice 6d8} slashing damage from the hit.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The sword has the following randomly determined properties, as described in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}, which is suppressed while the sword is attuned to an archdevil

entries.name: Ruler of Avernus
entries: As an action, you can point this sword at one devil you can see within 60 feet of you. That devil must succeed on a DC 22 Charisma saving throw or be {@condition 魅惑} by you for 1 hour. While {@condition 魅惑} in this way, the devil follows your orders to the best of its ability. If you command the devil to do something it perceives as suicidal, the effect ends and you can no longer use this power of the sword against that devil.

entries.name: Infernal Recall
entries: As an action, you can use the sword to cast {@spell 回返真言}. Creatures transported by this spell appear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the current ruler of Avernus, or a sanctuary you designate if you rule Avernus.

entries.name: Destroying the Sword
entries: The sword can be destroyed by casting it into the River Styx or melting it down in the forge that created it.

item.name: Blade of Broken Mirrors
entries: A weapon of Tharizdun, this dagger is a piece of jagged stone whose blade is scribed with a maze-like pattern with no beginning or end.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Blade of Broken Mirrors is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 21, a Wisdom of 24, and a Charisma of 24. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal and Common.

entries.name: Personality
entries: An insane {@creature glabrezu} named Ragazuu lives within the Blade of Broken Mirrors. The weapon yearns to cause chaos. It learns its wielder's principles, then uses those ideals to encourage reckless action. The dagger whispers ideas of revolution.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The dagger grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Abyssal.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Immediately after you make a ranged attack with this weapon, it returns to your hand.

Whenever you kill a humanoid with an attack using the Blade of Broken Mirrors, the blade remembers the creature's appearance. While holding the dagger, you can use an action to change your form to match any humanoid the blade remembers. Your statistics, other than your size, don't change. Any equipment you are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. You can revert to your true appearance as an action. You revert to your true appearance automatically when you die. When the Blade of Broken Mirrors attunes to a new wielder, the appearances of humanoids it has killed are wiped from its memory.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the dagger reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.

While holding the weapon, you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it (save DC 15): {@spell 鬼斧神工}, {@spell 幻景}, {@spell 强效幻影}, or {@spell 魅影杀手}. Once a spell has been cast using the dagger, that spell can't be cast from the dagger again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the dagger reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for spells cast from the dagger increases to 17.

While holding the dagger, you can turn {@condition 隐形} as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is {@condition 隐形} with you. You remain {@condition 隐形} until you stop holding the dagger, until you attack or cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Blast Scepter
entries: The Blast Scepter can be used as an arcane focus.

Whoever is attuned to the Blast Scepter gains resistance to fire and lightning damage and can, as an action, use it to cast {@spell 雷鸣波} as a 4th-level spell (save DC 16) without expending a spell slot.

item.name: Blasting Powder
entries: This volatile alchemical powder comes in a small pouch. When ignited by an open flame or a fuse, the powder explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding pouch must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A character can bind multiple pouches of blasting powder together so they explode at the same time. Each additional pouch increases the damage by {@dice 1d6} (maximum of {@dice 10d6}) and the blast radius by 5 feet (maximum of 20 feet).

item.name: Blight Ichor
entries: This bitter chartreuse concoction is distilled from a fungus native to the Blightshore badlands. The sickly green liqueur harbors potent psychedelic properties. Provided it is neither a construct nor undead, a creature subjected to a dose of blight ichor gains advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom checks, as well as vulnerability to psychic damage, for 1 hour. For each dose of blight ichor consumed, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition 中毒} for {@dice 1d6} hours and suffer the effects of a confusion spell for 1 minute. An undead creature subjected to a dose of blight ichor gains advantage on all Dexterity checks and is immune to the {@condition 恐惧} condition for 1 hour.

item.name: 滑轮组
entries: 一组缆绳串连的滑轮，以及一个用以装上物体的钩子，一组滑轮组让你能够吊起最多四倍于你正常所能举起的重量。

item.name: 血符石
entries: 这颗钻石含有一种生物的血液——血液以血液符文的形式出现。 当物品在你身上时，你可以使用你的动作来判断与物品中的血液有关的离你最近的生物的位置，但不能是亡灵。 你能感觉到生物相对于你的位置的距离和方向。 该生物要幺是其物品中血液的本人， 要幺是其血亲。
这件物品是由价值至少 5,000 gp 的大钻石制成的。 当一个生物的血被侵染在它的创造过程中，血液渗透到宝石的心脏。 如果宝石被破坏，血就会蒸发，永远消失。 一个复仇心重的生物可能会使用血石来猎杀整个血脉。 这些石头有时作为礼物送给兄弟姐妹， 或由父母传给孩子。

item.name: 血怒刺青
entries: 该魔法刺青用一根特殊的针制作，该刺青的形状与颜色能够唤起愤怒。

entries.name: 刺青同调
entries: 同调此物品时，你需要将针持握，并抵在你想要让刺青出现的那处皮肤上。当同调完成时，针头会化为墨水再变成刺青。若你与刺青的同调结束，刺青会消失，针头会再次出现在你的位置中。

entries.name: 嗜血狂袭
entries: 刺青具有10发充能，其在每天黎明时恢复所有已消耗的充能。当刺青在你的皮肤上时，你获得以下增益：

items: 当你以武器攻击命中一个生物时，你可以消耗1发充能对目标造成额外的 {@damage 4d6} 黯蚀伤害，同时你恢复数值等于所造成黯蚀伤害的生命值。
当一个你可见的生物对你造成伤害时，你可以消耗1发充能并使用你的反应对那个生物发动一次近战攻击，这次攻击的攻击检定具有优势。

item.name: Blood Fury Tattoo
entries: This tattoo evokes fury in its form and colors. While this tattoo is on your skin, you gain the following benefits:

items: Your attack rolls score a critical hit on a {@dice d20} roll of 19 or 20.
When you score a critical hit against a creature, that target takes an extra {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage, and you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
When a creature you can see damages you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against that creature, with advantage on your attack roll.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Blood of the Lycanthrope
entries: This poison is created from blood harvested from a dead or {@condition 无力} lycanthrope in its animal or hybrid form. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with lycanthropy (see the Monster Manual). The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell 移除诅咒} spell or similar magic.
The type of lycanthropy depends on the lycanthrope used to create the poison. To determine the type of lycanthropy randomly, roll a d6:

rows: {@creature Wererat}
{@creature Werewolf}
{@creature Wereboar}

item.name: Blood of the Lycanthrope Antidote
entries: This clear potion has dark red flecks within, resembling clotted blood. When you drink this potion, it removes the curse of lycanthropy from you if that curse was imposed by a lycanthrope's bite or similar effect.

item.name: Blood Spear
entries: Kavan was a ruthless chieftain whose tribe lived in the Balinok Mountains centuries before the arrival of {@creature Strahd von Zarovich|CoS}. Although he was very much alive, Kavan had some traits in common with vampires: he slept during the day and hunted at night, he drank the blood of his prey, and he lived underground. In battle, he wielded a spear stained with blood. His was the first blood spear, a weapon that drains life from those it kills and transfers that life to its wielder, imbuing that individual with the stamina to keep fighting.
When you hit with a melee attack using this magic spear and reduce the target to 0 hit points, you gain {@dice 2d6} temporary hit points.
Any creature can wield the spear, but only the character {@adventure chosen by Kavan|CoS|14|Blood Spear of Kavan} to wield it gains a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

item.name: Bloodaxe
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic axe. The axe deals an extra {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage to creatures that aren't constructs or undead. If you reduce such a creature to 0 hit points with an attack using this axe, you gain 10 temporary hit points.
This axe is forged from a dark, rust-colored metal and once belonged to the goliath barbarian Grog Strongjaw of Vox Machina.

item.name: 血石
entries: 带红斑的深灰色不透光宝石。

item.name: Blue Dragon Mask
entries: This mask of glossy azure has spikes around its edges and a ridged horn in its center. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: You have resistance against lightning damage. If you already have resistance to lightning damage from another source, you instead have immunity to lightning damage. If you already have immunity to lightning damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to lightning damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Charisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense 盲视} out to 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Draconic. You also have advantage on any Charisma check you make against Blue Dragons.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/Day) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Lingering Shock
entries: If you deal lightning damage to a creature, it can't take reactions until its next turn.

item.name: 蓝龙鳞甲
entries: 龙鳞甲是以某一种龙族的鳞片所制成的护甲。有时候龙族会收集自己褪下的鳞片并将它们送给类人生物。其他时候，则是由猎人们小心地剥取并保存死去龙族的鳞片。无论如何，龙鳞甲都具有相当高的价值。当穿着这个护甲时，你的AC获得+1加值，你在对抗龙族的骇人威仪和喷吐武器的豁免检定中具有优势，且你获得对闪电伤害的抗性。
此外，你能够以一个动作专注于你的感官，以用魔法辨别出距离你30里内最近的蓝龙所在的距离和方位。这个特殊动作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: 青石英
entries: 淡蓝色的透光宝石。

item.name: 青蓝宝石
entries: 蓝白色至中等蓝色的透光宝石。

item.name: 蓝尖晶石
entries: 深蓝色的透光宝石。

item.name: Bob
entries: This +1 battleaxe floats on water and other liquids, and grants its bearer advantage on Strength ({@skill 运动}) checks made to swim.

item.name: 炸弹
entries: 以一个动作，一个角色可以点燃炸弹并将它投掷到最多60尺远的一点。每个距离该点5尺内的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 12的敏捷豁免，否则受到{@damage 3d6}火焰伤害。

item.name: Bonecounter
entries: This weapon is a magical +2 mace called Bonecounter. Whenever this weapon is used to destroy an undead creature, a single silver piece appears in the wielder's pocket.

item.name: 书
entries: 一本书可能包含了诗集、历史纪录、与特定领域知识有关的数据、侏儒发明品的示意图和笔记、或任何其它可以用文本或图片呈现的内容。一本记录着法术的书则是{@spell 法术书}（于本节稍后介绍）。

item.name: Book of Exalted Deeds
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: The definitive treatise on all that is good in the multiverse, the fabled Book of Exalted Deeds figures prominently in many religions. Rather than being a scripture devoted to a particular faith, the book's various authors filled the pages with their own vision of true virtue, providing guidance for defeating evil.

The Book of Exalted Deeds rarely lingers in one place. As soon as the book is read, it vanishes to some other corner of the multiverse where its moral guidance can bring light to a darkened world. Although attempts have been made to copy the work, efforts to do so fail to capture its magical nature or translate the benefits it offers to those pure of heart and firm of purpose.

A heavy clasp, wrought to look like angel wings, keeps the book's contents secure. Only a creature of good alignment that is attuned to the book can release the clasp that holds it shut. Once the book is opened, the attuned creature must spend 80 hours reading and studying the book to digest its contents and gain its benefits. Other creatures that peruse the book's open pages can read the text but glean no deeper meaning and reap no benefits. An evil creature that tries to read from the book takes {@dice 24d6} radiant damage. This damage ignores resistance and immunity, and can't be reduced or avoided by any means. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage disappears in a blinding flash and is destroyed, leaving its possessions behind.

Benefits granted by the Book of Exalted Deeds last only as long as you strive to do good. If you fail to perform at least one act of kindness or generosity within the span of 10 days, or if you willingly perform an evil act, you lose all the benefits granted by the book.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Book of Exalted Deeds has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial properties}

entries.name: Increased Wisdom
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, your Wisdom score increases by 2, to a maximum of 24. You can't gain this benefit from the book more than once.

entries.name: Enlightened Magic
entries: Once you've read and studied the book, any spell slot you expend to cast a cleric or paladin spell counts as a spell slot of one level higher.

entries.name: Halo
entries: Once you've read and studied the book, you gain a protective halo. This halo sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. You can dismiss or manifest the halo as a bonus action. While present, the halo gives you advantage on Charisma ({@skill 说服}) checks made to interact with good creatures and Charisma ({@skill 威吓}) checks made to interact with evil creatures. In addition, fiends and undead within the halo's bright light make attack rolls against you with disadvantage.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: It is rumored that the Book of Exalted Deeds can't be destroyed as long as good exists in the multiverse. However, drowning the book in the River Styx removes all writing and imagery from its pages and renders the book powerless for {@dice 1d100} years.

item.name: Book of Vile Darkness
entries: The contents of this foul manuscript of ineffable wickedness are the meat and drink of those in evil's thrall. No mortal was meant to know the secrets it contains, knowledge so horrid that to even glimpse the scrawled pages invites madness.

Most believe the lich-god Vecna authored the Book of Vile Darkness. He recorded in its pages every diseased idea, every unhinged thought, and every example of blackest magic he came across or devised. Vecna covered every vile topic he could, making the book a gruesome catalog of all mortal wrongs.

Other practitioners of evil have held the book and added their own input to its catalog of vile knowledge. Their additions are clear, for the writers of later works stitched whatever they were writing into the tome or, in some cases, made notations and additions to existing text. There are places where pages are missing, torn. or covered so completely with ink, blood, and scratches that the original text can't be divined.

Nature can't abide the book's presence. Ordinary plants wither in its presence, animals are unwilling to approach it, and the book gradually destroys whatever it touches. Even stone cracks and turns to powder if the book rests on it long enough.

A creature attuned to the book must spend 80 hours reading and studying it to digest its contents and reap its benefits. The creature can then freely modify the book's contents, provided that those modifications advance evil and expand the lore already contained within.
Whenever a non-evil creature attunes to the Book of Vile Darkness, that creature must make a DC 17 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's alignment changes to neutral evil.

The Book of Vile Darkness remains with you only as long as you strive to work evil in the world. If you fail to perform at least one evil act within the span of 10 days, or if you willingly perform a good act, the book disappears. If you die while attuned to the book, an entity of great evil claims your soul. You can't be restored to life by any means while your soul remains imprisoned.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Book of Vile Darkness has the following random properties:

items: 3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental properties}

entries.name: Adjusted Ability Scores
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, one ability score of your choice increases by 2, to a maximum of 24. Another ability score of your choice decreases by 2, to a minimum of 3. The book can't adjust your ability scores again.

entries.name: Mark of Darkness
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, you acquire a physical disfigurement as a hideous sign of your devotion to vile darkness. An evil rune might appear on your face, your eyes might become glossy black, or horns might sprout from your forehead. Or you might become wizened and hideous, lose all facial features, gain a forked tongue, or some other feature the DM chooses. The mark of darkness grants you advantage on Charisma ({@skill 说服}) checks made to interact with evil creatures and Charisma ({@skill 威吓}) checks made to interact with non-evil creatures.

entries.name: Command Evil
entries: While you are attuned to the book and holding it, you can use an action to cast the {@spell 支配怪物} spell on an evil target (save DC 18). You can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Dark Lore
entries: You can reference the Book of Vile Darkness whenever you make an Intelligence check to recall information about some aspect of evil, such as lore about demons. When you do so, double your proficiency bonus on that check.

entries.name: Dark Speech
entries: While you carry the Book of Vile Darkness and are attuned to it, you can use an action to recite word from its pages in a foul language known as Dark Speech.
