Each time you do so, you take {@dice 1d12} psychic damage, and each non-evil creature within 15 feet of you takes {@dice 3d6} psychic damage.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: The Book of Vile Darkness allows pages to be torn from it, but any evil lore contained on those pages finds its way back into the book eventually, usually when a new author adds pages to the tome.
If a {@creature solar} tears the book in two, the book is destroyed for {@dice 1d100} years, after which it reforms in some dark corner of the multiverse.

A creature attuned to the book for one hundred years can unearth a phrase hidden in the original text that, when translated to Celestial and spoken aloud, destroys both the speaker and the book in a blinding flash of radiance. However, as long as evil exists in the multiverse, the book reforms {@dice 1d10 × 100} years later.
If all evil in the multiverse is wiped out, the book turns to dust and is forever destroyed.

item.name: Bookmark
entries: This +3 dagger belongs to {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}. While you have the dagger drawn, you can use a bonus action to activate one of the following properties:

items: Cause a blue gem set into the dagger's pommel to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, or make the gem go dark.
Turn the dagger into a compass that, while resting on your palm, points north.
Cast {@spell 次元门} from the dagger. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Cast {@spell 强迫术} (save DC 15) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 精灵之靴
entries: 当你穿着这双靴子时，无论你移动经过什么样的地形表面，你的脚步都不会发出任何声音。你同时在依赖无声移动的敏捷（{@skill 隐匿}）检定中具有优势。

item.name: 伪迹之靴
entries: 只有类人生物可以穿着这双靴子。当穿着这双靴子时，你可以选择让它们留下像是其他与你体型相同类人生物的足迹。

item.name: 浮空之靴
entries: 当你穿着这双靴子时，你可以使用一个动作以对自己随意施放{@spell 浮空术}法术。

item.name: 速度之靴
entries: 当你穿着这双靴子时，你可以使用一个附赠动作以使这双靴子的脚后跟互相轻触。若你这么做，这双靴子将使你的步行速度变为两倍，且任何生物在对你进行借机攻击时将在该攻击检定中承受劣势。若你再次互触你的脚后跟，则你终止这个效果。
当这双蝎子的特性被使用总共10分钟，则其魔法将停止作用直到你完成一次长休。

item.name: 跑跳之靴
entries: 当你穿着这双靴子时，除非你的步行速度为30尺或更高，否则你的步行速度将变为30尺。且你的速度不会因为负载状态或穿戴重甲而被减少。此外，你可以跳跃至原本三倍的距离，但不能超过你剩余的移动速度所允许的距离。

item.name: 雪地之靴
entries: 这双毛绒绒的靴子温暖且舒适。当你穿着这双靴子时，你获得下列好处：

items: 你具有对冷冻伤害的抗性。
你无视由冰或雪所构成的困难地形。
你可以在没有额外保护的情况下忍受最低华氏-50度的低温。若你穿着厚重的衣物，则你可以忍受最低华氏-100度的低温。

item.name: Boros Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Boros, allows you to cast {@spell 英雄气概}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Boros' recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Boros Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Boros guild
entries: Carved from red sandstone with white granite elements to resemble a member of the Boros Legion, this keyrune can become a {@creature veteran} (human) for up to 8 hours. In addition to fighting on your behalf, this {@creature veteran} cheerfully offers tactical advice, which is usually sound. Anyone who talks with the transformed keyrune or examines it closely can easily recognize that it is an artificial human.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature veteran} (human). If there isn't enough space for the {@creature veteran}, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 闪避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 压印着金箔叶并镶有紫晶的软木瓶塞
item.ENG_name: Bottle stopper cork embossed with gold leaf and set with amethysts

item.name: 瓶装气息
entries: 这个瓶子里存有一股来自风元素的气流。当你将其吸入后，你可以选择呼出它，或者屏住呼吸。
如果你选择吐出气息，则你获得{@spell 造风术}法术的效果。如果你选择屏住呼吸，则你在1小时内将不再需要呼吸，你可以提前结束这个好处（例如，开口说话），但提前结束这个效果并不会给你带来吐出气息的好处。

item.name: 命令水元素水钵
entries: 当这个碗钵被装满水时，你可以使用一个动作以说出这个碗钵的命令语，并如同你施放了{@spell 召唤元素生物}法术一样召唤出一个{@creature 水元素}。这个碗钵直到下次日出之前都不能再次被这个方式使用。
这个碗钵直径约莫1尺，深约半尺。它的重量为3磅，且可以容纳大约3加仑的液体。

item.name: 一盒绿松石制的动物雕像
Bracelet of Rock Magic
entries: While you wear this gold bracelet, it grants you immunity to being {@condition 石化}, and it allows you to cast {@spell 石化术} (save DC 15) as an action. Once the spell has been cast three times, the bracelet can no longer cast it. Thereafter, you can cast {@spell 塑石术} as an action. After you have done this thirteen times, the bracelet loses its magic and turns from gold to lead.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The bracelet's affinity with earth manifests as an unusual curse. Creatures of flesh that are strongly related to earth and stone, such as stone giants and dwarves, have advantage on the saving throw against {@spell 石化术} cast from the bracelet. If such a creature's save is successful, the bracelet breaks your attunement to it and casts the spell on you. You make your saving throw with disadvantage, and on a failed save you are {@condition 石化} instantly.

item.name: Bracer of Flying Daggers
entries: This armband appears to have thin {@item dagger|phb|daggers} strapped to it. As an action, you can pull up to two magic daggers from the bracer and immediately hurl them, making a ranged attack with each dagger. A dagger vanishes if you don't hurl it right away, and the daggers disappear right after they hit or miss. The bracer never runs out of daggers.

item.name: 射手护腕
entries: 当穿戴这对护腕时，你将熟练于{@item 长弓|phb}和{@item 短弓|phb}，且你使用这类武器所进行远程攻击的伤害骰中获得+2加值。

item.name: ​防御护腕
entries: 当穿戴这对护腕时，若你未穿着护甲或使用盾牌，则你的AC获得+2加值。

item.name: 黄铜龙鳞甲
entries: 龙鳞甲是以某一种龙族的鳞片所制成的护甲。有时候龙族会收集自己褪下的鳞片并将它们送给类人生物。其他时候，则是由猎人们小心地剥取并保存死去龙族的鳞片。无论如何，龙鳞甲都具有相当高的价值。当穿着这个护甲时，你的AC获得+1加值，你在对抗龙族的骇人威仪和喷吐武器的豁免检定中具有优势，且你获得对火焰伤害的抗性。
此外，你能够以一个动作专注于你的感官，以用魔法辨别出距离你30里内最近的黄铜龙所在的距离和方位。这个特殊动作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: 镶有翡翠的黄铜马克杯
命令火元素火盆
entries: 当这个火盆内燃烧着火焰时，你可以使用一个动作以说出这个火盆的命令语，并如同你施放了{@spell 召唤元素生物}法术一样召唤出一个{@creature 火元素}。这个火盆直到下次日出之前都不能再次被这个方式使用
这个碗钵的重量为5磅。

item.name: Breathing Bubble
entries: This translucent, bubble-like sphere has a slightly tacky outer surface, and you gain the item's benefits only while wearing it over your head like a helmet.
The bubble contains 1 hour of breathable air. The bubble regains all its expended air daily at dawn.

item.name: 酿酒工具
additionalEntries: 酿酒即是酿造酒精饮料。除了酿酒以外，这套程序还能用于蒸馏淡水。麦酒的发酵需要等待好几周时间，但酿造工作只需要几个小时。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 酿酒工具包括一个大玻璃罐、一些酵母、一根虹吸管，以及几尺长的管子。

additionalEntries.name: 历史
entries: 酿酒工具熟练项能让你在进行与酒大有关联的事件的智力（历史）检定时有更多的了解。

additionalEntries.name: 医药
entries: 当你治疗酒精中毒的病人，或你能使用酒精来减轻疼痛时，酿酒工具熟练项会给你更多的启示。

additionalEntries.name: 说服
entries: 酒逢知己千杯少。酿酒工具熟练项能让你向他人提供私酿的美酒，借此改善关系。

additionalEntries.name: 饮用水
entries: 你的酿造知识允许你用非饮用水蒸馏纯净水。你在一次长休中可以蒸馏出6加仑的淡水，而一次短休则只有1加仑。

additionalEntries.caption: 酿酒工具
rows: 检查饮品中的毒素或杂质
鉴定酒精饮料
抵抗酒精的影响

item.name: Bridle of Capturing
entries: This fine leather bridle tugs at the hand when first held, as though it longs to reach out for a beast nearby. When you hold one end of the bridle, you can use an action to speak its command word, causing the other end to lash out at a beast you can see within 20 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or have the bridle tie itself around its neck, then fall under your command as if subjected to the {@spell 支配野兽} spell. Once the targeted is affected, you do not need to hold the other end of the bridle to command it. With a successful saving throw, the target becomes immune to the bridle's power until the next dawn.

A creature controlled by the bridle can be released by the creature that bound it as a bonus action. A creature controlled by the bridle can make a DC 17 Charisma check each day at dawn. On a success, the creature is no longer affected by the bridle.

item.name: 青铜龙鳞甲
entries: 龙鳞甲是以某一种龙族的鳞片所制成的护甲。有时候龙族会收集自己褪下的鳞片并将它们送给类人生物。其他时候，则是由猎人们小心地剥取并保存死去龙族的鳞片。无论如何，龙鳞甲都具有相当高的价值。当穿着这个护甲时，你的AC获得+1加值，你在对抗龙族的骇人威仪和喷吐武器的豁免检定中具有优势，且你获得对闪电伤害的抗性。
此外，你能够以一个动作专注于你的感官，以用魔法辨别出距离你30里内最近的青铜龙所在的距离和方位。这个特殊动作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Brooch of Living Essence
entries: While wearing this nondescript brooch, spells and anything else that would detect or reveal your creature type treat you as humanoid, and those that would reveal your alignment treat it as neutral.

item.name: 护盾胸针
entries: 当穿戴这个胸针时，你具有对力场伤害的抗性，且你免疫于来自{@spell 魔法飞弹}法术的伤害。

item.name: 飞天扫帚
entries: 这把3磅重的木制扫帚平时的功能就如同一把寻常扫帚，直到你跨坐它并说出它的命令语。它接着将在你身下浮空，并可以载着你在空中飞行。它具有50尺的飞行速度。它可以承载最多400磅的重量，但当它承载超过200磅的重量时，它的飞行速度将变为30尺。这把扫帚将在你着陆时停止浮空。
若你说出它的命令语，并指定一个距离你1里内且你所熟悉的场所，你就可以差遣这把扫帚自行飞到该处。只要这把扫帚仍在距离你1里内的位置，它就会在你说出另一个命令语时回到你身边。

item.name: 水桶
entries: 一个水桶可以容纳3加仑的液体或½立方尺的固体。

item.name: 牛眼提灯
entries: 一盏牛眼提灯散发出60尺锥形的明亮光照以及再延伸60尺的微光光照。一旦被点亮，每一扁瓶(1品脱)的{@item 灯油(扁瓶装)|phb|灯油}都可以让它燃烧持续6小时。

item.name: 窃贼套装
entries: 内含：

items: 一个{@item 背包|phb}
{@item 滚珠(一袋1,000粒)|phb|一袋1,000粒的滚珠}
10尺弦线
一个{@item 铃铛|phb}
5根{@item 蜡烛|phb}
一根{@item 撬棍|phb}
一把{@item 铁锤|phb}
10根{@item 岩钉|phb}
一盏{@item 附盖提灯|phb}
2瓶{@item 灯油(扁瓶装)|phb|灯油}
5天份的{@item 口粮(1天份)|phb|口粮}
一个{@item 打火匣|phb}
一个{@item 水袋|phb}
{@item 麻绳(50尺)|phb|50尺的麻绳}

item.name: 焦引薰烟
entries: 受害于这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 13的体质豁免，否则受到10 ({@dice 3d6})毒素伤害，且必须在它的每个回合开始时重复进行这个豁免检定。该角色每次连续豁免失败都将受到3 ({@dice 1d6})毒素伤害。在豁免成功三次后，此毒药的效果结束。

item.name: Butcher's Bib
entries: This black leather apron is perpetually covered by blood, even after being washed off. You gain the following benefits while wearing the apron:

items: Once per turn when you roll damage for a melee attack with a weapon, you can reroll the weapon's damage dice. If you do so, you must use the second total.
Your weapon attacks that deal slashing damage score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

item.name: 书法工具
additionalEntries: 书法将写字升华为富有美感的艺术形式。书法家用独特的风格创作出赏心悦目的文字。他们的工具也提供了验证文稿真伪的能力，前提是书法家要花费数个小时来不断临摹文稿，以掌握其书写风格和结构特征。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 书法工具包括墨水、一打羊皮纸，以及三支羽毛笔。

additionalEntries.name: 奥秘
entries: 虽然书法对于破解魔法密文来说没什么作用，但是书法工具熟练项至少能让你判断出这堆鬼画符的作者是谁。

additionalEntries.name: 历史
entries: 该工具熟练项可以在进行分析或调查文本内容的成功检定中获得好处，例如古代文稿、卷轴，还有包括石头上的符文、壁画中的内容或者诸如此类的的其他文本。

additionalEntries.name: 解读藏宝图
entries: 该工具熟练项意味着你具有解读地图的专业知识。你可以进行一次智力检定以确定地图的年代，地图是否包含任何隐藏的信息，或类似的内容。

additionalEntries.caption: 书法工具
rows: 判断非魔法手迹的作者
理解作者的心态
现场伪造文稿
伪造签名

item.name: 铁蒺藜
entries: 以一个动作，你可以将一袋铁蒺藜洒落覆盖一个5尺平方的区域。任何进入该区域的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否则停止移动并受到1穿刺伤害。直到该生物回复至少1点生命值之前，它的步行速度将减少10尺。一个以半速移动经过该区域的生物不需要进行该豁免检定。

item.name: 铁蒺藜(20)
entries: 以一个动作，你可以将一袋铁蒺藜洒落覆盖一个5尺平方的区域。任何进入该区域的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否则停止移动并受到1穿刺伤害。直到该生物回复至少1点生命值之前，它的步行速度将减少10尺。一个以半速移动经过该区域的生物不需要进行该豁免检定。

item.name: 蜡烛
entries: 一根蜡烛可以燃烧1小时，散发出5尺半径的明亮光照和再延伸5尺的微光光照。

item.name: Candle Mace
entries: The head of this mace sheds bright light in a 5-foot-radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet. When you wield this mace, you can extinguish or ignite its light as an action.

item.name: 祈神蜡烛
entries: 这根纤细的蜡烛奉献给了某个神祇，并共享着该神祇的阵营。这根蜡烛的阵营可以通过{@spell 侦测善恶}法术被侦测。由DM选择或随机决定一尊神明和其所属的阵营。

rows: 混乱邪恶
混乱中立
混乱善良
中立邪恶
绝对中立
中立善良
守序邪恶
守序中立
守序善良

entries: 这根蜡烛的魔法会在它被点燃时被启动，且点燃它需要一个动作。在燃烧4小时之后，这根蜡烛将被摧毁。你可以提早熄灭它以备日后使用。将它燃烧的时间以1分钟为单位从这根蜡烛总燃烧时间中扣除。
当被点燃时，这根蜡烛将散发出30尺半径的微光光照。任何在该光照范围内，且阵营与此蜡烛符合的生物将在攻击检定、豁免检定、和属性检定中具有优势。此外，阵营与此蜡烛符合的牧师或德鲁伊可以施放他或她所准备的1环法术而无须消耗法术位，该法术的效果将如同被以1环法术位施放。
或者，当你第一次点燃此蜡烛时，你可以使用它施放{@spell 异界之门}法术。这么做会摧毁这根蜡烛。

item.name: 深渊蜡烛
entries: 这根蜡烛的火焰不会在被浸入水中时熄灭。它会如同普通蜡烛一样散发出光芒和热度。

item.name: Canoe
entries: A canoe can be purchased in Port Nyanzaru for 50 gp. It holds up to six Medium creatures and has a maximum speed of 2 mph. It is otherwise identical to a {@item rowboat}.

item.name: 水下呼吸帽
entries: 当在水中穿戴这个帽子时，你可以使用一个动作说出它的命令语，以创造出一个环绕你头部的气泡。这个气泡将让你得以在水下正常呼吸。这个气泡将会维持直到你再次说出命令语、这顶帽子被脱卸、或你不再处于水中。

item.name: 郎中披肩
entries: 这件披肩闻起来带有淡淡的硫磺味。当穿戴它时，你可以使用它以一个动作施放{@spell 次元门}法术。这件披肩的这个特性直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。
当你消失时，你将留下一团烟雾，且你会伴随着一团类似的烟雾出现在你的目的地。这团烟雾轻度遮蔽着你离开时所在的空间和你出现时所在的空间，且它将在你的下个回合结束时消散。一阵微风或更强的风将吹散这阵烟雾。

item.name: 红玉髓
entries: 橙色到红棕色的不透光宝石。

item.name: 木匠工具
additionalEntries: 木工技能允许角色打造木结构的物品。木匠可以建造房屋、棚屋、木制橱柜或类似的物品。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 木匠工具包括一把锯子、一把锤子、一些钉子、一把短斧、一把角尺、一把直尺，一把扁斧，一具木工刨和一把凿子。

additionalEntries.name: 历史
entries: 该工具熟练项有助于你分辨木结构建筑和其他大型木制品的用途和来历。

additionalEntries.name: 调查
entries: 当你调查木结构建筑时具有额外的洞察力，因为你深谙营造法则，可以发现隐藏的区域。

additionalEntries.name: 察觉
entries: 你可以发现木墙或地板的不自然之处，从而更容易找到陷阱门和秘密通道。

additionalEntries.name: 隐匿
entries: 你可以很快地判断出木地板上的薄弱点，这样就可以更容易地避开，以免发出嘎吱声。

additionalEntries.name: 加固
entries: 消耗原材料并进行1分钟的加工，你可以使一扇门或窗更难强行打开。打开门窗的DC值增加5点。

additionalEntries.name: 临时住所
entries: 作为长休的一部分，你可以建造一个棚屋或类似的遮蔽物，使你的团队能在一个阴凉干燥的环境中休息。因为它只是草草搭建起来的临时住所，所以在{@dice 1d3}天后便会倒塌。

additionalEntries.caption: 木匠工具
rows: 建造简单的木结构
设计复杂的木结构
在木墙上找到一个薄弱点
撬门

item.name: 飞天魔毯，3尺x5尺
entries: 你能够以一个动作说出这张魔毯的命令语，以使这张魔毯浮空并飞行。只要你距离它30尺内，它就会依照你的口头指令移动。
一张3尺x5尺的魔毯可以在承载最多200磅重量的情况下以80尺的飞行速度移动。一张魔毯可以承载最多其两倍的重量，但若它承载超过它正常负载量的重量，则它将以原本一半的速度飞行。

item.name: 飞天魔毯，4尺x6尺
entries: 你能够以一个动作说出这张魔毯的命令语，以使这张魔毯浮空并飞行。只要你距离它30尺内，它就会依照你的口头指令移动。
一张4尺x6尺的魔毯可以在承载最多400磅重量的情况下以60尺的飞行速度移动。一张魔毯可以承载最多其两倍的重量，但若它承载超过它正常负载量的重量，则它将以原本一半的速度飞行。

item.name: 飞天魔毯，5尺x7尺
entries: 你能够以一个动作说出这张魔毯的命令语，以使这张魔毯浮空并飞行。只要你距离它30尺内，它就会依照你的口头指令移动。
一张5尺x7尺的魔毯可以在承载最多600磅重量的情况下以40尺的飞行速度移动。一张魔毯可以承载最多其两倍的重量，但若它承载超过它正常负载量的重量，则它将以原本一半的速度飞行。

item.name: 飞天魔毯，6尺x9尺
entries: 你能够以一个动作说出这张魔毯的命令语，以使这张魔毯浮空并飞行。只要你距离它30尺内，它就会依照你的口头指令移动。
一张6尺x9尺的魔毯可以在承载最多800磅重量的情况下以30尺的飞行速度移动。一张魔毯可以承载最多其两倍的重量，但若它承载超过它正常负载量的重量，则它将以原本一半的速度飞行。

item.name: 食腐虫黏液
entries: 这种毒药必须从死亡或陷入{@condition 无力}状态的{@creature 食腐虫}身上采集获取。受害于这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 13的体质豁免，否则陷入{@condition 中毒}状态长达1分钟。因此陷入{@condition 中毒}状态的生物也将陷入{@condition 麻痹}状态。该生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复进行这个豁免检定，豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。

entries.name: Map of Shortcuts
entries: At rank 3, your map case becomes a common magic item. In addition to storing normal maps, your cartographer's map case can be used to generate a special map identifying a shortcut. You can use your action to make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) check, with a success revealing a map buried in your cartographer's map case noting a relevant shortcut. Your travel time is reduced by half while you follow that route. If you succeed at the check by 5 or more, the map includes notes on the terrain, granting you advantage on the next ability check you make to travel through the mapped area in the next hour. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Map of the Moment
entries: Starting at rank 3, you can use an action to make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) check and search your cartographer's map case to find a map either related to your current mission or inspiring a new one. On a success, you find a map with a prominent landmark. The map has information on the natural terrain within one mile of the landmark. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until dawn seven days later.

entries.caption: Possible Map Mission Landmarks
rows: The Ancient Sarcophagus of Gerald Smith
A tree labeled "This tree"
"The Last Resting Place of My Rich Brother that is Also a Bear Cave"
A range of peaks known as the Slightly Wobbly Spires
An ever-flowing, nonmagical spigot of pure, clear water in the middle of nowhere
A cave filled with screaming bioluminescent worms
The most haunted forest for ten miles in any direction
A huge pile of rocks with no other rocks within sight

item.name: 制图工具
additionalEntries: 使用制图工具，您可以创建精确的地图做旅行为自己和那些来找你更容易。这些地图可以从山脉的大规模描述到显示地下城平面布局的图表。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 制图工具包括一支鹅毛笔、墨水、羊皮纸，一副圆规、卡尺，和一把直尺。

additionalEntries.name: 奥秘、历史、宗教
entries: 当你使用这些技能时，你可以利用有关于地图和定位的知识来挖掘更详细的信息。例如，你可以在发现一张地图中的隐藏信息，确定地图绘制的年代以判断地理特征从那时起是否发生了变化，等等。

additionalEntries.name: 自然
entries: 你对自然地理的熟悉使你更容易回答或解释有关于你周遭地形的问题。

additionalEntries.name: 生存
entries: 你拥有的地理知识能帮你找到走出荒野的道路，判断有可能找到村庄或城镇的方向，以避免迷路。你研究过大量具有共通模式的地图，以至于对贸易路线的演变和定居点的分布格局了然于心。

additionalEntries.name: 绘制地图
entries: 旅行时，除了参加其他活动外，你还可以画一张地图。

additionalEntries.caption: 制图工具
rows: 确定地图的年代和来历
估测地标的方向和距离
辨别地图的真伪
填补地图上缺漏的部分

item.name: 异国木材雕制且镶有象牙和锆石的竖琴
item.ENG_name: Carved harp of exotic wood with ivory inlay and zircon gems

item.name: Cauldron of Plenty
entries: This cauldron is made of thick copper that has turned green with age. It is 4 feet wide, has a mouth 3½ feet in diameter, weighs 50 pounds, and can hold up to 30 gallons of liquid. Embossed on its bulging sides are images of satyrs and nymphs in repose, holding ladles. The cauldron comes with a lid and has side handles. It sits on five little clawed feet that keep it from tipping.

If water is poured into the cauldron and stirred for 1 minute, it transforms into a hearty, hot stew, which can provide one nourishing meal for up to four people per gallon. The stew remains hot while in the cauldron, then cools naturally after it is removed. The outside of the cauldron remains safe to touch despite the heat of the stew.
The cauldron can create stew three times. It then ceases to function until the next dawn, when it regains all its uses.

item.name: 重生坩埚
entries: 这只微型小锅的铸铁侧边上刻有英雄群像的浮雕。你可以将这件坩埚作为你德鲁伊法术的法器，且其可以作为{@spell 探知}法术的代替材料。当你完成一次长休时，你可以使用坩埚制造一瓶{@item 良效治疗药水}。药水持续24个小时，若其没有被使用，则它失去魔力。
作为一个动作，你可以让坩埚增大至足以容纳一个中型生物。你可以用一个动作让坩埚恢复其普通大小，并且无害地将任何它无法容纳的东西转出到最近未被占据的位置。
如果你将一个类人生物的尸体放入坩埚之中并将200磅的盐（耗费10金币）覆盖到坩埚之上持续八小时，那么盐会被消耗，而那个生物会在下一个黎明时复活，如同{@spell 唤醒死者}法术。使用后七日之内，坩埚的此项属性无法再次使用。

item.name: 控制气元素香炉
entries: 当薰香在这个香炉中焚烧时，你可以使用一个动作以说出这个香炉的命令语，并如同你施放了{@spell 召唤元素生物}法术一样召唤出一个{@creature 气元素}。这个香炉直到下次日出之前都不能再次被这个方式使用。
这个6寸宽，1尺高的容器看起来就像是一个附有精雕杯盖的酒杯。它的重量为1磅。

item.name: 柄端镶有黑珍珠的珀金仪式匕首
item.ENG_name: Ceremonial electrum dagger with a black pearl in the pommel

item.name: Ceremonial silver dagger with gold pommel and black pearl (Legion of Dusk)
锁链(10尺)
entries: 一条锁链具有10点生命值。通过成功通过一次DC 20的力量检定可以将它给挣断。

item.name: 玉髓
entries: 乳白色的不透光宝石。

item.name: 诈欺师之骰
entries: 每当你骰这颗六面骰时，你都可以控制它的掷骰结果。

item.name: Charm of Plant Command
entries: This fist-sized charm is made from a bundle of dried plant stems wrapped in silver thread. Hung on a leather thong, it is typically worn around the neck or attached to a belt.

This charm has 3 charges. While you bear the charm, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell 植物交谈术} spell. For the duration of the spell, you also have advantage on Charisma checks made to influence the behavior, demeanor, and attitude of plants. The charm regains all expended charges at dawn each day.

entries.items: Each time you expend a charge from this wand, there is a 50 percent chance that nothing happens and the charge is wasted.

item.name: 箱子
entries: 一个箱子可以容纳12立方尺或300磅重的装备。

item.name: Chest of Preserving
entries: Food and other perishable items do not age or decay while inside a Chest of Preserving. The chest is 2½ feet long, 1½ feet wide, and 1 foot tall with a half-barrel lid. The chest has a lock, which can be picked with thieves' tools and a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Smashing the lock or any other part of the chest renders it nonmagical.

item.name: 开门钟琴
entries: 这个中空的金属管约莫1尺长，且重约1磅。你可以用一个动作敲击它，并将它指向一个距离你120尺内且可以被打开的物体，像是门、盖子、或锁。这个钟琴将会发出一声清澈的音调，且除非这个声音无法传到该物体，否则该物体上的一道锁或闩将被打开。若该物体没有其余的锁或闩，则该物体本身将被打开。
这个钟琴可以被使用十次。在第十次使用之后，它将龟裂并变得毫无用处。

item.name: Chronolometer
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Intelligence saving throws. The first time you attune to the chronolometer, you choose one language you don't know. You subsequently know that language while attuned to the device.

entries.name: Time Bandit
entries: At the start of your turn, roll a d6 (no action required). On a 1–3, you slow down time, gaining an additional action on your turn and doubling your speed until the end of the turn. On a 4–6, you go forward in time to warn yourself of what is to come. The next time you fail a saving throw, attack roll, or ability check, you can reroll the check and take either result. Once you use this feature of the chronolometer, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Fate Swap
entries: As a reaction when a creature you can see within 30 feet of you takes damage, that creature gains an additional action if it is the creature's turn, or can take an action immediately even though it isn't the creature's turn. Once you use this feature of the chronolometer, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: 金绿宝石
entries: 黄绿色到淡绿色的透光宝石。

item.name: 绿玉髓
entries: 绿色的不透光宝石。

item.name: 爆裂头饰
entries: 当穿戴这个头饰时，你可以使用一个动作以使用它施放{@spell 灼热射线}法术。当你进行该法术的攻击时，你将以{@hit 5}的攻击加值进行其检定。这个头饰直到下次日出之前都不能再被这个方式使用。

item.name: Circlet of Human Perfection
entries: The Circlet of Human Perfection transforms its attuned wearer into an attractive human of average height and weight. The circlet chooses the physical characteristics of the form, such as age, gender, skin color, hair color, and voice. Except for size, the wearer's statistics and racial traits don't change, nor do items worn or carried by the wearer. Removing the circlet ends the effect.

item.name: 黄水晶
entries: 淡黄褐色的透光宝石。

item.name: 龙爪符文
entries: 这条龙的爪子被一层熔化的银所覆盖，上面刻着飞龙(龙)符文。 爪子具有以下属性。

entries.name: 飞龙杀手
entries: 以一个动作，你可以将爪子指向离你 30 尺内的龙。 龙必须通过 DC 15 体质豁免，或者在你的下一个回合结束前获得对所有伤害类型的易商。 此属性可使用三次。 在下一个黎明，爪子将恢复所有的充能。

entries.name: 飞龙护盾
entries: 当爪子显现在你身上时，你对任何龙的吐息武器有抗性。

entries.name: 飞龙防护
entries: 你可以通过用手指在地上画出飞龙符文符文来转移魔法。 你所指向的地点， 它会变成了一个半径为 100 尺的魔法球形区域的中心。 转移需要 8 小时的工作， 这需要你在爪子 5 尺之内。 最后，爪子被摧毁，该区域获得以下属性:
而在 100 尺半径的范围内，任何龙在豁免检定都有劣势，飞行速度无法超过 10 尺。

item.name: 土巨怪的爪子
entries: 这对沉重的棕色铁护手被锻造成一个{@creature 土巨怪}爪子的形状，且它们会适应其穿戴者的双手，并一路套到手、前臂、甚至到肘部的位置。当穿戴这对爪子时，你获得20尺的掘地速度，且你能够以每轮1尺的速度掘穿坚硬的岩石。
此外，当你穿戴它们时，你可以将这对爪子作为近战武器使用。你熟练于这对爪子，且它们将在命中后造成{@dice 1d8}挥砍伤害（你的力量调整可以如常应用于该攻击检定和伤害骰）。
当你穿戴这对爪子时，你不能操作对象、或施放任何带有姿势构材的法术。

item.name: Cleansing Stone
entries: A cleansing stone is a sphere 1 foot in diameter, engraved with mystic sigils. When touching the stone, you can use an action to activate it and remove dirt and grime from your garments and your person.
Such stones are often embedded in pedestals in public squares in Aundair or in high-end Ghallanda inns.

item.name: 攀爬工具组
entries: 这套工具组包括了一些特殊岩钉、鞋钉、手套、和一个保护带。你能够以一个动作使用攀爬工具组以固定你自己；若你这么做，则你不会从你固定自己的地方摔落超过25尺，且你在解除固定之前也无法从你固定自己的地方攀爬超过25尺。

item.name: 节肢斗篷
entries: 这件精美的服饰是由黑色丝绸制成，交织着银色丝线描绘的花纹。当穿着此斗篷时，你将获得下列好处：

items: 你具有对毒素伤害的抗性。
你具有等同于你步行速度的攀爬速度。
你可以在垂直表面上下移动、或甚至在天花板上下颠倒的移动，而无须使用你的双手。
你不会被任何类型的蛛网给困住，且可以将其视为困难地形而移动穿过蛛网。
你可以使用一个动作以施放{@spell 蛛网术}法术（豁免DC 13）。这个被该法术创造的蛛网将充斥在比原本大两倍的区域。一旦被使用，这个斗篷的此特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 翻腾斗篷
entries: 当穿着此斗篷时，你可以使用一个附赠动作以使它夸张地翻腾。

item.name: 位移斗篷
entries: 你穿着此斗篷时，它将投射出一个幻象，使你看起来像是站在你实际位置的附近，并使任何生物对你所进行的攻击检定承受劣势。若你受到伤害，则这个特性将停止运作直到你的下个回合开始。这个特性将在你陷入{@condition 无力}、{@condition 束缚}或其他使你无法移动的状态时被压抑。

item.name: 精灵斗篷
entries: 当你穿着此斗篷并戴上其兜帽时，任何为了看见你而进行的感知（{@skill 察觉}）检定都将具有劣势，且你在为了躲藏而进行的敏捷（{@skill 隐匿}）检定，将因为此斗篷的颜色改变以将你藏起而具有优势。将兜帽戴上或拉下都需要一个动作。

item.name: 隐形斗篷
entries: 当穿着此斗篷时，你可以将其兜帽拉起罩住你的头以使自己变得{@condition 隐形}。当你处于{@condition 隐形}状态时，任何你所携带或穿戴的事物都将随着你{@condition 隐形}。当你脱下兜帽时，你将变为可见。将兜帽戴上或拉下都需要一个动作。
这件斗篷隐形效果的持续时间上限为2个小时，将你隐形的时间以1分钟为单位从中扣除。在2个小时的使用时间被用尽后，这件斗篷将停止发挥作用。这件斗篷在没被使用的状况下每经过不间断的12小时,就可以恢复1小时的使用时间。

item.name: 万众时尚斗篷
entries: 当穿着此斗篷时，你可以使用一个附赠动作以改变它的造型、颜色、和这件衣装的外观品质。这件斗篷的重量不会改变。无论它的外观如何改变，这件斗篷都只能是一件斗篷。尽管它可以拷贝出其他魔法斗篷的外观，但它无法因此获得它们的魔法特性。

item.name: 防护斗篷
entries: 当你穿着此斗篷时，你在AC和豁免检定中获得+1加值。

item.name: 蝙蝠斗篷
entries: 当穿着此斗篷时，你在敏捷（{@skill 隐匿}）检定中具有优势。在微光光照或黑暗的区域中，你可以用双手抓住斗篷的边缘，并使用它以40尺的速度飞行。若你在用这个方式飞行的期间失手松开斗篷的边缘、或你不再处于微光光照或黑暗的环境中，则你将失去这个飞行速度。
当在微光光照或黑暗的环境中穿着此斗篷时，你可以使用你的动作对你自己施放{@spell 变形术}法术，将你自己转变成一只{@creature 蝙蝠}。当你处于蝙蝠型态时，你保留你的智力、感知、和魅力属性值。这个斗篷直到下次日出之前都无法再次以这个方式被使用。

item.name: 魟鱼斗篷
entries: 当穿着此斗篷并戴上其兜帽时，你可以在水中呼吸，且你将具有60尺的游泳速度。将兜帽戴上或拉下都需要一个动作。

item.name: 发条护符
entries: 这个黄铜护符包含着许多互相咬合的微型齿轮，且被来自机械境，一个可预测发条位面，的魔力所驱动。将耳朵靠在这个护符上的生物可以听见模糊的滴答声和飕飕作响的噪音从内部发出。
当你在穿戴这个护符期间进行一次攻击检定，你可以放弃掷{@dice d20}骰，而改为在该掷骰中取10。一旦被使用，这个特性直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。

item.name: Clockwork Dog
entries: This Tiny clockwork dog made of copper and tin comes with a copper wind-up key. As an action, you can use the key to wind the dog, after which it follows you for 12 hours. At the end of that duration, the clockwork dog stops until wound again. The dog has AC 5, 1 hit point, and a walking speed of 30 feet.

item.name: 修补之衣
entries: 这套典雅的旅行者全套服装可以用魔法修补自己以抵销每日的穿着磨损。这套衣装中被摧毁的部分将无法通过这个方式被修复。

item.name: Clothing, cold weather
entries: This outfit consists of a heavy fur coat or cloak over layers of wool clothing, as well as a fur-lined hat or hood, goggles, and fur-lined leather boots and gloves.
As long as cold weather clothing remains dry, its wearer automatically succeeds on saving throws against the effects of {@hazard extreme cold}.

item.name: 鞋匠工具
additionalEntries: 虽然鞋匠的生意对冒险者来说似乎太卑微了，但一双好鞋子却能在崎岖的荒野和致命的地牢帮上大忙。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 鞋匠的工具包括一把锤子、一支锥子、一柄小刀、一个鞋架、一把切刀、备用皮革和线。

additionalEntries.name: 奥秘、历史
entries: 你对鞋子的知识有助于你识别魔法靴的魔法属性或这些物品的历史。

additionalEntries.name: 调查
entries: 鞋子能透露出的秘密远比你想象的多。你可以通过检查鞋子的磨损和污迹来推断出某人最近到过什么样的地方。你的修鞋经验能让你更好地判断出导致鞋子磨损的原因。

additionalEntries.name: 修鞋
entries: 作为长休的一部分，你可以保养同伴的鞋子。至多六个由你选定的穿着你修补过的鞋子的生物，接下来的24小时内，在需要进行对抗{@condition 力竭}状态的豁免检定前可以旅行至多10小时。

additionalEntries.name: 秘密夹层
entries: 通过8小时的工作，你可以在一双鞋子内做出一个秘密夹层。这个夹层可以容纳一件至多长3寸、宽1寸的物品。你进行一次附带工具熟练加值的智力检定，以确定寻找夹层所需的智力（{@skill 调查}）检定DC值。

additionalEntries.caption: 鞋匠工具
rows: 判断一双鞋子的年龄和来历
找出鞋后跟的秘密夹层

item.name: 缠爪刺青
entries: 该魔法刺青用一根特殊的针制作，绘有错杂盘虬的图案。

entries.name: 刺青同调
entries: 同调此物品时，你需要将针持握，并抵在你想要让刺青出现的那处皮肤上。当同调完成时，针头会化为墨水再变成刺青。若你与刺青的同调结束，刺青会消失，针头会再次出现在你的位置中。

entries.name: 缠握触须
entries: 当刺青在你的皮肤上时，你可以用一个动作让刺青伸缩出一团能够触及一个15尺内你可见生物的墨黑色触须。目标生物需要进行一次DC 14的力量豁免，豁免失败则受到{@damage 3d6}力场伤害并{@condition 被擒}于你。作为一个动作，被擒的生物可以通过DC 14的力量 ({@skill 运动}) 或敏捷 ({@skill 体操}) 检定. 检定以摆脱擒抱。在你使触手停止（无需动作），或生物与你相距15尺以上或你对另一个生物使用此刺青时，擒抱也会结束。

item.name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
entries: This tattoo has long intertwining designs. While the tattoo is on your skin, you can, as an action, cause the tattoo to extrude into inky tendrils, which reach for a creature you can see within 15 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} force damage and be {@condition 被擒} by you. As an action, the creature can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength ({@skill 运动}) or Dexterity ({@skill 体操}) check. The grapple also ends if you halt it (no action required), if the creature is ever more than 15 feet away from you, or if you use this tattoo on a different creature.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Coin of Decisionry
entries: Starting at rank 2, your coin of decisionry becomes a common magic item. When you flip the coin, it always lands with the Acquisitions Incorporated sigil face down, and a message appears on the "tails" face. Roll a {@dice d4} on the following table to determine the message.

rows: Lucrative
Brand Appeal
Indeterminate
Ruinous

entries: The coin has absolutely no divination abilities, and its results when you use it are random. But nobody else knows that. When a creature within 10 feet of you flips the coin (after having had its powerful prognostication powers dutifully explained), you can exert your will to control its operation as a bonus action, choosing the result that appears after it lands as a means of gently coercing the user toward a specific course of action. The creature flipping the coin can detect your manipulation with a successful DC 13 Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check.

entries.name: Better Odds
entries: When you reach rank 3, your coin of decisionry gains a measure of actual divination power and becomes an uncommon magic item. In addition to its normal function, you can use an action to flip the coin of decisionry twice while pondering a specific plan or objective, noting both random results. If you succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill 奥秘}) check, you learn which of the two results is more applicable to the course of action. This property of the coin can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Coin of Delving
entries: This scintillating copper coin sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. If dropped a distance greater than 5 feet, the coin issues a melodious ringing sound when it hits a surface. Any creature that can hear the chime can determine the distance the coin dropped based on the tone.

item.name: 冷冻吸收刺青
entries: {#itemEntry 吸收刺青|TCE}

item.name: Common Glamerweave
entries: Glamerweave is clothing imbued with harmless illusory magic. While wearing the common version of these clothes, you can use a bonus action to create a moving illusory pattern within the cloth.

item.name: 材料包
entries: 材料包是一个小巧、防水的皮革腰包，有着许多隔间，收纳着所有你所需要用于施展法术的材料构材或其他特殊道具。但它并不包括那些有着指定价格（记载于法术叙述中）的构材。

item.name: Concertina
entries: A concertina is a less charming kind of accordion.
In addition to knocking out a killer polka, a creature playing the concertina can use an action to cause an area of mist or water up to 30 feet in diameter and 6 inches deep to freeze solid.
Once used, this feature of the concertina can't be used again until the next dawn.

Any creatures touching the floor must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained by the ice. As an action, a {@condition 束缚} creature can attempt to free itself or another creature within its reach from the ice, doing so with a successful DC 20 Strength ({@skill 运动}) check. A character freed from the ice is no longer restrained by it. The ice melts in an hour.

item.name: Conch of Safe Rest
entries: You can use an action to blow this pearlescent conch like a horn, creating an effect identical with that of a {@spell 李欧蒙小屋} spell. The conch disappears once the spell takes effect. The effect ends if you leave the spell's area.

item.name: 传送海螺
entries: 这是一个普通，但是相当大的海螺壳 ，上面镌刻着尤瓦(风暴)符文。 海螺有 2½ 尺长，重达 20 磅。
以一个动作，你可以通过向外壳吹气来施展 {@spell 传送术} 。 目标是固定的， 并且没有发生事故或法术偏离目标的机会。 任何通过海螺传送的人都将出现在该物品的创造者刻上尤瓦(风暴)符文时所指定的特定位置。 它不允许传送到任何其他目的地。 一旦它的法术被释放，海螺就不能再使用，直到第二天黎明。

item.name: 厨师工具
additionalEntries: 冒险可是个辛苦活儿。如果能和一位厨师一起旅行，你的伙食可比整天啃饼干嚼果脯好多了。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 厨师工具包括一个金属锅、餐刀、餐叉、一柄搅拌勺，和一柄长柄勺。

additionalEntries.name: 历史
entries: 你对厨艺的了解允许你品味从餐饮习惯中透露出来的社会模式。

additionalEntries.name: 医药
entries: 进行治疗时，你可以改善药物的口感，使其不那么难以下咽。

additionalEntries.name: 生存
entries: 寻找食物时，你可以把他人认为不能吃的玩意儿处理成可食用的东西。（去掉头就可以吃了，嘎嘣脆，鸡肉味，蛋白质是牛肉的6倍！）

additionalEntries.name: 准备饭菜
entries: 作为短休的一部分，你可以准备一顿美味的饭菜，帮助同伴恢复体力。在短休时，你和至多五个你所选择的生物每消耗一枚生命骰就可以多恢复1点生命值，只要你有机会使用你的厨师工具并且食材充足。

additionalEntries.caption: 厨师工具
rows: 做一顿同样的饭
稍微改善伙食
检验饭菜中的毒素或杂质
做一顿美食

item.name: 铜币(cp)
entries: 一般的货币会有数个不同的币值单位在市面上流通，且其面额会根据铸造它们所使用的金属的相对价值来决定。三种最常见的货币是金币(gp)、银币(sp)、和铜币(cp)。
一枚金币，可以让一个角色购买一个腰包、50尺的优质绳索、或一头山羊。一名纯熟（但并不杰出）的工匠每天可以赚取一枚金币。尽管金币本身并不常被直接使用，但黄金仍然是衡量财富的标准单位。当商人们商谈着的交易涉及价值千百金币的货物或服务，其交易本身通常不会涉及货币的交换。更确切的说，金币只是衡量价值的标准，而实际交易中使用的则是金条、信用状、或其他值钱的商���。
一枚金币值十枚银币，银币是普通人之间最盛行的货币。一枚银币可以雇佣一名劳动者工作一整天、购买一扁瓶的灯油、或是在简陋旅馆的一夜休眠。
一枚银币值十枚铜币，铜币则常见于劳动者和乞丐之间。一枚铜币能买一根蜡烛、一支火炬、或是一支粉笔。
除此之外，使用其他贵重金属铸造的罕见货币有时也会出现在宝藏中。珀金币(ep)和铂金币(pp)源自于衰落帝国和失落的王国，且当它们被用于交易时也偶尔会引起猜忌与怀疑。一枚珀金币价值五枚银币，而一枚铂金币则价值十枚金币。
一枚标准货币的重量约为三分之一盎司，所以五十枚货币重约一磅。

item.name: 赤铜龙鳞甲
entries: 龙鳞甲是以某一种龙族的鳞片所制成的护甲。有时候龙族会收集自己褪下的鳞片并将它们送给类人生物。其他时候，则是由猎人们小心地剥取并保存死去龙族的鳞片。无论如何，龙鳞甲都具有相当高的价值。当穿着这个护甲时，你的AC获得+1加值，你在对抗龙族的骇人威仪和喷吐武器的豁免检定中具有优势，且你获得对强酸伤害的抗性。
此外，你能够以一个动作专注于你的感官，以用魔法辨别出距离你30里内最近的赤铜龙所在的距离和方位。这个特殊动作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Copper stein with silver filigree (Brazen Coalition)
珊瑚
entries: 绯红色的不透光宝石。

item.name: Cracked Driftglobe
entries: This small sphere of thick glass weighs 1 pound. If you are within 60 feet of it, you can speak its command word and cause it to emanate the {@spell light} spell.

item.name: Crampons
entries: A crampon is a metal plate with spikes that is strapped to the sole of a boot. A creature wearing crampons can't fall {@condition 伏地} while moving across {@hazard slippery ice}.

item.name: 拉奥圣杖
entries: 数个世纪以先，沉静之神拉奥创造了一件工具以保护祂那些尚未成熟的信徒们免受下层位面的邪恶侵扰。随着时光飞逝，凡人们已经自己找到了抵抗相关威胁的方法，而圣杖也接近被人遗忘。而在近几世纪，拉奥圣杖重现于世并被用于对抗巫后伊格薇尔伏（法师塔莎的一个别名）。虽然巫后被击败了，但伊格薇尔伏，成功地在战斗中给圣杖造成了伤害，她用一个隐秘的诅咒污染了圣杖——作为在未来战胜圣杖的可能性。而后，圣杖再次失落于世。有时，圣杖会再次现身，但是这件著名的神器已不再是它曾是之物了。无论神器的持有者有没有意识到它全部的威胁，都很少会冒险使用拉奥圣杖——说不定就会是最后一次。

entries.name: 随机属性
entries: 这件神器具有以下随机属性，你可以通过对着{@book 《城主指南》|DMG}中的"神器"章节掷骰以决定它们:

items: 两项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效增益属性|dmg|弱效增益} 属性
一项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效减益属性|dmg|弱效减益} 属性
一项 {@table 神器属性; 强效减益属性|dmg|强效减益} 属性

entries.name: 法术
entries: 圣杖拥有6发充能。当你持握它时，可以用一个动作消耗1发或更多充能施展下列法术（豁免DC 18）： {@spell 生命灵光} (2 充能), {@spell 净化灵光} (2 充能), {@spell 放逐术} (1 充能), {@spell 希望信标} (1 充能), {@spell 群体治疗伤势} (3 充能). 圣杖在每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d6} 发已消耗的充能

entries.name: 绝对放逐
entries: 当你正与圣杖同调且持握着它时，你可以花费10分钟以放逐你一里内除了那些最强大的邪魔以外的任何邪魔。任何挑战等级大于等于19的邪魔不受影响。每个被放逐的邪魔会被送回其家园位面且在100年内无法再次回到拉奥圣杖将其放逐的位面。

entries.name: 堕群本质
entries: 每当使用拉奥圣杖的绝对放逐能力或其最后一发充能被消耗时，骰一次下方的超界逆转表格。任何被此效果召唤而来的生物会出现在你60尺内的随机一处未被占据的位置，且不受你的控制。

entries.name: 伊格薇尔伏的诅咒
entries: 当圣杖最后一次用于对抗伊格薇尔伏时，巫后污染了这件神器的魔法本质。随着时光流逝，这项诅咒在圣杖之中蔓延，用狂暴的侵蚀威胁着圣杖的古老魔法。若伊格薇尔伏的诅咒发生，那么拉奥圣杖，正如它最近被人所知的那样——会被摧毁，它的魔法本质会逆转、爆发为一个直径50尺的传送门。这个传送门视作一道由伊格薇尔伏施展，永久存在的 {@spell 异界之门} 法术。这道异界之门会在随后每一轮的先攻20时，可以听见其用伊格薇尔伏的声音说出一只邪魔的名字，直到每一只被拉奥圣杖放逐的邪魔回归。若那只邪魔仍然存在，那么它就会被从传送门中拖出。这一过程会持续18年，随后，传送门会变为一道永久的通往无底深渊第一层级帕祖尼亚的传送门。

entries.caption: 超界逆转
rows: 打开通往一个随机位面的传送门，传送门会在5分钟内关闭。
出现 {@dice 2d4} 只{@creature 小魔鬼} 和 {@dice 2d4} 只{@creature 夸塞魔}。
出现 {@dice 1d8} 只{@creature 魅魔}/{@creature 梦魔}。
出现 {@dice 1d10} 只{@creature 猬魔}与 {@dice 1d10} 只{@creature 弗洛魔}
出现一只奥登罗斯魔 Arcanaloth，1只{@creature 夜鬼婆}，与1只{@creature 罗刹}。
出现1只{@creature 冰魔}与1只{@creature 六臂蛇魔}。
出现1只{@creature 巴洛炎魔}与1只{@creature 深狱炼魔}。取决于DM的意愿，可以用打开一扇通往某一位大魔鬼或恶魔领主所在的传送门作为替代，传送门会在5分钟内关闭。
伊格薇尔伏的诅咒（见伊格薇尔伏的诅咒特性）。

entries.name: 摧毁或修复圣杖
entries: 拉奥圣杖能够被天堂山上永恒沉静之神拉奥的一滴眼泪修复或摧毁。让无感无欲之神拉奥流下眼泪的方法之一是让拉奥与祂那在很久以前便前往搜寻多元宇宙之天启的，他第一位信徒的精魂重聚。圣杖会在浸透于这位神明的眼泪之中一年又一日后溶解；若其被神泪洗濯30日，圣杖便会失去堕群本质特性。

item.name: 弩矢匣
entries: 这个木制小盒可以容纳最多20支弩矢。

item.name: 撬棍
entries: 在撬棍的杠杆原理可以适用的地方使用撬棍可以让相应的力量检定获得优势。

item.name: Crown of the Forest
entries: While wearing this crown, a character automatically fails any Intelligence ({@skill 调查}) check made to see through an illusion. An illusion that is touched still has its true nature revealed. However, a character wearing a crown has such a strong sense that the illusion is real that they might not know which of their senses to believe.

If this crown is closely examined by a character who succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill 自然}) or Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) check, or with a {@spell 侦测魔法} spell cast using a 3rd-level or higher spell slot, the nature of its magic is discovered.

item.name: 水晶球
entries: 这颗水晶球的直径约莫6寸。当触碰这颗水晶球时，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法术（豁免DC 17）。

item.name: 读心水晶球
entries: 这颗{@i 水晶球}的直径约莫6寸。当触碰这颗水晶球时，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法术（豁免DC 17）。
当你以这颗{@i 水晶球}施放{@spell 探知}期间，你可以使用一个动作以施放{@spell 侦测思想}法术（豁免DC 17），并指定距离该法术感应器30尺内一个你所能看见的生物作为目标。你不需要专注于这个{@spell 侦测思想}以维持其持续时间，但它会在{@spell 探知}法术结束时一并结束。

item.name: 心灵感应水晶球
entries: 这颗{@i 水晶球}的直径约莫6寸。当触碰这颗水晶球时，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法术（豁免DC 17）。

当你以这颗{@i 水晶球}施放{@spell 探知}期间，你可以通过心灵感应与距离该法术感应器30尺内的生物沟通。你也可以使用一个动作，通过该感应器对其中一个这些生物施放{@spell 暗示术}法术（豁免DC 17）。你不需要专注于这个{@spell 暗示术}以维持其持续时间，但它会在{@spell 探知}法术结束时一并结束。一旦被使用，这颗{@i 水晶球}的暗示能力直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 真知水晶球
entries: 这颗{@i 水晶球}的直径约莫6寸。当触碰这颗水晶球时，你可以使用它施放{@spell 探知}法术（豁免DC 17）。
当你以这颗{@i 水晶球}施放{@spell 探知}期间，你具有以该法术感应器为中心120尺范围的真实视觉。

item.name: 凝晶年纪
entries: 这颗蚀刻水晶球有柚子大小，随着内部杂乱的耀斑辐射不断轻声鸣响着。当你触摸水晶球时，你可以以与读写相同的速率往水晶球中储存信息或法术。水晶球在被找到时，包含了以下法术： {@spell 侦测思想}, {@spell 智能壁垒|TCE},* {@spell 拉瑞心灵联结}, {@spell 短讯术}, {@spell 心灵遥控}, {@spell 塔莎心灵鞭|TCE},* 和 {@spell 谭森浮碟术} （带星号的法术出现于本书）。你可以将其作为法术书，其法术与其他文字通过精神编排在水晶之中。
当你持握水晶球时，你可以将其作为你法师法术的法器。如果 {@spell 法师之手}, {@spell 心灵之楔|TCE} （出现于本书）, 和 {@spell 传讯术} 戏法并非你的已知戏法，那么你将它们加入你的已知法术。
水晶具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花费1分钟时间研究水晶球中的信息，你可以消耗1发充能来将你的一道已准备法术替换为书中的另一道法术。
当你施展一道法师法术时，你可以消耗1发充能施展这道法术并无视语言成分、姿势成分和至多100gp的材料成分。

item.name: 力场魔方
entries: 这个魔方的直径约1寸。它的各面都有着独特的标记，且可以被按压。这个魔方起始含有36发充能，且它会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d20}发已消耗的充能。

你可以使用一个动作以按下这个魔方的其中一面，并参照力场魔方各面的表格，根据所选的面消耗对应的充能数。每个面都有着不同的效果。若这个魔方没有足够的充能，则什么事也不会发生。除此之外，一道{@condition 隐形}的力场屏障将会凭空出现，形成一个各边边长15尺的立方体。这个屏障将以你为中心，会随着你移动，且会持续长达1分钟、或直到你使用一个动作按下这个魔方的第六面、或直到这个魔方的充能耗尽。你可以借由按下这个魔方的不同面并消耗所需的充能，以改变这道屏障的效果并重置其持续时间。若你的移动导致这道屏障撞上一个无法穿过立方体力场的固态物体，则你在这道屏障存在的期间，将无法再更移动靠近该物体。

entries.caption: 力场魔方各面
rows: 气体、风、和雾无法穿过这道屏障。
非活体物质无法穿过这道屏障。由你决定墙壁、地板、和天花板是否可以穿过这道屏障。
活体物质无法穿过这道屏障。
法术效果无法穿过这道屏障。
任何事物都无法穿过这道屏障。由你决定墙壁、地板、和天花板是否可以穿过这道屏障。
这道屏障被解除。

entries: 这个魔方会在其屏障被作为特定法术的目标、或接触到特定法术或魔法物品的效果时失去充能，如下表所示。

rows: {@spell 解离术}
{@dice 1d12}
{@item 音爆号角}
{@dice 1d10}
{@spell 穿墙术}
{@dice 1d6}
{@spell 虹光喷射}
{@dice 1d20}
{@spell 火墙术}
{@dice 1d4}

item.name: 界门魔方
entries: 这个魔方的直径为3寸，且散发着明显可见的魔法能量。这个魔方的六个面都各自对应着一个不同的存在位面，其中一个是物质位面，而其他各面所联系的位面则由DM决定。
你可以使用一个动作以按下这个魔方的其中一面，以使用它施放{@spell 异界之门}法术，打开一扇通往该面对应位面的传送门。或者，若你使用一个动作以按下同一面两次，则你可以使用这个魔方施放{@spell 异界传送}法术（豁免DC 17），并将目标传送到该面所对应的位面。
这个魔方含有3发充能。每次使用这个魔方都会消耗1发充能。这个魔方会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d3}发已消耗的充能。

item.name: Cursed Luckstone
entries: This flat, gray-and-black river stone is inscribed with an unknown arcane symbol and feels cool to the touch. While carrying the stone, you can gain advantage on one ability check of your choice. The stone can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This item is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by a remove curse spell or similar magic. As long as you remain cursed, you cannot discard the stone, which immediately teleports back into your pocket or pack. After you use the stone's magic, your next two ability checks are made with disadvantage.

item.name: 戴恩的瞬间要塞
entries: 你可以使用一个动作将这个1寸的金属立方体放置在地面上并说出它的命令语。这个立方体将瞬间长成一座要塞，且它将持续存在直到你使用一个动作说出将它解除的命令语，这个命令语只有在这座要塞内空无一物时才能发挥效果。

这座要塞是一座方形的高塔，各墙面的宽20尺，高30尺，各墙面上都设有箭孔，且顶端设有城垛。它的内部被分隔成二层楼，通过一个沿着其中一面墙往上的楼梯互相连通。这个楼梯向上通往一扇设置在屋顶的活板门。当它被启动时，这座高塔朝向你的墙面上将会出现一扇小门。这扇门只会在你的命令下打开，且你可以使用一个附赠动作说出其命令语。这扇门免疫于{@spell 敲击术}法术和类似魔法效果的影响，例如{@item 开门钟琴}。
在要塞出现时，每个在其区域内的生物都必须进行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，豁免失败将受到{@dice 10d10}钝击伤害，豁免成功则只受到一半的伤害。无论成功与否，该生物都将被推至一处位于要塞外且邻近该要塞的未被占据空间。在该区域内且未被穿戴或携带的物体将自动受到该伤害并被推离。
这座高塔是由精金制成，且它的魔法保护它不被推倒。这座高塔的屋顶、门、和墙壁都各自具有100点生命值，免疫于来自除了攻城武器以外的非魔法武器的伤害，且对所有其它伤害具有抗性。只有{@spell 祈愿术}法术可以修复这座要塞（该法术的这种用法将被视为拷贝一个8环或更低的法术）。每次以这种方式施放{@spell 祈愿术}将会使屋顶、门、或其中一面墙壁回复50点生命值。

item.name: Dagger of Blindsight
entries: This rare magic item requires attunement. A creature attuned to it gains {@sense 盲视} out to a range of 30 feet. The dagger has a saw-toothed edge and a black pearl nested in its pommel.

item.name: Dagger of Guitar Solos
entries: This drow-made dagger is decorated with silver web filigree. It magically plays a fragment of a guitar solo when struck or used to strike a foe.

item.name: 淬毒匕首
entries: 你在使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+1加值。
你可以使用一个动作以使厚重、漆黑的毒液裹住刀刃。这个毒液将持续长达1分钟，或直到一次使用此武器的攻击命中一个生物。该生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的体质豁免，否则受到{@dice 2d10}毒素伤害，并陷入{@condition 中毒}状台长达1分钟。这把匕首直到下次日出之前都不能再次被以此方式使用。

item.name: Dancing Monkey Fruit
entries: This rare magical fruit produces enough juice to fill a vial. Any humanoid that eats a dancing monkey fruit or drinks its juice must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or begin a comic dance that lasts for 1 minute. Humanoids that can't be {@condition 中毒} are immune to this magical effect.

The dancer must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity saving throws, and other creatures have advantage on attack rolls against it. Each time it takes damage, the dancer can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. When the dancing effect ends, the humanoid suffers the {@condition 中毒} condition for 1 hour.

item.name: Danoth's Visor
entries: These mithral-frame goggles with clear diamond lenses were used by the evoker Danoth Oro to spot {@condition 隐形} enemies and scout areas from afar.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the goggles in their dormant state, you can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 60 feet. Additionally, you have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill 调查}) and Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Danoth's Visor reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: You see {@condition 隐形} creatures and objects within 60 feet of you as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane. Ethereal creatures and objects appear ghostly and translucent.

As a bonus action, you can speak a command word and use the goggles to see into and through solid matter. This vision has a radius of 60 feet and lasts for 1 minute. To you, solid objects within that radius appear transparent. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the vision, as does a thin sheet of lead. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

As a bonus action, you can speak a command word to switch the goggles into spyglass mode. While in this mode, creatures and objects viewed through the goggles are magnified to twice their size. Speaking the command word again reverts the goggles to their normal operation.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Danoth's Visor reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: You automatically detect illusions you can see and automatically succeed on saving throws against them. In addition, you see a bright aura around any creature that isn't in its true form.
As an action, you can cast the {@spell 反魔法结界} spell from the visor. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 黑暗碎片护符
entries: 这个护符是由源自你契术师宗主所在国度的一块具恢复力的异位面物质碎片所制作而成。当你穿戴它时，你获得下列好处：

items: 你可以使用这个护符作为你契术师法术的法器。
你可以尝试施放一个你不知道的戏法。这个戏法必须被列在契术师法术列表中，且你必须进行一次DC 10的智力（{@skill 奥秘}）检定。若检定成功，则你成功施放该法术。若检定失败，则该法术也将施放失败，且用于施放该法术的动作也将被浪费。无论成功与否，你直到完成一次长休之前都不能再使用这个特性。

item.name: Dawnbringer
item.reqAttune: by a creature of non-evil alignment
entries: Lost for ages in the Underdark, Dawnbringer appears to be a gilded longsword hilt. While grasping the hilt, you can use a bonus action to make a blade of pure radiance spring from the hilt, or cause the blade to disappear. While the blade exists, this magic longsword has the finesse property. If you are proficient with {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords} or {@item longsword|phb|longswords}, you are proficient with Dawnbringer.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra {@dice 1d8} radiant damage.

The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. While the blade persists, you can use an action to expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet each, to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.
While holding the weapon, you can use an action to touch a creature with the blade and cast {@spell 次级复原术} on that creature. Once used, this ability can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Dawnbringer is a sentient neutral good weapon with an Intelligence of 12, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 14. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 120 feet.
The sword can speak, read, and understand Common, and it can communicate with its wielder telepathically. Its voice is kind and feminine. It knows every language you know while attuned to it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Forged by ancient sun worshippers, Dawnbringer is meant to bring light into darkness and to fight creatures of darkness. It is kind and compassionate to those in need, but fierce and destructive to its enemies.

Long years lost in darkness have made Dawnbringer frightened of both the dark and abandonment. It prefers that its blade always be present and shedding light in areas of darkness, and it strongly resists being parted from its wielder for any length of time.

item.name: 无尽水瓶
entries: 这个被瓶塞塞住的细颈瓶会在摇晃时发出液体晃动的声音，仿佛里头装有水一样。这个水平重2磅。
你可以使用一个动作以拔出其瓶塞并说出三个命令语的其中之一，接着大量的清水或咸水（由你决定）将从这个瓶子中涌出。这些水将在你的下个回合开始时停止涌出。其命令语如下列选项所示：

items: 「溪流」产生1加仑的水。
「泉源」产生5加仑的水。

「喷泉」产生30加仑的水，并喷涌形成一道30尺长，1尺宽的喷泉水柱。当持握这个水瓶时，以一个附赠动作，你可以以这道喷泉水柱瞄准一个距离你30尺内且你所能看见的生物。目标必须成功通过一次DC 13的力量豁免，否则将受到{@dice 1d4}钝击伤害并被击倒{@condition 伏地}。你也可以不瞄准生物，而是选择一个未被穿戴或携带，且重量不超过200磅的物体。该物体将被击倒打翻、或被推离你最多15尺距离。

item.name: 幻象牌组
entries: 这个盒子内装有一套羊皮纸制成的卡牌。一套完整的牌组有34张卡牌。而一个作为宝藏被发现的牌组通常会遗失{@dice 1d20-1}张卡牌。
这套牌组的魔法只会在卡牌被随机抽出时发挥作用（你可以使用一套调整过的扑克牌以仿真这套牌组）。你可以使用一个动作从牌组中随机抽出一张卡牌，并将它丢到距离你30尺内地面上一点。

一个或多个生物的幻象将会从被扔出的该卡牌上成形，且维持其存在直到被解消。一个幻象生物看起来跟真的一模一样，有着相仿的体型，且其行为就如同它是真实的生物一样，但它无法造成任何伤害。当你距离该幻象生物120尺内且可以看见它时，你可以使用一个动作让它用魔法移动到任何距离其卡牌30尺内的地方。由于东西会穿过幻象，与幻象的任何物理性交互都将暴露它是幻象的事实。一个使用它的动作去查看该幻象的生物，可以借由成功通过一次DC 15的智力（{@skill 调查}）检定以辨识出它是幻象。该幻象接着对该生物而言将变得半透明。
这个幻象将持续直到它的卡牌被移除、或是该幻象被解消。当这个幻象结束，其卡牌上的图样将会消失，且该卡牌将无法再被使用。

item.name: 万象无常牌
entries: 通常被发现于盒子或囊袋中，这套牌组包含着数张由象牙或羊皮纸制成的卡牌。这些牌组大部分（75%）只有13张卡牌，但其他则会有22张。
在你抽牌之前，你必须声明你打算抽取几张卡牌，并接着随机抽取（你可以使用一套调整过的扑克牌以仿真这套牌组）。任何在抽出声明张数之后被抽出的卡牌将不会发挥任何效果。除此之外的情况，一旦你从这套牌组中抽出卡牌，它的魔法将立即发挥效果。你在该次声明中抽取每张卡牌之间的间隔不能超过1小时，如果你没能抽出所声明数量的卡牌，则声明张数中剩余数量的卡牌将从牌组中自行飞出，并同时发挥效果。
一旦卡牌被抽出，它将会随之消散。除了愚者和弄臣之外，该卡牌将会重新出现在牌组中，让你有可能再次抽到同样的牌。

entries.name: 关于敌意的问题
entries: 这套万象无常牌中的二张牌将会让角色受到另一个存在的敌视。以烈焰牌来说，这个敌意相当明显。角色将会在许多场合中经历这名魔鬼恶毒的计划。寻找这名邪魔不该是个简单的任务，且冒险者们必须在与魔鬼本体对峙之前，多次击溃魔鬼的盟友和追随者。
而至于盗贼牌，这个敌意则隐藏难辨，且必须来自某个被认为是朋友或盟友的对象。作为地下城主，你应该要等到一个戏剧性的时刻才揭露这股敌意，让冒险者们在此之前瞎猜着究竟谁可能会是背叛者。

rows: 大臣*
在你抽出这张卡牌一年内的任何时候，你可以选择在冥想中询问一个问题，并通过心灵接收到关于该问题的真实答案。除了情报之外，这个答案也会协助你解决一个艰难的问题或其他困境。换句话说，这个回答也伴随着如何实践它的智能。
太阳
你获得50,000经验值，且一件奇物（由DM随机决定）将出现在你的手中。
月亮
你被赋予施放{@dice 1d3}次{@spell 祈愿术}法术的能力。
星星
你的其中一个属性值增加2点。这个属性值可以超过20，但不能超过24。
彗星*
若你单独地击败你下一次遭遇到的敌对怪物或怪物群体，则你将获得刚好足以让你升级的经验值。除此之外的情况，这张卡牌不会发挥任何效果。
命运三女神*
现实的纺线被解开并重新编就，让你得以避开或消除一个事件，就如同它从未发生过。你可以在你抽出这张卡牌的瞬间、或在你死亡前的任何时候使用这张卡牌的魔法。
君王
你获得{@skill 说服}技能的熟练，且你的熟练加值在使用该技能所进行的检定中变为两倍。此外，你获得位于这个世界某处一座小型城堡的所有权。然而，这座城堡现在被怪物们所占领，你必须先清除它们才能声称你拥有这座城堡。
钥匙
一把你所熟练，稀有度为珍稀或更高的魔法武器将出现在你的手中。由DM选择该武器。
骑士
一个4级战士出现在距离你30尺内你所选择的空间，并为你服务。这个战士与你有着相同的种族，相信命运已安排他或她来到你身边，并会忠诚地服侍你直到死亡。由你控制这名角色。
宝石*
二十五颗各自价值2,000金币的珠宝、或五十颗各自价值1,000金币的宝石将出现在你的脚边。
禽爪*
所有你正穿戴或携带的魔法物品被解离成尘。你所拥有的神器并不会被摧毁，但仍会消失。
虚空
这张漆黑的卡牌将带来灾难。你的灵魂被抽离你的身体，并被囚禁在DM所选择的场所中的一个物体内。一个或多个强大的存在将守护着该场所。当你的灵魂被这个方式囚禁期间，你的身体将陷入{@condition 无力}状态。{@spell 祈愿术}法术无法唤回你的灵魂，但该法术可以揭露出囚禁着你灵魂物品的所在场所。抽出此卡后，你就不再抽取其他卡牌。
烈焰
一个强大的魔鬼将成为你的敌人。这个魔鬼渴望着你的堕落并折磨你的人生，希望在尝试杀死你之前享受你的痛苦。这个敌意会持续直到你或者该魔鬼死亡。
头骨

你召唤出一个{@creature 死亡化身|dmg}──一个身着漆黑长袍，手持幽灵镰刀，鬼魅般的类人骷髅。它将出现在距离你10尺内一处DM所选择的空间并攻击你，同时警告其他所有人你必须独自一人在这场战斗中胜出。这个化身将战斗直到你死亡或是它的生命值归零，并会随之消失。若任何人尝试帮助你，则帮助者将会召唤出它自己的{@creature 死亡化身|dmg}。一个被{@creature 死亡化身|dmg}杀死的生物将无法被复活。
傻瓜*
你的智力值将永久降低{@dice 1d4+1}点（最低降至1）。你可以在你声明的抽牌数量之外再额外抽取一张卡牌。
城堡*
你将消失并以静滞状态被禁锢在某个球型异次元空间之中。所有你所穿戴和携带的事物都将留在你消失时所占据的空间。你将维持被囚禁的状态直到你被发现，且被从球体中移出。你无法被任何预言系魔法给定位，但{@spell 祈愿术}法术可以揭示出你被囚禁的场所。抽出此卡后，你就不再抽取其他卡牌。
废墟
你所携带或拥有的任何形式的财富，除了魔法物品之外，都将从你身上遗失。可携带的财产将直接消失。你所拥有的生意、建筑、以及土地将以最小幅度改变现实的方式遗失。任何能证明你拥有某个因为此卡牌而遗失事物的文档也都将消失。
蛇发女妖
这张卡牌上那{@creature 梅杜莎}一般的面容将诅咒你。在受到这个方式诅咒的期间，你在豁免检定中承受-2的罚值。只有神祇或命运三女神卡牌上的魔法可以终止这个诅咒。
盗贼
一个由DM所选择的非玩家角色将对你抱有敌意。直到该NPC或某人揭露其身分之前，你将无法知道你这名新敌人的身分。只有{@spell 祈愿术}法术或神力干预能够终止该NPC对你的敌意。
平衡*
你的心灵经历了剧烈的变化，以至于你的阵营发生改变。守序将变为混乱，善良则变为邪恶，反之亦然。如果你的阵营为绝对中立或无阵营，则这张卡牌对你不会有任何效果。
愚者*
你失去10,000经验值，舍弃这张卡牌，并再从牌组中抽取一张卡牌，将这二次抽牌视作你声明抽牌数量的其中一次。若失去这些经验值将导致你降低一个等级，则你改为失去足以让你刚好维持当前等级的经验值。
弄臣
你获得10,000经验值，或者你可以在你声明的抽牌数量之外再额外抽取二张卡牌。

item.name: Deck of Several Things
entries: Stored in a leather pouch, this unique deck contains twenty-two colored cards made of some strong but unknown metal, each of which features a design printed as a mosaic of raised dots. Before you draw a card, you must declare how many cards you intend to draw and then draw them randomly (you can use an altered deck of playing cards to simulate the deck). Any cards drawn in excess of this number have no effect. Otherwise, as soon as you draw a card from the deck, its magic takes effect. You must draw each card no more than 1 hour after the previous draw. If you fail to draw the chosen number, the remaining number of cards fly from the deck on their own and take effect all at once.
Once a card is drawn, it fades from existence. Unless the card is the Fool or the Jester, the card reappears in the deck, making it possible to draw the same card twice.

entries.name: Balance
entries: Your mind suffers a wrenching alteration, causing your alignment to change for the duration of the adventure. Lawful becomes chaotic, good becomes evil, and vice versa. If you are true neutral or unaligned, this card has no effect on you.

entries.name: Comet
entries: If you single-handedly defeat the next hostile monster or group of monsters you encounter, you have advantage on ability checks made using one skill of your choice for the duration of the adventure. Otherwise, this card has no effect.

entries.name: Donjon
entries: You are instantly teleported to and confined within the prison of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M6). Everything you were wearing and carrying stays behind in the space you occupied when you disappeared. You draw no more cards.

entries.name: Euryale
entries: The card's medusa-like visage curses you. You take a −1 penalty on saving throws for the duration of the adventure.

entries.name: The Fates
entries: Reality's fabric unravels and spins anew, allowing you to avoid or erase one event as if it never happened. You can use the card's magic as soon as you draw the card or at any other point during the adventure.

entries.name: Flames
entries: The Grand Master of the Monastery of the Distressed Body becomes your enemy. The bone devil seeks your ruin, savoring your suffering before attempting to slay you. If the Grand Master has already been defeated, you gain the enmity of Garret Levistusson's patron—a similarly powerful devil.

entries.name: Fool
entries: For the duration of the adventure, you lose proficiency with one skill or gain disadvantage on all checks made with one skill (with the skill and the penalty determined by the DM). Discard this card and draw from the deck again, counting both draws as one of your declared draws.

entries.name: Gem
entries: The 1,000 gp hoard of the leprechaun from the Wilderness Encounters table (see appendix A) appears at your feet. If that treasure has already been claimed, you gain an equivalent hoard.

entries.name: Idiot
entries: Reduce your Intelligence by {@dice 1d4 + 1} (to a minimum score of 1) for the duration of the adventure. You can draw one additional card beyond your declared draws.

entries.name: Jester
entries: You gain proficiency in a skill of your choice for the duration of the adventure, or you can draw two additional cards beyond your declared draws.

entries.name: Key
entries: A common or uncommon magic weapon with which you are proficient, or a {@item spell scroll} featuring a spell of a level you can cast, appears in your hands. The DM chooses the weapon or spell, which you possess for the duration of this adventure.

entries.name: Knight
entries: You gain the service of any of the NPCs in the "{@book Hirelings|phb|5|services}" section not currently with the party, who appears in a space you choose within 30 feet of you. The NPC serves you loyally for the duration of the adventure, believing that the fates have drawn them to you. You control this character.

entries.name: Moon
entries: You are granted the ability to cast any spell of 5th level or lower, and can use that ability {@dice 1d3} times for the duration of the adventure.

entries.name: Rogue
entries: An NPC of the DM's choice becomes secretly hostile toward you. The identity of your new enemy isn't known until the NPC or someone else reveals it. Any enchantment spell cast on the NPC at 6th level or higher can end the NPC's hostility toward you.

entries.name: Ruin
entries: All forms of wealth that you carry or own, other than magic items, are lost to you. This wealth can be recovered either in the treasury of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M10) or Kwalish's lab in Daoine Gloine (area O7), whichever comes later in the adventure.

entries.name: Skull
entries: You summon an avatar of death—a mechanical skeleton (use bone naga statistics) clad in a tattered black robe. It appears in a space of the DM's choice within 10 feet of you and attacks you, warning all others that you must win the battle alone. The avatar fights until you die or it drops to 0 hit points, whereupon it disappears. If anyone tries to help you, the helper summons its own avatar of death. A creature slain by an avatar of death can't be restored to life.

entries.name: Star
entries: Increase one of your ability scores by 1 for the duration of the adventure. The score can exceed 20 but can't exceed 24.

entries.name: Sun
entries: You gain proficiency in the skill of your choice for the duration of the adventure. In addition, a common or uncommon wondrous item appears in your hands. The DM chooses the item, which you possess for the duration of this adventure.

entries.name: Talons
entries: Every magic item you wear or carry is lost to you. These items can be recovered either in the treasury of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M10) or Kwalish's lab in Daoine Gloine (area O7), whichever comes later in the adventure.

entries.name: Throne
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 说服} skill and you double your proficiency bonus on checks made with that skill for the duration of the adventure. In addition, the Monastery of the Distressed Body's brains in jars regard you thereafter as the monastery's rightful master. You must defeat or otherwise clear out the Grand Master and its servants before you can claim the monastery as yours.

entries.name: Vizier
entries: At any one time you choose within the duration of the adventure, you can ask a question in meditation and mentally receive a truthful answer to that question. Besides information, the answer helps you solve a puzzling problem or other dilemma. In other words, the knowledge comes with wisdom on how to apply it.

entries.name: The Void
entries: This black card spells disaster. Your soul is drawn from your body and held within machinery in either the control room of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M8) or Kwalish's lab in Daoine Gloine (area O7), whichever comes later in the adventure. While your soul is trapped in this way, your body is {@condition 无力}. {@spell 预言术}, {@spell 异界探知}, or a similar spell of 4th level or higher reveals the location of the machinery that holds your soul. You draw no more cards.

entries.name: Using the Deck of Several Things
entries: The special nature of this deck (carried by Mary Greymalkin if she is used as an NPC) means that many of its effects operate only within and with respect to this specific adventure. This typically covers any time the characters spend between setting out for the Barrier Peaks and the resolution of whatever events transpire in Kwalish's lab (area O7).

For cards that effectively remove a character from play for a period of time (Donjon and the Void), you can allow a player to take on the role of one of the party's NPC hirelings, or introduce a temporary character as an NPC met during the party's journey. Alternatively, you can decide that only some aspect of the character's will disappears and is imprisoned, leaving the character to operate in a robotic state until freed.

item.name: Dekella, Bident of Thassa
entries: Thassa wields Dekella, a two-pronged weapon gifted to her by Purphoros. When the god of the sea bestows her weapon on a mortal, it's often so they might work her will far from the ocean, right some wrong affecting those she'd prefer not to harm, or give a mortal a glimpse of her terrible responsibilities.

entries.name: Bident of the Deep
entries: Thassa's signature weapon thrums with the icy currents of the deep ocean. This weapon functions as a trident that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using the bident, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d10} cold damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Deep
entries: If you are a worshiper of Thassa, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: You can breathe underwater, and you gain a swimming speed of 60 feet.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The bident has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The bident has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Thassa, the bident has 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property and 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property, both randomly determined.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Command the Deep
entries: The bident holds the power to command the waves and its creatures. As an action, you can change the condition of the sea within 1 mile of you, creating strong winds and heavy rain that cause violent waves (see "Weather at Sea" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide) or calming a storm. In either case, the unnatural weather lasts for 1 hour before returning to normal. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

Additionally, you can cast the {@spell 支配怪物} spell (save DC 18) from the bident, but only on beasts and monstrosities that have an innate swimming speed. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Aquatic Metamorphosis
entries: You can cast the {@spell 完全变形术} spell (save DC 18) from the bident, but you must cast it on a creature to turn it into a kind of creature that has an innate swimming speed. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Bident
entries: To destroy the bident, it must be heated by the breath of an {@creature ancient red dragon} and then, while still hot, immersed in the Tartyx River.

item.name: 恶魔护甲
entries: 当穿着此护甲时，你的AC获得+1加值，且你可以理解并说深渊语。此外，这个护甲的带爪护手将使以你双手进行的徒手打击变为魔法武器，该徒手打击造成挥砍伤害，伤害骰为{@dice 1d8}，且在攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+1加值。

entries.name: 诅咒
entries: 一旦你穿上这个被诅咒的护甲，则你将无法将它脱下，除非你被作为{@spell 移除诅咒}法术或其他类似魔法的目标。当穿着此护甲时，你在对恶魔进行的攻击检定和对抗其法术和特殊能力的豁免检定中具有劣势。

item.name: 伊格薇尔伏恶魔志
entries: 作为一份关于深渊之无限层级及其居民的宏大论文，伊格薇尔伏恶魔志Demonomicon of Iggwilv是多元宇宙中最详细而最为亵渎的关于恶魔学识的记载。这卷书记载了从亘古到现在关于深渊与恶魔的所有渎神之物。恶魔们尝试过删减其中的文本，而虽有的部分被从书本的脊页上撕下，但大部分章节仍存，而且较之前更能揭示恶魔的秘密。这书所含之物已非亵渎二字所能形容。一小片不为人知的，无底深渊本身的碎片被囚禁于字字句句之后，使得无论有多少页被撕下，也能让书时刻保持着更新，这本书也不仅仅只是想要成为一本参考材料。

entries.name: 随机属性
entries: 这件神器具有以下随机属性，你可以通过对着{@book 《城主指南》|DMG}中的"神器"章节掷骰以决定它们:

items: 两项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效增益属性|dmg|弱效增益} 属性
一项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效减益属性|dmg|弱效减益} 属性
一项 {@table 神器属性; 强效减益属性|dmg|强效减益} 属性

entries.name: 法术
entries: 这本书具有8发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d8} 发已消耗的充能。当你持握它时，你可以用一个动作随意施展 {@spell 塔莎狂笑术} 或消耗1发或更多的充能施展以下法术（DC 20）： {@spell 防护法阵} (1 充能), {@spell 魔魂壶} (3 充能), {@spell 异界盟友} (3 充能), {@spell 异界誓缚} (2 充能), {@spell 异界传送} （仅限深渊层级；3发充能）, {@spell 精类召唤术|TCE} (3 充能).

entries.name: Abyssal Reference
entries: 你可以在你每次进行辨认关于 {@i Demonomicon} 的消息的智力检定或关于深渊的感知 ({@skill 生存}) 检定时查阅恶魔志。若如此做，你的检定使用双倍的熟练加值。

entries.name: 鞭笞邪魔
entries: 你的魔法会为邪魔带来痛苦。当你携带书，并为自己所施展的法术对一个邪魔进行伤害掷骰时，直接取满值而无须掷骰。

entries.name: 迷惑
entries: 当你携带着书，每次你施展对邪魔的 {@spell 防护法阵} 或 {@spell 异界誓缚} 时，无论你使用了哪个等级的法术位，都视为以9环施展。此外，邪魔在对抗这些法术的豁免检定上具有劣势。

entries.name: 封印
entries: {@i Demonomicon} 前10页是空白的。持握这本书时，作为一个动作，你可以选择一个你可见且被困在 {@spell 防护法阵}中的邪魔。该邪魔必须以劣势进行一次DC 20的魅力豁免，豁免失败则被困在恶魔志的一张空白页中。并且会附上受困生物广为人知的名字与堕落内容的详细文字。使用后，直到下次黎明前，这项动作不能再次使用。
当你结束了一次长休时，如果你和恶魔志存在于同一位面，则书中所困挑战等级最高的生物可以尝试附身你。你必须进行一次DC 20的魅力豁免。若豁免失败，则你如同一具提线玩偶般被该生物附身。附身你的生物可以用一个动作释放你，并在最近的一处未占据空间出现。若豁免成功，则尝试附身你的邪魔在未来7天内都不能再次尝试附身你。
在这本魔典被发现时，已经有了 {@dice 1d4} 张书页被占据，一般是各种恶魔。

entries.name: 破坏恶魔志
entries: 要摧毁这本书，必须有六位不同的恶魔领主分别撕下书的一页。如果这种情况发生，书页会在24小时内恢复。在这段时间过去之前，任何打开书的人都会被传送到一处隐藏在书中的新生深渊层级。在这致命、的半智能领域中心，有一件遗失许久的神器，弗拉兹-厄鲁之杖。如果法杖被带离这处口袋位面，魔典会立刻变成一本《反序古典Tome of Zyx》普通而老旧的复制品，这本书是创造恶魔志的基底。法杖一旦出现，恶魔领主弗拉兹-厄鲁会立刻知道这件事。

item.name: 毁灭法球(气)
entries: 毁灭法球是一种可以借由在元素节点，以邪恶元素武器施展仪式以制造出来的元素炸弹。被制造的法球类型取决于其制造仪式施展时所在的节点。例如，在气元素节点施展仪式将会制造出一个毁灭法球(气)。这个仪式需要花费1个小时的时间，且需要2,000金币的特殊材料，且这些材料会在仪式过程中被消耗。
毁灭法球的直径12寸，重10磅，外壳坚固。这个球体会在被制造后经过{@dice 1d100}小时后爆炸，并释放出它所蕴含的元素能量。在爆炸之前，这个球体完全不存在任何能够显示它爆炸时间的迹象。但使用像是{@spell 鉴定术}和{@spell 预言术}之类的法术可以用来确定毁灭法球爆炸的时间。毁灭法球具有AC 10，15点生命值，且免疫于毒素和心灵伤害。将其生命值归零会导致毁灭法球立刻爆炸。
毁灭法球可以通过一个特别打造的特殊容器来存放，以防止它爆炸。这个容器必须刻有该毁灭法球相对元素的符文。例如，一个刻有大地符文的盒子可以用来封存一个毁灭法球(气)。当被存放在容器时，球体会发出单调的轻击声。若它在经过本应引爆的时间之后才被从容器中取出，则该毁灭法球将会在{@dice 1d6}轮之后爆炸，除非它在引爆之前再度被放回容器。
无论毁灭法球的类型如何，它的影响范围都会涵盖一个1里半径的球体区域。这个区域的中心即是该法球所在的位置。毁灭法球将在使用后立即被摧毁。

entries.name: 狂风法球
entries: 当这个法球爆炸时，它会产生持续1小时的强大风暴。每当一个生物在暴露于狂风中的情况下结束它的回合时，该生物必须成功通过一次DC 18的体质豁免，否则将因为狂风和碎石的冲击而受到{@dice 1d4}钝击伤害。暴露在狂风之下超过10分钟后，脆弱的树木将被连根拔起，轻型建筑物也会被强风摧毁。除此之外，影响范围内也将适用《地下城主指南》第五章中所介绍的强风规则。

entries.name: 大地法球
entries: 当这个法球爆炸时，它会使该区域受到{@spell 地震术}法术的影响长达1分钟（法术豁免DC 18）。在决定该法术的效果时，将该法术的施放时间视作球体爆炸的回合。

entries.name: 烈焰法球
entries: 当这个法球爆炸时，它会产生一道持续长达24小时的干燥热浪。其影响区域将适用《地下城主指南》第五章中所介绍的极端酷热规则。每经过一个小时，热浪就有10%的几率在影响区域内的随机地点引发野火。这阵野火最初会覆盖10尺平方的区域，且随后每一轮都将再延伸扩大另一片10尺平方的范围，持续直到野火被扑灭或自行燃烧殆尽。当一个生物在一个回合内第一次进入距离野火10尺内的区域，或在该区域内开始它的回合时，该生物将会受到{@dice 3d6}火焰伤害。

item.name: 毁灭法球(水)

entries.name: 暴雨法球
entries: 当这个法球爆炸时，它会产生持续长达24小时的暴雨。其影响区域将适用《地下城主指南》第五章中所介绍的大雨规则。若区域内存在大型水体的话，则它将会在大雨后{@dice 2d10}小时因此泛滥，淹涨超过堤岸10尺高度，并淹没周遭地区。在这之后，泛滥洪水将以每轮100尺的速度，从水体向外吞没陆地，直到它抵达影响区域的边界：当淹没到边界后，水将会向低处流动（并可能因此流回它的源头）。轻型建筑物将被洪水冲垮并带走。任何位于洪水淹没路径上，且体型为大型或更小的生物都将被一并冲走。洪水会毁坏庄稼，且根据当地的地形甚至可能引发土石流。

entries.items: If you attune to this staff, you transform into a goat-humanoid hybrid over the course of 3 days. Tieflings are immune to this curse. Throughout the first day, shaggy fur begins to grow all over your body. After 24 hours, your eyes become goat-like, and stumpy horns sprout from your brow. On the last day, your fingers and toes meld into double digits, and the horns grow to full length. This transformation doesn't prevent you from wielding weapons or casting spells. {@spell 移除诅咒}, {@spell 高等复原术}, or any other effect that ends a curse restores your original appearance, but only a {@spell 祈愿术} spell can rid the staff of its power to transform those who attune to it.

item.name: 奉献香炉
entries: 这把链枷的圆形头部开有一些小孔，成徽记或图纹状排列。你可以将这把链枷视为圣徽。当你使用这把链枷进行攻击命中时，目标受到额外 {@damage 1d8} 光耀伤害。
作为一个附赠动作，你可以说出命令语并使链枷散发出半径10尺的微弱熏香云，持续1分钟。在你的每个回合开始时，你和其他在熏香中的生物恢复 {@dice 1d4} 生命值。直到下次黎明前，此属性都不能再使用。

item.name: 钻石
entries: 蓝白色、鲜黄色、粉红色、棕色、或蓝色的透光宝石。

item.name: Dimensional Loop
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Strength saving throws, and you have {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense 黑暗视觉}, its range increases by 30 feet.

entries.name: Dimensional Cloak
entries: As a bonus action, you send your body out of phase with the material world for 1 minute, granting you advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks made to hide, and imposing disadvantage on attack rolls against you. Once you use this feature of the dimensional loop, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Fold Space
entries: Choose a space you can see within 60 feet of you (no action required). You treat that space as if it were within 5 feet of you until the end of your turn. This allows you to move immediately to that space without provoking opportunity attacks, or to interact with objects or creatures in that space as though they were next to you (including allowing you to make melee attacks into that space). Once you use this feature of the dimensional loop, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: 次元镣铐
entries: 你可以使用一个动作以将这对镣铐铐住一个陷入{@condition 无力}的生物。这对镣铐会自行调整以适应一个体型在小型至大型范围的生物的尺寸。除了寻常镣铐的功能外，这对镣铐可以防止被其束缚的生物使用任何异次元移动手段，包括传送或异位面旅行。然而它们无法阻止生物穿过连接异次元位面的传送门。
你和任何你在使用这对镣铐时所指定的生物可以使用一个动作将其移除。每30天一次，被铐住的生物可以进行一次DC 30的力量（{@skill 运动}）检定。若检定成功，则该生物从中逃脱并摧毁这对镣铐。

item.name: Dimir Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Dimir, allows you to cast {@spell 易容术}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Dimir's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Dimir Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Dimir guild
entries: This keyrune, carved from black stone accented with steel, resembles a stylized horror. On command, it transforms into an {@creature intellect devourer} that resembles the Dimir guild symbol, with six bladelike legs. The creature exists for up to 24 hours. During that time, it pursues only a single mission you give it—usually an assignment to take over someone's body, either to impersonate that person for a brief time or to extract secrets from their mind. When the mission is complete, the creature returns to you, reports its success, and reverts to its keyrune form.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature intellect devourer}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 闪避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 大使套装
entries: 内含：

2个{@item 地图或卷轴筒|phb}
