item.name: 易容工具
entries: 这个囊袋里的化妆品、染发剂、以及小道具让你能够做出改变你外在面容的伪装。熟练于这套工具组能让你将你的熟练加值加到任何你在为了创造视觉易容时所进行的属性检定中。
additionalEntries: 对于伪装者来说，易容工具是必不可少的，它可以让使用者轻易地改头换面。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 易容工具包括化妆品、染发剂、小道具，以及几套衣服。

additionalEntries.name: 欺瞒
entries: 在某些情况下，一副伪装可以提高你撒谎的能力。

additionalEntries.name: 恐吓
entries: 合适的伪装会让你看起来更可怕，不管你是想假扮成瘟疫患者来吓跑路人或是装成暴徒以恐吓一帮恶棍。

additionalEntries.name: 表演
entries: 巧妙的化妆可以提升观众的体验，前提是化妆要设计得当，能够唤起想要的反应。

additionalEntries.name: 说服
entries: 人们往往会信任穿制服的人。如果你伪装成一个权威人物，你与他人的交涉会更有说服力。

additionalEntries.name: 易容
entries: 你可以在长休中制造一套伪装物品。完成后你可以花费1分钟时间来变装。为了避免过度的关注，你一次只能携带一套伪装，除非你有一个背包或类似的方法来隐藏它们。每套伪装重1磅。
在其他时候，需要10分钟来制作一套适当修改外观的的伪装，而大幅改变外观则需要30分钟。

additionalEntries.caption: 易容工具
rows: 遮盖伤疤或特征性标记
识破他人的伪装
易容成另一个类人生物

item.name: Dispelling Stone
entries: This smooth, rainbow-colored, egg-shaped stone can be thrown up to 30 feet and explodes in a 10-foot-radius sphere of magical energy on impact, destroying the stone. Any active spell of 5th level or lower in the sphere ends.

item.name: Docent
entries: A docent is a small metal sphere, about 2 inches across, studded with dragonshards. To attune to a docent, you must embed the item somewhere on your body, such as your chest or your eye socket.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: A docent is a sentient item of any alignment with an Intelligence of 16, a Wisdom of 14, and a Charisma of 14. It perceives the world through your senses. It communicates telepathically with you and can speak, read, and understand any language it knows (see "Random Properties" below).

entries.name: Life Support
entries: Whenever you end your turn with 0 hit points, the docent can make a Wisdom ({@skill 医疗}) check with a +6 bonus. If this check succeeds, the docent stabilizes you.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: A docent has the following properties:

{@b Languages}. The docent knows Common, Giant, and {@dice 1d4} additional languages chosen by the DM. If a docent knows fewer than six languages, it can learn a new language after it hears or reads the language through your senses.
{@b Skills}. The docent has a +7 bonus to one of the following skills (roll a {@dice d4}): (1) {@skill 奥秘}, (2) {@skill 历史}, (3) {@skill 调查}, or (4) {@skill 自然}.

{@b Spells}. The docent knows one of the following spells and can cast it at will, requiring no components (roll a {@dice d6}): (1–2) {@spell 侦测善恶} or (3–6) {@spell 侦测魔法}. The docent decides when to cast the spell.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A docent is designed to advise and assist the warforged it's attached to. One of the simple functions of a docent is to serve as a translator. The docent's properties are under its control, and if you have a bad relationship with your docent, it might refuse to assist you.

item.name: Documancy Satchel
entries: At rank 2, your documancy satchel becomes a common magic item, allowing you to magically send and receive documents to and from Head Office through a special pouch. Your documancy satchel magically produces prewritten and signature-ready contracts at your request, covering most common contractual needs. It also occasionally produces sticky notes printed with useful information and inspirational quotes from Head Office.

entries.name: Satchel of Holding
entries: At rank 3, your documancy satchel gains additional features and becomes an uncommon magic item. One of the satchel's pouches now functions as a {@item bag of holding}.

Additionally, you can use an action to draw forth from the documancy satchel a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell 通晓语言}. The scroll vanishes when used, or ten minutes after it appears. This property of the bag can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Scroll Humidor
entries: At rank 4, your documancy satchel gains additional power and becomes a rare magic item. Within the satchel, a dedicated extradimensional space can hold up to thirty documents or {@item spell scroll||spell scrolls}. Placing a single document into the scroll humidor is an action. Drawing forth a desired scroll is a bonus action.

item.name: Dodecahedron of Doom
entries: This twelve-sided metal die is 12 inches across and bears the numbers 1 through 12 engraved on its pentagonal sides. The dodecahedron contains arcane clockwork mechanisms that whir and click whenever the die is cast.

The dodecahedron can be hurled up to 60 feet as an action. A random magical effect occurs when the die comes to rest after rolling across the ground for at least 10 feet. If an effect requires a target and no eligible target is within range, nothing happens. Spells cast by the dodecahedron require no components. Roll a {@dice d12} and consult the following table to determine the effect:

rows: The dodecahedron explodes and is destroyed. Each creature within 20 feet of the exploding die must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@dice 9d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 光亮术} on itself. The effect lasts until a creature touches the die.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 冷冻射线} (+5 to hit), targeting a random creature within 60 feet of it that doesn't have total cover against the attack.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 电爪} (+5 to hit) on the next creature that touches it.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell 黑暗术} on itself. The effect has a duration of 10 minutes.
The next creature to touch the dodecahedron gains {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points that last for 1 hour.

item.name: Dogsled
entries: An empty sled costs 20 gp, weighs 300 pounds, and has room at the back for one driver.

item.name: Draakhorn
entries: The Draakhorn was a gift from {@creature Tiamat|RoT} in the war between dragons and giants. It was once the horn of her {@creature ancient red dragon} consort, Ephelomon, that she gave to dragonkind to help them in their war against the giants. The Draakhorn is a signaling device, and it is so large that it requires two Medium creatures (or one Large or larger) to hold it while a third creature sounds it, making the earth resonate to its call. The horn has been blasted with fire into a dark ebony hue and is wrapped in bands of bronze with draconic runes that glow with purple eldritch fire.

The low, moaning drone of the Draakhorn discomfits normal animals within a few miles, and it alerts all dragons within two thousand miles to rise and be wary, for great danger is at hand. Coded blasts were once used to signal specific messages. Knowledge of those codes has been lost to the ages.

Those with knowledge of the Draakhorn's history know that it was first built to signal danger to chromatic dragons—a purpose the Cult of the Dragon has corrupted to call chromatic dragons to the Well of Dragons from across the North.

Within 50 feet of any enclosed space where the horn is blown, the air begins to shimmer from the sound. Any character within 20 feet of the entry to the enclosed space must succeed on a DC 12 Strength check to continue pushing against the pressure of the sound. A failure indicates the character can advance no farther toward the entry.

For any character entering the enclosed space, the sound fades to silence—because any creature that enters the enclosed space is temporarily {@condition 耳聋} and must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. Success indicates the deafness ends 2 minutes after the Draakhorn ceases to sound. Failure indicates the character remains {@condition 耳聋} for 1 hour after the Draakhorn ceases to sound.

While the horn is sounding, a creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw the first time on a turn the creature enters a 150-foot cone in front of the horn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 ({@dice 6d8}) thunder damage and is knocked {@condition 伏地}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition 伏地}.

item.name: Draconic Longsword
entries: This longsword has a dragon-shaped hilt. While you carry it, you gain the ability to speak and understand the Draconic language.

item.name: Dragon
entries: Gold coin, half again as large as a {@item nib|wdh} (1 dragon = 100 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Dragon Sensing Longsword
entries: This +1 longsword is made of dragon bone and with a dragon-leather grip. It has rubies in its pommel and hilt. The sword grows warm and the rubies glow slightly when the sword is within 120 feet of a dragon.

item.name: Dragon Thighbone Club
entries: This red dragon's thighbone is 14 feet long, 250 lbs, and is wrapped in old leather, suggesting that it was once used as a giant's greatclub.
When you hit a creature of the dragon type with this weapon, it deals an extra {@dice 2d8} bludgeoning damage.
If you attune to the greatclub, it magically shrinks to a size that you can wield effectively.

item.name: Dragon's Blood
entries: Introduced into Sharn by Daask, dragon's blood is a potent and highly addictive stimulant. In addition to inducing euphoria, it can enhance spellcasting ability or even temporarily imbue a user with the ability to cast sorcerer spells. The drug's effects are potentially dangerous and always unpredictable. This isn't something a player character should want to use; adventurers are more likely to interfere with Daask smugglers or deal with an addict who accidentally casts a {@spell 火球术} in a crowded street. The specific effects of dragon's blood are up to you, but you can take inspiration from the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}.

item.name: 龙棋套组
entries: （译注：由加里·吉盖克斯在是1985年推出的西洋棋变体规则，参见{@link 龙棋|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragonchess}。）

item.name: Dragongleam
entries: This spear is enchanted with 10 charges of a {@spell 昼明术} spell for use in twilight or dark forest underbrush. The command phrase is "Tiamat's eyes shine," written in Draconic runes on the spear's crossguard.

item.name: Dragonguard
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

This +1 breastplate has a gold dragon motif worked into its design. Created for a human hero of Neverwinter named Tergon, it grants its wearer advantage on saving throws against the breath weapons of creatures that have the dragon type.

item.name: Dragonstaff of Ahghairon
entries: While holding the dragonstaff of Ahghairon, you have advantage on saving throws against the spells and breath weapons of dragons, as well as the breath weapons of other creatures of the dragon type (such as dragon turtles).

A creature of the dragon type that you touch with the staff can move through the city of Waterdeep, ignoring Ahghairon's dragonward (see "Ahghairon's Dragonward," in the Introduction). This effect lasts until the creature is touched again by the staff or until a time you proclaim when you confer the benefit.

The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell 命令术} spell. If you target a dragon with this casting, the dragon has disadvantage on its saving throw. The staff regains {@dice 1d10} charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Dragontooth Dagger
entries: A dagger fashioned from the tooth of a dragon. While the blade is obviously a fang or predator's tooth, the handle is leather wrapped around the root of the tooth, and there is no crossguard.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. On a hit with this weapon, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} acid damage.

entries.name: Draconic Potency
entries: Against enemies of the Cult of the Dragon, the dagger's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to 2, and the extra acid damage increases to {@dice 2d6}.

item.name: 可怖头盔
entries: 这个令人害怕的钢铁头盔会让你在穿戴它时使你的双眼发出红光。

item.name: Dreamlily
entries: A psychoactive liquid that smells and tastes like your favorite beverage, essence of dreamlily is a Sarlonan opiate. First imported to help manage pain during the Last War, it's now the most commonly abused substance in Sharn. Though dreamlily isn't illegal if used for medicinal purposes, it's heavily taxed, and thus most dreamlily is smuggled in and sold on the black market. Dreamlily dens can be found across the lower wards. Consuming dreamlily causes disorienting euphoria and brings about remarkable resistance to pain. A creature under the effects of dreamlily is {@condition 中毒} for 1 hour. While {@condition 中毒} in this way, the creature is immune to fear, and the first time it drops to 0 hit points without being killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead. A dose of dreamlily costs around 1 gp, or up to ten times that if purchased through legal channels. There are many varieties of the drug, however, and the duration or the price might vary accordingly.

item.name: 漂浮光球
entries: 这个厚玻璃制成的小型球体的重量为1磅。若你距离它60尺内，你可以说出它的命令语并使它发挥出{@spell 光亮术}或{@spell 昼明术}法术。一旦被使用，{@spell 昼明术}的效果直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。
你能够以一个动作说出另一个命令语，使这个发光球体飞到空中，并漂浮在距离地面不超过5尺的位置。这个球体将以这个方式浮空直到你或另一个生物将它抓住。若你移动离开浮空球体超过60尺的距离，它将跟随你移动直到它处于距离你60尺内的位置。它将沿着最短路径以跟随你移动。若它的移动遭到妨碍，则它将缓缓落到地面并停止活动，且它的光芒将熄灭。

item.name: 卓尔毒药
entries: 这种毒药通常只由{@creature 卓尔}精灵制作，且只能在远离阳光的场所制作而成。受害于这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 13的体质豁免，否则陷入{@condition 中毒}状态长达1小时。若此豁免检定的结果与目标值差距5点或更多，则目标在{@condition 中毒}的同时也将陷入{@condition 昏迷}状态。该生物将在它受到伤害，或另一个生物使用一个动作将它摇醒时清醒。

item.name: 水溺
entries: 这是一把钢制三叉戟，在它柄的上部装饰有青铜藤壶，柄的末端有一颗海绿色的宝石和一个银色的贝壳。如果它掉到水面上，它会浮在水面上而非沉下去；如果它被留在水下，它会悬浮在原地。三叉戟的触感总是冰凉的，且它不会因为暴露在水中而受到任何伤害。水溺内部蕴含着{@creature Olhydra|pota|奥莉德拉}——邪恶的水元素女亲王——的碎片。
你在使用这把武器进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+1加值。当你用它造成伤害时，目标将会额外受到{@dice 1d8}冷冻伤害。

entries.name: 水元素掌控
entries: 当你持握水溺时，你获得以下好处：

items: 你能流利地说水族语。
你对冷冻伤害具有抗性。
你可以对{@creature 水元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}(DC 17)。一旦你这么做，水溺的这个能力直到下次日出前都无法再被使用。

entries.name: 无尽痛苦之泪
entries: 当位于一个水元素节点内时，你可以施展一个名为「无尽痛苦之泪」的仪式，使用水溺来创建一个{@item 毁灭法球(水)|PotA}。一旦你运行了这个仪式，水溺直到下次日出前都不能再被用于施展这个仪式。

entries.name: 缺陷
entries: 水溺会使其持用者变得贪婪。当你与该武器同调时，你获得以下缺陷：「我要求且理应得到最大份额的战利品，我拒绝放弃任何属于我的东西」。此外，如果你与水溺同调并持续了24小时以上，你的皮肤上将会长出藤壶。这些藤壶可以借由{@spell 高等复原术}法术或类似的魔法移除，但无法在你与该武器同调的状态下被移除。

item.name: 地城探险家套装
entries: 内含：

items: 一个{@item 背包|phb}
一根{@item 撬棍|phb}
一把{@item 铁锤|phb}
10根{@item 岩钉|phb}
10支{@item 火炬|phb}
一个{@item 打火匣|phb}
10天份的{@item 口粮(1天份)|phb|口粮}
一个{@item 水袋|phb}
{@item 麻绳(50尺)|phb|50尺的麻绳}

item.name: 两面花言
entries: 这本书对你来说是一本魔法法术书。对其他人而言，这本书看起来只是一本冗长的浪漫小说。作为一个动作，你可以改变书籍的外观和其中的浪漫故事。
这本书在被找到时，包含了以下法术：{@spell 幻景}, {@spell 强效幻影}, {@spell 镜影术}, {@spell 假象术}, {@spell 涅斯图魔法灵光}, {@spell 魅影之力}, 和 {@spell 无声幻影}。你可以将其作为法术书。
当你持握这本书时，你可以将其作为你法师法术的法器。
书具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花费1分钟时间研究这本书，你可以消耗1发充能来将你的一道已准备法术替换为书中的另一道法术。新法术必须是幻术学派的法术。
当一个你可见的生物进行一次智力 ({@skill 调查}) 检定来看穿你所施展幻术系法术的本质，或对你施展的一道幻术系法术进行豁免时，你可以用一个反应并消耗1发充能使其在这次检定中具有劣势。

item.name: Duskcrusher
entries: This item takes the form of a leather-wrapped metal rod emblazoned with the symbol of Pelor, the Dawn Father. While grasping the rod, you can use a bonus action to cause a warhammer head of crackling radiance to spring into existence. The warhammer's radiant head emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. You can use an action to make the radiant head disappear.

While the radiant head is active, you gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, and attacks with the weapon deal radiant damage instead of bludgeoning damage. An undead creature hit by the weapon takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.

While you are holding Duskcrusher and its radiant head is active, you can use an action to cast the {@spell 烈日光束} spell (save DC 15) from the weapon, and this action can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Dust of Deliciousness
entries: This reddish brown dust can be sprinkled over any edible substance to greatly improve the flavor. The dust also dulls the eater's senses: anyone eating food treated with this dust has disadvantage on Wisdom ability checks and Wisdom saving throws for 1 hour. There is enough dust to flavor six servings.

item.name: 无踪尘
entries: 被装于袋中，这些粉末是由非常细致的沙尘所组成。其分量仅足够一次使用。当你使用一个动作将这些粉尘洒向空中，你和每个距离你10尺内的生物和物体都将变得{@condition 隐形}长达{@dice 2d4}分钟。其持续时间对所有受影响的目标而言都是相同的，且这些粉尘将在它的魔法发挥效果时被消耗。若一个被这些粉尘影响的生物进行攻击或施放法术，则该生物的隐形效果将会随之终止。

item.name: 干燥尘
entries: 这个小袋中装有{@dice 1d6+4}搓粉尘。你可以使用一个动作将一搓这些粉尘洒到水面上。这些粉尘将会使15尺边长立方体的水体转变成一颗弹珠大小的珠子，并漂浮或停留在粉尘被洒下的位置附近。这个珠子的重量可以忽略不计。
某个生物可以使用一个动作将这颗珠子砸向一片坚硬表面，使这颗珠子粉碎并释放出这些粉尘所吸收的水份。这么做将会结束这颗珠子的魔法。
一个身体大部分由水组成的元素生物在暴露于一搓这些粉尘时，必须进行一次DC 13的体质豁免，豁免失败将受到{@dice 10d6}黯蚀伤害，豁免成功则只受到一半的伤害。

item.name: 喷嚏窒息尘
entries: 被装于小型容器中，这些粉末是由非常细致的沙尘所组成。它看起来就像是{@item 无踪尘}，且一个{@spell 鉴定术}法术也会显示这样的结果。其分量仅足够一次使用。
当你使用一个动作将一把这些粉尘洒向空中，你和每个距离你30尺内且需要呼吸的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15的体质豁免，否则将因为不停打喷嚏而无法呼吸。一个被这种方式影响的生物将陷入{@condition 无力}状态并窒息。只要它还意识清醒，该生物就可以在它的每个回合结束时重复进行这个豁免检定，豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。{@spell 次级复原术}法术也可以结束这个效果对一个生物的影响。

item.name: Dust of the Mummy
entries: This poison is created during a mummy's embalming process, distilled from the dead creature's removed organs. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed creature can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the creature's hit point maximum to 0, the creature dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell 移除诅咒} spell or similar magic.

item.name: 矮人板甲
entries: 当穿着此护甲时，你的AC获得+2加值。此外，若一个效果将在违背你的意愿的情况下使你沿着地面移动，则你可以使用你的反应以减少你被移动的距离最多10尺。

item.name: 矮人飞锤
entries: 你在使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+3加值。它具有投掷属性，正常射程为20尺，且最大射程为60尺。当你使用这把武器并以一次远程攻击命中时，它将造成额外的{@dice 1d8}伤害，或者若目标为一个巨人，则造成额外的{@dice 2d8}伤害。紧接在该攻击之后，这把武器将会飞回你的手中。

item.name: 炸药(一根)
entries: 以一个动作，一个生物可以点燃一根炸药并将它投掷到最多60尺远的一点。每个距离该点5尺内的生物都必须进行一次DC 12的敏捷豁免，豁免失败将受到{@dice 3d6}钝击伤害，豁免成功则只受到一半的伤害。
角色可以将好几根炸药捆在一起以让它们在同时爆炸。每根额外的炸药都会使伤害增加{@damage 1d6}点（最多至{@damage 10d6}），并使爆炸半径增加5尺（最远至20尺）。
炸药可以通过使用更长的导火线以在一段时间之后引爆，通常延迟1到6轮。为该炸药骰先攻。在设置的轮数经过之后，该炸药会在其先攻顺序爆炸。

item.name: Dyrrn's Tentacle Whip
entries: This long, whip-like strand of tough muscle bears a sharp stinger at one end. To attune to this symbiotic weapon, you wrap the whip around your wrist for the entire attunement period, during which time the whip painfully embeds its tendrils into your arm.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic whip, but attack rolls made against aberrations with this weapon have disadvantage. A creature hit by this weapon takes an extra {@dice 1d6} psychic damage. When you roll a 20 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll with this weapon, the target is {@condition 震慑} until the end of its next turn.
As a bonus action, you can sheathe the whip by causing it to retract into your arm, or draw the whip out of your arm again.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The whip can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the whip ends, and it detaches from you.

item.name: Eagle Whistle
entries: While you blow an eagle whistle continuously, you can fly twice as fast as your walking speed. You can blow the whistle continuously for a number of rounds equal to 5 + five times your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 round) or until you talk, hold your breath, or start suffocating. A use of the whistle also ends if you land. If you are aloft when you stop blowing the whistle, you fall. The whistle has three uses. It regains expended uses daily at dawn.

item.name: 助听耳角
entries: 当将这个号角举在你的耳边，它将会抑制{@condition 耳聋}状态对你的影响，让你得以如常听见声音。

item.name: Earworm
entries: To attune to this symbiont, you must hold it against the skin behind your ear for the entire attunement period, whereupon it burrows into your head and bonds to your skull. While the earworm is inside you, you can speak, read, and write Deep Speech.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The earworm has 4 charges. You can cast the following spells from it, expending the necessary number of charges (spell save DC 15): {@spell 侦测思想} (2 charges) or {@spell 噪音暗语} (1 charge). Each time you use the earworm to cast the {@spell 侦测思想} spell, it sends the information gleaned to the nearest daelkyr, or to the next nearest earworm until it reaches a daelkyr.
The earworm regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The earworm can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the earworm ends, and it exits your body.

item.name: 火巨灵囚瓶
entries: 这个彩绘的黄铜瓶子重1磅。当你使用一个动作以拔除其瓶塞时，一团浓烟将从瓶子中流出。在你的回合结束时，这阵浓烟将随着一阵无害火焰的闪现而消失，且一个{@creature 火巨灵(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨灵}将出现在距离你30尺内的一处未被占据空间。
当这个瓶子第一次被打开时，DM将掷骰随机决定发生什么事。

rows: 该{@creature 火巨灵(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨灵}将攻击你。在进行5轮的战斗之后，{@creature 火巨灵(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨灵}将会消失，且这个瓶子将失去它的魔力。

该{@creature 火巨灵(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨灵}将服侍你长达1小时，依照你的命令行事。接着该{@creature 火巨灵(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨灵}将会返回这个瓶子，且一个新的瓶塞将把它再次封印。这个瓶塞在24小时内都无法被拔除。在这之后二次，当这个瓶子被打开时，将会发生同样的效果。若这个瓶子被打开第四次，该{@creature 火巨灵(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨灵}将逃脱并消失，且这个瓶子将失去它的魔力。
该{@creature 火巨灵(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨灵}可以为你施放三次{@spell 祈愿术}法术。它会在1小时之后，或当它为你实现最后一个愿望时消失，且这个瓶子接着将失去它的魔力。

item.name: 火巨灵链甲
entries: 当穿着此护甲时，你的AC获得+3加值，你免疫于火焰伤害，且你可以理解并说原初语。此外，你可以站立并行走于熔岩上，如同其为固态地表一样。

item.name: Elder Cartographer's Glossography
entries: When you attain rank 4, you gain a small tome that is an uncommon magic item. The elder cartographer's glossography grants advantage on Intelligence or Wisdom checks related to geographical features or locations.

item.name: 魔能爪刺青
entries: 这个绘有爪型或其他锯齿型图案的刺青需要用一根特殊的针制作。

entries.name: 刺青同调
entries: 同调此物品时，你需要将针持握，并抵在你想要让刺青出现的那处皮肤上。当同调完成时，针头会化为墨水再变成刺青。若你与刺青的同调结束，刺青会消失，针头会再次出现在你的位置中。

entries.name: 魔法打击
entries: 只要该刺青在你的皮肤上，攻击对非魔法攻击具有抗性或免疫的目标时，你的徒手打击视为魔法攻击，并且你以徒手打击发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得+1加值。

entries.name: 魔能巨锤
entries: 作为一个附赠动作，你可以增强刺青1分钟。持续时间内，你每次以武器或徒手打击发动近战攻击时，墨水触须会朝着对方喷射而去，使你可以触及距离你最远15尺的目标。此外，你的近战攻击命中时会造成额外 {@damage 1d6} 力场伤害。使用后，直到下次黎明前，此附赠动作不能再次使用。

item.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
entries: This tattoo depicts clawlike forms and other jagged shapes. While the tattoo is on your skin, your unarmed strikes are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with unarmed strikes.

entries.name: Eldritch Maul
entries: As a bonus action, you can empower the tattoo for 1 minute. For the duration, each of your melee weapon attacks can reach a target up to 30 feet away from you, as tendrils of ink launch from your weapon or unarmed strike toward the target. In addition, your melee weapon attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage on a hit. Once used, this bonus action can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: 珀金币(ep)
entries: 一般的货币会有数个不同的币值单位在市面上流通，且其面额会根据铸造它们所使用的金属的相对价值来决定。三种最常见的货币是金币(gp)、银币(sp)、和铜币(cp)。
一枚金币，可以让一个角色购买一个腰包、50尺的优质绳索、或一头山羊。一名纯熟（但并不杰出）的工匠每天可以赚取一枚金币。尽管金币本身并不常被直接使用，但黄金仍然是衡量财富的标准单位。当商人们商谈着的交易涉及价值千百金币的货物或服务，其交易本身通常不会涉及货币的交换。更确切的说，金币只是衡量价值的标准，而实际交易中使用的则是金条、信用状、或其他值钱的商品。
一枚金币值十枚银币，银币是普通人之间最盛行的货币。一枚银币可以雇佣一名劳动者工作一整天、购买一扁瓶的灯油、或是在简陋旅馆的一夜休眠。
一枚银币值十枚铜币，铜币则常见于劳动者和乞丐之间。一枚铜币能买一根蜡烛、一支火炬、或是一支粉笔。
除此之外，使用其他贵重金属铸造的罕见货币有时也会出现在宝藏中。珀金币(ep)和铂金币(pp)源自于衰落帝国和失落的王国，且当它们被用于交易时也偶尔会引起猜忌与怀疑。一枚珀金币价值五枚银币，而一枚铂金币则价值十枚金币。
一枚标准货币的重量约为三分之一盎司，所以五十枚货币重约一磅。

item.name: 元素精粹碎晶
entries: 这块碎裂的水晶含有着一个元素位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。
骰一个{@dice d4}并根据元素精粹碎晶表格来决定碎晶的精粹类型和属性。当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以应用该属性。

土

item.name: 元素精粹碎晶（气）
entries: 这块碎裂的水晶含有着一个元素位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 你可以立即飞行最多60尺的距离，并且不会引发借机攻击。

item.name: 元素精粹碎晶（土）
entries: 这块碎裂的水晶含有着一个元素位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 你获得对于你选择的一种伤害类型的抗性，直到你的下个回合开始。

item.name: 元素精粹碎晶（火）
entries: 这块碎裂的水晶含有着一个元素位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 你所看见的法术的一个目标着了火。燃烧中的目标在它的下个回合开始时，受到{@damage 2d10}火焰伤害，然后火焰熄灭。

item.name: 元素精粹碎晶（水）
entries: 这块碎裂的水晶含有着一个元素位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 你创造一道从你自身迸发出的一道10尺半径的水波。每个该区域内的你所选择的生物受到{@damage 2d6}冷冻伤害，并且必须成功通过一次对抗你施法豁免DC的力量豁免，否则被推离你10尺并且被击{@condition 伏地}。

item.name: 元素宝石，蓝宝石
entries: 这颗宝石含有微量的元素能量。当你使用一个动作将这颗宝石打破时，一个{@creature 气元素}将被召唤，就如同你施放了{@spell 召唤元素生物}法术一样，且这颗宝石中的魔法将随之消散。

item.name: 元素宝石，翡翠
entries: 这颗宝石含有微量的元素能量。当你使用一个动作将这颗宝石打破时，一个{@creature 水元素}将被召唤，就如同你施放了{@spell 召唤元素生物}法术一样，且这颗宝石中的魔法将随之消散。

item.name: 元素宝石，红刚玉
entries: 这颗宝石含有微量的元素能量。当你使用一个动作将这颗宝石打破时，一个{@creature 火元素}将被召唤，就如同你施放了{@spell 召唤元素生物}法术一样，且这颗宝石中的魔法将随之消散。

item.name: 元素宝石，黄钻石
entries: 这颗宝石含有微量的元素能量。当你使用一个动作将这颗宝石打破时，一个{@creature 土元素}将被召唤，就如同你施放了{@spell 召唤元素生物}法术一样，且这颗宝石中的魔法将随之消散。

item.name: 健康灵药
entries: 当你饮用这瓶药水时，它将治愈任何折磨你的疾病，并移除{@condition 目盲}、{@condition 耳聋}、{@condition 麻痹}、和{@condition 中毒}状态。这瓶清澈的红色液体中有着发光的微小气泡。

item.name: 精灵链甲
entries: 你在穿着此护甲时AC获得+1加值。即使你不熟练于中甲，你仍被视作熟练于这个护甲。

rows: A small notebook that causes anything written in it to disappear after 1 hour
A crystal lens made of ivory and gold that causes anything observed through it to appear to be surrounded by motes of multicolored light
A small golden pyramid inscribed with elven symbols and about the size of a walnut
A cloak pin made from enamel in the shape of a butterfly; when you take the pin off, it turns into a real butterfly, and returns when you are ready to put your cloak back on again
A golden compass that points toward the nearest portal to the Feywild within 10 miles
A small silver spinning top that, when spun, endlessly spins until interrupted
A small songbird made of enamel, gold wire, and precious stone; uttering the songbird's name in Elvish causes the trinket to emit that bird's birdsong
A small enamel flower that, when put in one's hair, animates, tying back the wearer's hair with a living vine with flowers; plucking a single flower from this vine returns it to its inanimate form

item.ENG_name: Embroidered silk and velvet mantle set with numerous moonstones

item.name: 绿宝石
entries: 深翠绿色的透光宝石。

entries.items: One card in this deck is enchanted to appear as whatever specific card its owner commands. This magic works only 25 percent of the time, but the deck is worth 500 gp to any serious gambler who doesn't mind the risk—or who isn't told about it.

item.name: 不朽法术书
entries: 这本法术书，以及任何被写在其书页上的内容，都不会因为火焰或浸泡于水中而被伤害。此外，这本法术书不会随着时间而磨损衰败。

item.name: 表演家套装

items: 一个{@item 背包|phb}
一个{@item 睡袋|phb}
2套{@item 戏服|phb}
5根{@item 蜡烛|phb}
5天份的{@item 口粮(1天份)|phb|口粮}
一个{@item 水袋|phb}
一套{@item 易容工具|phb}

item.name: Ephixis, Bow of Nylea
entries: Nylea wields the shortbow Ephixis, the bow whose arrows herald the turning of the seasons. Nylea is quick to let her favored followers borrow her bow, particularly when they intend to use it to perform great deeds, put an end to foul creatures, or cast down the arrogant.

entries.name: Bow of the Wild
entries: This divine weapon includes a shortbow and a quiver with four arrows, each tied to one of the four seasons. You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this bow, and you suffer no disadvantage when attacking at the weapon's long range. Additionally, Ephixis scores a critical hit on a {@dice d20} roll of 19 or 20.

entries.name: Blessing of the Wild
entries: If you are a worshiper of Nylea, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Nylea, the bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Arrows of the Seasons
entries: The four arrows—each associated with a season—that accompany this bow can be fired only from it. Each arrow disappears immediately after it's used, and it reappears in the quiver at the next dusk. The save DC against spells cast with the arrows is 18. Each arrow has a unique property:

entries.name: Spring
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow, targeting a beast or a plant creature you can see within 320 feet of you. On a hit, the arrow deals no damage, and the target gains the benefits of the {@spell 启蒙术} spell for 8 hours.

entries.name: Summer
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow at an unoccupied space on the ground that you can see within 320 feet of you, no attack roll required. A Nyxborn lynx is summoned in that space (use the stat block for a {@creature tiger} with the {@book Nyxborn traits|MOT|6|Nyxborn Creatures} from chapter 6). The lynx understands your verbal commands and obeys them as best it can, and it takes its turns immediately after yours. The emissary remains for 1 hour before fading away.

entries.name: Autumn
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow at a space on the ground that you can see within 320 feet of you, no attack roll required, casting the {@spell 棘墙术} spell there.

entries.name: Winter
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow at a space that you can see within 320 feet of you, no attack roll required, casting the {@spell 冰风暴} spell there.

entries.name: Destroying the Bow
entries: The bow can't be destroyed without first destroying all its arrows. The winter arrow must be fed to a cerberus on the winter solstice. The spring arrow must be planted at the base of a Black Oak of Asphodel on the spring equinox. The summer arrow must be broken by a sea giant on the summer solstice. Then the autumn arrow must be shot into the carcass of a hydra on the autumnal equinox. When all four arrows are destroyed, the bow and quiver dissolve into dust.

item.name: 人造义眼
entries: 这个人造眼球可以代替一颗失去或被移除的真正的眼球。当人造义眼镶嵌在你的眼眶中，它就不会被除了你以外的人给移除，且你可以通过这个微型球体看见事物，就如同它是正常的眼睛一样。

item.name: 乙太香精
entries: 受害于这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的体质豁免，否则陷入{@condition 中毒}状态长达8小时。陷入{@condition 中毒}状态的生物同时也将陷入{@condition 昏迷}状态。该生物将在它受到伤害，或另一个生物使用一个动作将它摇醒时清醒。

item.name: Everbright Lantern
entries: This bullseye lantern contains an Eberron dragonshard that sheds light comparable to that produced by a {@spell 不灭明焰} spell. An everbright lantern sheds light in a 120-foot cone; the closest 60 feet is bright light, and the farthest 60 feet is dim light.

item.name: 无尽烟壶
entries: 烟雾会从这个黄铜瓶被铅制瓶塞堵住瓶口渗出，且其重量为1磅。当你使用一个动作拔除该瓶塞时，一团厚重的烟雾云团将从中涌出，并蔓延至瓶子周围60尺半径的范围。这团烟雾笼罩的范围被重度遮蔽。当这个瓶子在烟雾中且保持打开，则每过1分钟，烟雾的半径就会再增加10尺，直至其达到最大120尺半径。
只要这个瓶子保持打开，这团烟雾就会持续存在。关上这个瓶子需要你以一个动作说出它的命令语。一旦这个瓶子被关上，这团烟雾将在10分钟之后消失。一阵和风（时速11到20里）可以在1分钟之后将这团烟雾吹散，而一阵强风（时速21里或更高）可以在1轮后将其吹散。

item.name: 异种鞍座
entries: 异种鞍座是骑乘任何水生或飞行坐骑的必要品。

item.name: Explosive Seed
entries: This acorn-sized sphere of brass contains a small amount of blasting powder and a clockwork trigger. An explosive seed can be thrown up to 30 feet as an action, detonating on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding seed must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: 眼状玛瑙
entries: 灰色、白色、棕色、蓝色、或绿色的半透明圆形宝石。

item.name: Eye of Vecna
entries: Seldom is the name of Vecna spoken except in a hushed voice. Vecna was, in his time, one of the mightiest of all wizards. Through dark magic and conquest, he forged a terrible empire. For all his power, Vecna couldn't escape his own mortality. He began to fear death and take steps to prevent his end from ever coming about.

{@creature Orcus|MTF}, the demon prince of undeath, taught Vecna a ritual that would allow him to live on as a {@creature lich}. Beyond death, he became the greatest of all liches. Even though his body gradually withered and decayed, Vecna continued to expand his evil dominion. So formidable and hideous was his temper that his subjects feared to speak his name. He was the Whispered One, the Master of the Spider Throne, the Undying King, and the Lord of the Rotted Tower.

Some say that Vecna's lieutenant Kas coveted the Spider Throne for himself, or that the sword his lord made for him seduced him into rebellion. Whatever the reason, Kas brought the Undying King's rule to an end in a terrible battle that left Vecna's tower a heap of ash. Of Vecna, all that remained were one hand and one eye, grisly artifacts that still seek to work the Whispered One's will in the world.

The Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} might be found together or separately. The eye looks like a bloodshot organ torn free from the socket. The hand is a mummified and shriveled left extremity.

To attune to the eye, you must gouge out your own eye and press the artifact into the empty socket. The eye grafts itself to your head and remains there until you die. Once in place, the eye transforms into a golden eye with a slit for a pupil, much like that of a cat. If the eye is ever removed, you die.

To attune to the hand, you must lop off your left hand at the wrist and the press the artifact against the stump. The hand grafts itself to your arm and becomes a functioning appendage. If the hand is ever removed, you die.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} each have the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Properties of the Eye
entries: Your alignment changes to neutral evil, and you gain the following benefits:

items: You have {@sense 真实视觉}.
You can use an action to see as if you were wearing a {@item ring of X-ray vision}. You can end this effect as a bonus action.

The eye has 8 charges. You can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 锐眼术} (2 charges), {@spell 疯狂冠冕} (1 charge), {@spell 解离术} (4 charges), {@spell 支配怪物} (5 charges), or {@spell 摄心目光} (4 charges). The eye regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. Each time you cast a spell from the eye, there is a {@chance 5} chance that Vecna tears your soul from your body, devours it, and then takes control of the body like a puppet. If that happens, you become an NPC under the DM's control.

entries.name: Properties of the Eye and Hand
entries: If you are attuned to both the hand and eye, you gain the following additional benefits:

items: You are immune to disease and poison.
Using the eye's X-ray vision never causes you to suffer {@condition 力竭}.
You experience premonitions of danger and, unless you are {@condition 无力}, can't be surprised.
If you start your turn with at least 1 hit point, you regain {@dice 1d10} hit points.

If a creature has a skeleton, you can attempt to turn its bones to jelly with a touch of the {@item Hand of Vecna}. You can do so by using an action to make a melee attack against a creature you can reach, using your choice of your melee attack bonus for weapons or spells. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.
You can use an action to cast {@spell 祈愿术}. This property can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

entries.name: Destroying the Eye and Hand
entries: If the Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} are both attached to the same creature, and that creature is slain by the {@item Sword of Kas}, both the eye and the hand burst into flame, turn to ash, and are destroyed forever. Any other attempt to destroy the eye or hand seems to work, but the artifact reappears in one of Vecna's many hidden vaults, where it waits to be rediscovered.

item.name: 镶有蓝宝石和月长石的单边眼罩
item.ENG_name: Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone

item.name: Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone (Brazen Coalition)
魅惑镜片
entries: 这对水晶镜片适合被穿戴在眼睛上。它们含有3发充能。当穿戴它们时，只要你与一个距离你30尺内的类人生物可以看见彼此，你就能够以一个动作消耗1发充能以对该目标施放{@spell 魅惑人类}法术（豁免DC 13）。这对镜片会在每天日出时恢复所有以消耗的充能。

item.name: 微视镜片
entries: 这对水晶镜片适合被穿戴在眼睛上。当穿戴它们时，你可以更清晰地看见1尺范围内的事物。在这个范围内，当你在搜索区域或研究一个物体时，你将在依赖于视觉的智力（{@skill 调查}）检定中具有优势。

item.name: 鹰眼镜片
entries: 这对水晶镜片适合被穿戴在眼睛上。当穿戴它们时，你在依赖于视觉的感知（{@skill 察觉}）检定中具有优势。在有着清晰视野的情况下，你可以分辨出位于极远距离，最小2尺宽的生物和物体的细节。

item.name: Failed Experiment Wand
entries: This wand has 2 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast either a green-flamed {@spell 火球术} or a blue {@spell 闪电束} at random from it (save DC 15).
For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Falkir's Helm of Pigheadedness
entries: This steel helm is shaped like the head of a boar. Once you don the helm, it can't be removed until you die or until a {@spell 移除诅咒} spell or similar magic is cast on it. If you wear the helm and are a humanoid, you gain the following flaw until the helm is removed: "I'm exceedingly stubborn and think I'm right all the time." (This flaw supersedes any conflicting flaw.)

item.name: Fane-Eater
item.reqAttune: by an evil cleric or paladin
entries: Fane-Eater is a battleaxe belonging to {@creature Arkhan the Cruel|BGDIA}.

You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls with Fane-Eater. If you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra {@dice 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage taken.

item.name: Far Gear
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Charisma saving throws, and you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill 威吓}) checks.

entries.name: Aberrant Ally
entries: You can conjure an aberrant creature from the chaos of the multiverse to serve you. This functions as the {@spell 召唤天界生物} spell (no concentration required), except the creature you summon is an aberration of challenge rating 4 or lower. Once you use this feature of the far gear, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Unnatural Bane
entries: You can cast the {@spell 灾祸术} spell (save DC 15), which affects any number of creatures within range for 1 minute. Once you use this feature of the far gear, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: 遥远国度碎晶
entries: 这块蠕动着的水晶充斥着来自遥远国度的扭曲精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以召唤一条黏滑的触手撕裂现实的织物，并对你30尺内可见的一个生物进行打击。该生物必须进行一次魅力豁免检定对抗你的法术豁免DC，豁免失败则受到 {@damage 3d6} 心灵伤害并对你 {@condition 恐惧}，直到你的下个回合开始。

item.name: Feather of Diatryma Summoning
entries: This bright plume is made from the feather of a {@creature diatryma|wdh} (pronounced dee-ah-TRY-mah), a Large, colorful, flightless bird native to the Underdark. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the feather into a Large unoccupied space on the ground within 5 feet of you, the feather becomes a living diatryma for up to 6 hours, after which it reverts to its feather form. It reverts to feather form early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching the bird.
When the diatryma reverts to feather form, the magic of the feather can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

The diatryma uses the statistics of an {@creature axe beak}, except that its beak deals piercing damage instead of slashing damage. The creature is friendly to you and your companions, and it can be used as a mount. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the diatryma defends itself but takes no other actions.

item.name: Feather Token
entries: This small metal disk is inscribed with the image of a feather. When you fall at least 20 feet while the token is on your person, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling. The token's magic is expended after you land, whereupon the disk becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Feathered mantle with emerald clasp (Sun Empire)
妖精荒野碎晶
entries: 这块温暖的水晶闪烁着妖精荒野天空的暮色,并带有着唤醒情感记忆的低语。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用
当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以骰一次 {@book 《玩家手册》|PHB}中的 {@table 狂野魔法浪涌|PHB}，如果结果是一道法术，则其因为过于狂野而不会受到你的超魔法效应影响，若其一般需要专注，则其不需要专注；该法术维持完整的持续时间。
如果你没有狂野魔法术法起源，则在投掷狂野魔法浪涌表格后，直到下次黎明前，不能再次使用该属性。

item.name: 异能塑像，青铜狮鹫
entries: 异能塑像为一尊小到刚好可以塞进口袋的野兽雕像。若你使用一个动作说出它的命令语，并将塑像丢到距离你60尺内地面上的一点，该塑像将会变成一只活生生的生物。若该生物将要出现的空间已经被其他生物或物体给占据，或者若该空间不足以容纳该生物，则这个塑像将不会变成生物。
该生物对你和你的同伴友善。它将理解你的语言并服从你所说的命令。若你不对它们交代任何指令，则它们将在面对敌对生物时自我防卫，除此之外不采取其他动作。
该生物存在的持续时间根据塑像类型而有所不同。在其持续时间结束时，该生物将变回它的塑像型态。它会在生命值归零、或你在触碰它的同时使用一个动作再次说出它的命令语时提前恢复塑像型态。当该生物重新变回塑像时，它的这个特性直到特定时间经过之前都不能再被使用。其重置时间根据塑像类型而有所不同。
{@creature 狮鹫|mm|青铜狮鹫}.
这尊青铜雕像呈现出一只张牙舞爪的狮鹫。它可以变成一个{@creature 狮鹫}最多长达6小时，且它直到经过5天之前都不能再被使用。

{@creature 骑用马|mm|象牙旅行山羊}.
{@creature 巨山羊|mm|象牙苦力山羊}.
{@creature 巨山羊|mm|象牙惊骇山羊}.
这几尊山羊外型的象牙雕像总是三个一组被制造。这些山羊各自都有着独特的外观和不同的功能。它们的特性如下所述：

items: 旅行山羊可以变成一个大型的山羊，使用与{@creature 骑用马}相同的数据。它含有24发充能，且它处于野兽型态时每经过小时或不足一小时都将消耗1发充能。只要它还含有充能·你就可以随意的使用它。当它的充能被耗尽，它将变回一尊雕像且直到经过7天，它恢复它所有的充能之前都不能再被使用。
苦力山羊可以变成一个{@creature 巨山羊}最多长达3小时。一旦被使用，则它直到经过30天之前都不能再被使用。

惊骇山羊可以变成一个{@creature 巨山羊}最多长达3小时。这个山羊不能攻击，但你可以移除它的羊角并将它们作为武器使用。其中一根羊角将变成一把{@item 骑枪+1}，而另一根将变成一把{@item 长剑+2}。将一根羊角移除需要花费一个动作，且当这个山羊回复其塑像型态时，该武器将会消失且山羊角将恢复原状。此外，当你骑乘牠时，这个山羊将散发出30尺半径的恐惧灵光。任何与你敌对，且在该区域中开始它回合的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15的感知豁免，否则将因该山羊而陷入{@condition 恐惧}长达1分钟，或直到该山羊回复其塑像型态。陷入{@condition 恐惧}的生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复进行这个豁免检定，若豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。一旦它成功对抗这个效果，该生物将免疫于这个山羊的恐惧灵光长达24小时。一旦这尊雕像被使用，则它直到经过15天之前都不能再被使用。
