item.name: 铁锅
entries: 一个铁锅可以容纳1加仑的液体。

item.name: 铁牙
entries: 这把{@item 战镐|phb}是用一整块铁锻造而成，其尖牙状的头部刻有古代符文。尽管这把战镐在被持握时显得沉重，但当持用者愤怒地挥舞它时，却几乎不会感觉到它的重量。该武器免疫任何形式的锈蚀、强酸或腐蚀——似乎没有任何东西能在它上面留下痕迹。铁牙内部蕴含着邪恶土元素亲王{@creature Ogrémoch|pota|欧格莫克}的碎片。
你在使用这把武器进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+2加值。当你用它造成伤害时，目标将会额外受到{@dice 1d8}雷鸣伤害。

entries.name: 土元素掌控
entries: 当你持握铁牙时，你获得以下好处：

items: 你可以流利地说土族语。
你对强酸伤害具有抗性。
你获得60尺范围的震颤感知。在你周围60尺的范围内，你可以感觉到贵金属和宝石的存在，但无法掌握它们的确切位置。
你可以对{@creature 土元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}(DC 17)。一旦你这么做，铁牙的这个能力直到下次日出前都无法再被使用。

entries.name: 粉碎
entries: 铁牙含有3发充能。你可以使用一个动作并消耗1发充能，以施放2环的{@spell 粉碎音波}(DC 17)。铁牙会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d3}发已消耗的充能。

entries.name: 穿云裂石之音
entries: 当位于一个土元素节点内时，你可以施展一个名为「穿云裂石之音」的仪式，使用铁牙制造一个{@item 毁灭法球(土)|PotA}。一旦你施展了这个仪式，铁牙直到下次日出前都不能再被用于施展这个仪式。

entries.name: 缺陷
entries: 铁牙放大了持用者的破坏冲动。当你与该武器同调时，你获得以下缺陷：「我喜欢破坏东西，并造成毁灭。」

item.name: Ivana's Whisper
entries: This poison bears a distinct scent and chemical message from Ivana Boritsi. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or experience the effects of a {@spell dream} spell created by Ivana the next time they sleep. This poison is nonmagical, and Ivana doesn't directly communicate with those affected during the dream. Rather, she creates the illusion of speaking with her intended target by alchemically crafting her message, predicting her target's reactions, and chemically encoding in her responses. She wears this poison as a perfume or hides it within gift bouquets, allowing it to convey her message later.

item.name: Izzet Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Izzet, allows you to cast {@spell chaos bolt|XGE}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Izzet's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Izzet Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Izzet guild
entries: Formed of carved and polished red and blue stone, the keyrune includes bits of cable and wire. One end resembles a humanlike head, suggesting the jagged elemental form of the {@creature galvanice weird|GGR} that it can become for a duration of 3 hours. In this form, it will serve you as a bodyguard, lift and carry things for you, act as a test subject for your experiments, or aid you in any other way that its capabilities allow.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature galvanice weird|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 闪避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 红锆石
entries: 焰橘色的透光宝石。

item.name: 翡翠
entries: 浅绿色、深绿色、或白色的透光宝石。

item.name: 翡翠棋盘和纯金棋子
item.ENG_name: Jade game board with solid gold playing pieces

item.name: Jade Serpent Staff
entries: This staff is broken into five pieces, each worth 100 gp for the jade alone. The entire staff can be restored with {@spell 修复术} cantrips; each casting of the spell repairs one break in the staff. If the staff is made whole, it transforms from an object into an animated jade serpent that has the statistics of a {@creature giant poisonous snake}, with these changes:

items: The serpent is a construct that understands and obeys whoever was holding the staff when it transformed.
It has immunity to poison damage and the {@condition 中毒} condition. It doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

When it drops to 0 hit points, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1, the snake turns to dust and is destroyed. On any other roll, it changes back into a staff and breaks into {@dice 1d4 + 1} pieces that must be magically mended before the staff can be used again.

item.name: Jade totem with diamond eyes (River Heralds)

entries.items: Imprinted on this staff is a fragment of a dead wizard's personality. The first character who touches the staff gains the following flaw: "I crave power above all else, and will do anything to obtain more of it." This flaw trumps any conflicting personality trait.

item.name: 碧玉
entries: 蓝色、黑色、或棕色的不透光宝石。

item.name: Javelin of Backbiting
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you throw it, its normal and long ranges both increase by 30 feet, and it deals one extra die of damage on a hit. After you throw it and it hits or misses, it flies back to your hand immediately.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell 移除诅咒} or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon, keeping it within reach at all times. In addition, you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

Whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll using this weapon, the weapon bends or flies to hit you in the back. Make a new attack roll with advantage against your own AC. If the result is a hit, you take damage as if you had attacked yourself with the javelin.

item.name: 闪电标枪
entries: 这个标枪是一把魔法武器。当你将它投出并说出它的命令语，它将转变成一道闪电，并覆盖一块5尺宽，从你向距离120尺内一个目标延伸的直线范围。除了你和目标以外，每个在直线范围内的生物都必须进行一次DC 13的敏捷豁免，豁免失败将受到{@dice 4d6}闪电伤害，成功则只受到一半的伤害。这道闪电束将在到达目标时变回标枪。对该目标进行一次远程武器攻击。若命中，该目标将受到来自标枪的伤害加上{@dice 4d6}闪电伤害。
这把标枪的特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用，但这把标枪仍可已被作为魔法武器使用。

item.name: 煤玉
entries: 深黑色的不透光宝石。

item.name: 珠宝匠工具
additionalEntries: 珠宝匠工具的培训包括加工珠宝的基本技术，以及鉴定宝石的专业知识。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 珠宝匠工具包括一把小锯、小锤、锉刀、钳子，和镊子。

additionalEntries.name: 奥秘
entries: 珠宝匠工具熟练项让你能够了解各种宝石的魔法用途。这一能力在你对宝石或镶嵌宝石的物品进行{@skill 奥秘}检定时很有用处。

additionalEntries.name: 调查
entries: 当你检查珠宝类物件时，珠宝匠工具熟练项有助于你发现可能存在的线索。

additionalEntries.name: 鉴定宝石
entries: 你能很快鉴定出宝石的种类和价值。

additionalEntries.caption: 珠宝匠工具
rows: 宝石外观加工
鉴定宝石历史

item.name: 壶
entries: 一个壶可以容纳1加仑的液体。

item.name: Junky +1 Dagger
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this dagger, which looks like junk. When it is used, its grip frays, its blade chips, and it flakes rust. If you get a natural 1 on an attack roll while wielding this weapon, it breaks and becomes nonmagical.

item.name: 龙骨船
entries: 龙骨船和划艇主要被用于湖泊和河川。若顺流而行，将水流的速度（通常为每小时3里）加到这个载具的速度中。这些载具无法溯着任何显著的逆流而行，但可以借由岸边的动物被拖到上游。

item.name: 卡夫统灵药
entries: 这个直径3寸的玻璃罐中装有{@dice 1d4+1}剂浓厚混合物，带有淡淡的芦荟气味。这个玻璃罐和它内容物共重1/2磅。
以一个动作，一剂药膏可以被服用或外敷在肌肤上。接受其使用的生物将回复{@dice 2d8+2}点生命值，解除{@condition 中毒}状态，且任何疾病都将被治愈。

item.name: Keycharm
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Warding
entries: This small stylized key plays a vital role in the work of House Kundarak. If you cast the {@spell 警报术}, {@spell 秘法锁}, or {@spell 守卫铭文} spell, you can tie the effect to the keycharm so that whoever holds it receives the notification from the {@spell 警报术} spell, bypasses the lock of the {@spell 秘法锁} spell, or avoids triggering the glyph placed by the {@spell 守卫铭文} spell. In addition, the holder (who needn't be attuned to the item) can take an action to end any one spell tied to it, provided the holder knows the command word you set for ending the tied spells. The keycharm can have up to three tied spells at one time.

item.name: Khrusor, Spear of Heliod
entries: Heliod wields Khrusor, a spear blessed with the power of the sun. In his hands, it can be pitched from Nyx to any point on Theros. When Heliod lends his weapon to a mortal, it's typically so they can perform some great work in his name or as a test of their worthiness.

entries.name: Spear of the Sun
entries: This spear grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using this spear, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Sun
entries: If you are a worshiper of Heliod, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 3+.
items.entry: You gain 15 temporary hit points each dawn.

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Heliod, the spear has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Luminous
entries: The spear sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The light is sunlight.

entries.name: Sun's Retaliation
entries: When you take damage from a creature within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack with the spear against that creature. On a hit, the spear deals damage as normal, and the creature is {@condition 目盲} until the start of its next turn. This property of the spear can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The spear has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 光导箭} (1 charge), {@spell 昼明术} (3 charges, targeting the tip of the spear only), {@spell 烈日光束} (6 charges). The spear regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Destroying the Spear
entries: If taken to Erebos's palace in Tizerus, and used to sacrifice a champion of Heliod to Erebos, Khrusor is either destroyed or fundamentally twisted to Erebos's service.

item.name: Knave's Eye Patch
entries: While wearing this eye patch, you gain these benefits:

items: You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) checks that rely on sight.
If you have the Sunlight Sensitivity trait, you are unaffected by the trait.
You are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts or determine whether you are lying. Creatures can communicate telepathically with you only if you allow it.

item.name: Korolnor Scepter
entries: The Korolnor Scepter is one of ten Ruling Scepters of Shanatar, forged by the dwarven gods and given to the ruling houses of the ancient dwarven empire. The Korolnor Scepter's location was unknown for the longest time until a {@creature storm giant} queen, Neri, found it in a barnacle-covered shipwreck at the bottom of the Trackless Sea. The Ruling Scepters are all roughly the same size and shape, but their materials and properties vary.

The Korolnor Scepter is a tapered mithral rod as thick and long as a dwarf's forearm, with a small platinum knob at the bottom and a rounded disk adorned with a ring of seven tiny blue gems at the top.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this scepter, which can be wielded as a magic club.

You can use the properties of the {@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}, as well as the properties of the scepter itself. The scepter has 10 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expanded charges at dawn. Its properties are as follows:

items: If you are underground or underwater, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to determine the distance to the surface.
As an action: you can expend 2 charges to cast the {@spell 短讯术} spell from the scepter.

As an action: you can expend 3 charges to cast the {@spell 传送术} spell from the scepter. If the destination is within 60 feet of the {@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}, there is no chance of a teleport error or mishap occurring.

item.name: Kyrzin's Ooze
entries: This opalescent, symbiotic goo comes sealed in a jar and slowly shifts and moves, as if endlessly exploring the jar's interior. To attune to this item, you must first drink the contents of the jar, unlocking the following properties.

entries.name: Resistant
entries: While attuned to Kyrzin's ooze, you have resistance to poison and acid damage, and you're immune to the {@condition 中毒} condition.

entries.name: Amorphous
entries: As an action, you can speak a command word and cause your body to assume the amorphous qualities of an ooze. For the next minute, you (along with any equipment you're wearing or carrying) can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Once you use this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Acid Breath
entries: As an action, you can exhale acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@dice 8d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Once you use this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The ooze can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the ooze ends, as it seeps out of you.
If you die while the ooze is inside you, it bursts out and engulfs you, turning your corpse into a {@creature black pudding} allied with the daelkyr.

item.name: 长梯(10尺)
entries: 长梯(10尺)

item.name: 油灯
entries: 一盏油灯会散发出15尺半径的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。一旦被点亮，每一扁瓶(1品脱)的{@item 灯油(扁瓶装)|phb|灯油}都可以让它燃烧持续6小时。

item.name: 显像提灯
entries: 当被点亮，每1品脱的灯油都可以让这盏{@item 附盖提灯|phb}燃烧持续6小时，并散发出30尺半径的明亮光照以及再延伸30尺的微光光照。处于这盏提灯明亮光照范围内的{@condition 隐形}生物和物体将变得可见。你可以使用一个动作降下灯盖，将光照减弱为5尺半径的微光光照。

item.name: Lantern of Tracking
entries: This hooded lantern burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil, shedding bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

Each lantern of tracking is designed to track down a certain type of creature, which is determined by rolling on the Lantern of Tracking table. Once determined, this creature type can't be changed. While the lantern is within 300 feet of any creature of that type, its flame turns bright green. The lantern doesn't pinpoint the creature's exact location, however.

entries: 带黄斑深浅蓝混色的不透光宝石。

item.name: Lash of Shadows
entries: This snakeskin whip is touched by the power of Zehir and ends in five animated serpent heads.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Lash of Shadows is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 18, a Wisdom of 16, and a Charisma of 20. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Draconic.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A mad {@creature marilith} named Sizlifeth lives within the Lash of Shadows. The weapon has a short temper and experiences only extreme emotions. It is most happy when dealing harm.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The whip grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Abyssal and Draconic.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

You can attempt to poison any creature that is hit by the whip. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer the effect of one of the following poisons of your choice; once a poison other than Serpent Venom has been used, that poison can't be used again until the next dawn:

items.name: Dead Eyes.
items.entry: A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison is {@condition 中毒} for 1 hour. While {@condition 中毒} in this way, the creature is {@condition 目盲}.

items.name: Serpent Venom.
items.entry: A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison takes {@damage 3d6} poison damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the whip reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poisons increases to 15.

The weapon gains a new poison option called Ghoul's Blood. A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison is {@condition 中毒} for 1 minute. While {@condition 中毒} in this way, the creature is {@condition 麻痹}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the whip reaches an exalted state, it gains the following additional properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poisons increases to 17.

The weapon gains a new poison option called Cockatrice Tears. A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison begins to turn to stone and is {@condition 束缚}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition 石化} for 24 hours.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Leather Golem Armor
entries: Strange rituals have repurposed the body of a flesh golem into this partially sentient suit of leather armor. While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells and other magical effects. In addition, you gain the following properties:

items.name: Immutable Form
entries: You are immune to any spell or effect that would alter your form.

items.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: You gain resistance to lightning damage. Whenever you take lightning damage, you gain 5 temporary hit points.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This armor is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a remove curse spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the armor. In addition, while you wear the cursed armor, you gain the following properties:

items.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If you take fire damage, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever a critical hit is made against you, roll a d6. On a 6, the armor causes you to go berserk. On each of your turns while berserk, you attack the nearest creature you can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, you attack an object, with preference for an object smaller than yourself. Once the armor causes you to go berserk, it cannot be removed. You continue to attack until you are incapacitated or until another creature is able to calm you with appropriate magic (such as a calm emotions spell) or a successful DC 15 Charisma ({@skill 说服}) check.

item.name: 皮匠工具
additionalEntries: 皮革加工的知识还包括兽皮特性、皮革盔甲和类似物品的学识。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 皮匠工具包括一把小刀、一柄小木槌、一台磨边机、一个打孔器、一个纺锤，以及一些皮革碎料。

additionalEntries.name: 奥秘
entries: 皮匠工具熟练项在你检查皮制魔法物品，如鞋子和部分斗篷时提供额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 调查
entries: 当你研究皮制物品或与之相关的线索时，你具有额外的洞察力，因为你对于皮革的专业知识能够发现他人忽略的细节。

additionalEntries.name: 鉴定皮革
entries: 当你检查皮革物品时，你能分辨出皮料的种类以及运用的特殊工艺。例如，你能分辨出矮人制革工艺与半身人制革工艺的不同。

additionalEntries.caption: 皮匠工具
rows: 皮革外观加工
检定皮革制品的历史

item.name: 灵肉圣契
entries: 这本书的封面制以人皮，饰以白骨，触摸时手感冰凉，并发出微微低语。这本书在被找到时，包含了以下法术： {@spell 活化死尸}, {@spell 死亡之环}, {@spell 摹造生命}, {@spell 死亡一指}, {@spell 死者交谈术}, {@spell 亡灵召唤术|TCE} 和 {@spell 吸血鬼之触}。你可以将其作为法术书。
当你持握这本书时，你可以将其作为你法师法术的法器。
书具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花费1分钟时间研究这本书，你可以消耗1发充能来将你的一道已准备法术替换为书中的另一道法术。新法术必须是死灵学派的法术。
作为一个动作，你可以消耗1发充能并伪装成亡灵10分钟。在持续时间内，你外表上如同死者，并且不死生物会忽略你，除非你伤害它们。面对所有的外部检查和侦测法术时，你也只会被显示为不死生物。此效应在你造成伤害或使一个生物进行豁免检定时结束。

item.name: 命源刺青
entries: 该魔法刺青用一根特殊的针制作，绘有生命与重生的符号。

entries.name: 刺青同调
entries: 同调此物品时，你需要将针持握，并抵在你想要让刺青出现的那处皮肤上。当同调完成时，针头会化为墨水再变成刺青。若你与刺青的同调结束，刺青会消失，针头会再次出现在你的位置中。

entries.name: 黯蚀抗性
entries: 你获得对黯蚀伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 生命结界
entries: 当你生命值降至0时，改为生命值降至1。使用后，直到下次黎明前，此属性不能再次使用。

item.name: Lifewell Tattoo
entries: This tattoo comprises symbols of life and rebirth. While this tattoo is on your skin, you have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Death Ward
entries: When you would be reduced to 0 hit points, you drop to 1 hit point instead. Once used, this benefit can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Lightbringer
entries: This +1 mace was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and made of solid brass. Named Lightbringer, this weapon glows as bright as a {@item torch|phb} when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra {@dice 1d6} radiant damage to undead creatures.

item.name: 闪电吸收刺青
entries: {#itemEntry 吸收刺青|TCE}

item.name: Living Gloves
entries: These symbiotic gloves—made of thin chitin and sinew—pulse with a life of their own. To attune to them, you must wear them for the entire attunement period, during which the gloves bond with your skin.
While attuned to these gloves, you gain one of the following proficiencies (your choice when you attune to the gloves):

items: {@skill 巧手}
{@item 盗贼工具|phb}
One kind of artisan's tools of your choice
One kind of musical instrument of your choice

entries: When you make an ability check using the chosen proficiency, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The gloves can't be removed from you while you're attuned to them, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to them. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the gloves ends, and they can be removed.

item.name: Living Loot Satchel
entries: As a rank 2 hoardsperson, you are granted the use of a living loot satchel, which is an uncommon magic item. It functions as a {@item bag of holding} and is available in a variety of colors and styles.

entries.caption: Class-Based Living Loot Satchel
rows: Barbarian
Broad belt with a dozen hanging pockets
Bard
Lute case
Cleric
Hollowed-out holy tome
Druid
Made from natural, organic, locally sourced woven fibers
Fighter
A thick, battle-scarred iron lockbox
Paladin
A metal case with fine engraving and scrollwork
Ranger
A fur-lined bindle
Rogue
A nondescript coin pouch
Sorcerer
A battered leather satchel, prone to spitting out multicolored sparks at the seams
Warlock
A patchwork monster-leather satchel with a "purely decorative" fanged mouth.
Wizard
A pocket dimension hidden up your sleeve or inside your hat

entries: The living loot satchel is a kind of magical being that safeguards the franchise's funds and valuables. Its innards are connected to a secure coffer within Head Office's vault in Waterdeep, to which the satchel periodically transfers the franchise's wealth. As an action, you can transfer any amount of your franchise funds back to your satchel with a successful DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill 巧手}) check.

entries.name: Secret Satchel
entries: As a rank 3 hoardsperson, your living loot satchel gets an upgrade to function as the replica chest used for the {@spell 李欧蒙秘藏箱} spell, becoming a rare magic item. You can open the secret chest through your living loot satchel to deposit or withdraw items—even items that wouldn't normally fit in your satchel, but which fit within the chest. Thanks to Head Office striking deals you don't want to know about with extraplanar creatures you really don't want to know about, there is no chance for the spell to end.

entries.name: That Thing You Need
entries: At rank 3, you can use a bonus action to reach into your living loot satchel and make a DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill 巧手}) check. On a success, you draw forth an item of your choice on the Adventuring Gear table in chapter 5 of the Player's Handbook. The item must be of a size that can fit into your secret chest and be worth no more than 15 gp. Once you attempt to draw five items from your satchel, you cannot draw forth any more items until the next dawn.

entries.name: Portable Hole Satchel
entries: At rank 4, your living loot satchel receives another upgrade, becoming a very rare magic item. The secret chest accessed by your satchel now has the storage capacity of a {@item portable hole}—6 feet in diameter and 10 feet deep. As before, you can place any appropriately sized object into the portable-hole-sized chest, even if it wouldn't normally fit into your satchel.

entries.name: That Expensive Thing You Need
entries: Also at rank 4, when you use your That Thing You Need feature, you can requisition any item of up to 250 gp in value, as long as it would fit into the confines of your satchel's portable hole.

item.name: Loadstone
entries: This stone is a large gem worth 150 gp.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The stone is cursed, but its magical nature is hidden; {@spell 侦测魔法} doesn't detect it. An {@spell 鉴定术} spell reveals the stone's true nature. If you use the Dash or Disengage action while the stone is on your person, its curse activates. Until the curse is broken with {@spell 移除诅咒} or similar magic, your speed is reduced by 5 feet, and your maximum load and maximum lift capacities are halved. You also become unwilling to part with the stone.

item.name: 锁
entries: 这道锁会附有一把钥匙。一个熟练于{@item 盗贼工具}的生物可以不使用该钥匙，而借由成功通过一次DC 15的敏捷检定将锁打开。你的DM可以决定是否有更好的锁在市面上以更高的价格贩售。

item.name: 诡诈之锁
entries: 这道锁看起来就如同寻常的锁（如同《玩家手册》第五章所描述的类型）且附有一把钥匙。这道锁内部的反转齿轮将通过魔法调整以阻挠窃贼将它打开。用以解开这道锁所进行的敏捷检定将具有劣势。

item.name: Longhorn
entries: A Faerûnian flute of sophisticated make, found only in areas with skilled artisans, as in great cities or elven enclaves.

item.name: Lord's Ensemble
item.reqAttune: by a creature with a humanoid build
entries: The Masked Lords of Waterdeep don this ensemble when meeting with one another. This raiment renders each lord indistinguishable from the others. The ensemble consists of three pieces—a helm, an amulet, and a robe—that function as a single magic item when worn together, but only within the city of Waterdeep and its sewers. You become attuned to the ensemble as a single item.

entries.name: Lord's Helm
entries: This bucket helm covers your head and conceals your face. Screens over the eyes help to shroud your identity without blinding you. While you wear the helm, your voice is magically altered to sound genderless, and you are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts, to determine whether you are lying, to know your alignment, or to know your creature type. Creatures can communicate telepathically with you only if you allow it.

entries.name: Lord's Amulet
entries: This amulet bears the crest of Waterdeep. It functions as an {@item amulet of proof against detection and location}.

entries.name: Lord's Robe
entries: This elegant robe functions as a {@item ring of free action}, and it creates the illusion that you have a nondescript, androgynous humanoid build and stand 6 feet tall.

item.name: 贝希默的失落王冠
entries: 这顶矮人战盔是一顶坚固的开面式钢盔，额头上方装饰着一个金色的圆环，上面有七根金色的尖刺冠。当你穿戴这顶王冠时，你获得以下好处：

items: 你具有对心灵伤害的抗性。
你在对抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免检定上具有优势。
你可以使用一个附赠动作来激励一个距离你60尺内，你所能看见且能构看见或听见你的生物。在你下个回合结束前，被激励的生物可以掷一颗{@dice d6}，并将骰出来的数字加到它所进行的一次属性检定、攻击检定、或豁免检定中。这么做将消耗这顶王冠的1发充能。这顶王冠含有3发充能，且会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d3}发已消耗的充能。

item.name: Lost Sword
entries: The Lost Sword is a sentient lawful good {@item +1 shortsword} (Intelligence 11, Wisdom 13, Charisma 13). It has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 120 feet. It communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it.
The sword's purpose is to fight evil. The sword has the following additional properties:

items: The sword continually sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. Only by destroying the sword can this light be extinguished.
A lawful good creature can attune itself to the sword in 1 minute.
While attuned to the weapon, the sword's wielder can use the sword to cast the {@spell 十字军斗篷} spell. Once used, this property of the sword can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 鲁芭的灵魂塔罗卡
entries: 并非所有逗留于世的灵魂都是迷失在通往死后国度之路上的悲惨灵魂。有些灵魂失去活力，成为了囚徒；它们是如此邪恶，以至于凡人不敢将它们释放到那毫无戒心的来世。

作为由维斯塔尼传说中的人物创造的物品，{@i 鲁芭的灵魂塔罗卡}塑造了无数英雄的命运。这套牌作出的预言也揭示了巨大的邪恶，引导它的创造者走入邪恶势力的道路。牌组的创造者，鲁芭夫人，依靠着她敏锐的直觉无数次侥幸逃离了自己的毁灭。但就算是她也无法躲过所有的邪恶。在最危急的关头，鲁芭夫人设法用命运的丝线封印住这些至恶的存在，将它们囚禁在了这套塔罗卡中。这些邪恶的灵魂被困于隐藏在卡牌洗混翻转之中的下界空间内，静静地等待着命运本身也被玷污的那一天——这一天绝对会到来的。
和所有的 {@i Tarokka of Souls} 一样，灵魂塔罗卡是由五十四张插画精美的卡片组成的，包含十四张至高牌以及四十张被分为钱币，雕文，星星和宝剑四个套组的其他卡牌。

entries.name: 随机属性
entries: 这件神器具有以下随机属性，你可以通过对着{@book 《城主指南》|DMG}中的"神器"章节掷骰以决定它们:

items: 两项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效减益属性|dmg|弱效减益} 属性
两项 {@table 神器属性; 弱效增益属性|dmg|弱效增益} 属性

entries.name: 法术
entries: 持握牌组时，你可以用一个动作用牌组施展以下法术（豁免DC 18）： {@spell 通晓语言}, {@spell 侦测善恶}, {@spell 侦测魔法}, {@spell 侦测毒素或疾病}, {@spell 物品定位术} 或 {@spell 探知}。一旦你用牌组施展了某个法术，你在下一个黎明前不能再次施展该法术。

entries.name: 持久之视
entries: 持握牌组时，你为维持 {@spell 预言术} 的专注所作的体质豁免检定自动成功。

entries.name: 编织命运
entries: 以一个动作，你可以从牌组中抽出一张卡，从而编织15尺内你能看见的另一个生物的命运。从以下效应中选择一项：

items.name: 幸福
items.entry: 在接下来的一小时内，该生物在攻击检定，属性检定和豁免检定上具有优势。

items.name: 灾祸
items.entry: 在接下来的一小时内，该生物在攻击检定，属性检定和豁免检定上具有劣势。

items: 牌组可以如此被使用两次，你在下一个黎明时分重获所有已使用的次数。

entries.name: 命运的囚徒
entries: 每当你使用编织命运特性时，都有可能导致被囚禁的灵魂之一逃脱。骰一次 {@dice d100} 来对照塔罗卡中的灵魂表格。如果你骰出了至高牌之一，和它相关的灵魂就会逃脱。你可以在怪物图鉴中找到它的数据。如果你骰出的灵魂已经逃脱了，则重骰。

entries: 被释放的灵魂出现在距离你{@dice 10d10}里以内的一个随机地点，并开始恐吓活着的生物。直至逃脱的灵魂被摧毁之前，它获得牌组的编织命运特性中的幸福的效应，并且你和编织命运的原本的目标都获得编织命运特性中的灾祸的效应。

entries.name: 重洗命运
entries: 如果你在七日内没有使用编织命运特性，你与{@i 鲁芭的灵魂塔罗卡}的同调结束，并且你不能再次与之同调，直至另一个生物对你使用牌组的编织命运特性。

entries.name: 摧毁牌组
entries: {@i 鲁芭的灵魂塔罗卡可以被摧毁}，前提是所有被囚禁的灵魂都被释放并摧毁。这会揭示第十五个灵魂——一位巫妖的存在。它居住在下界卡之中，这张卡只有在其他十四个灵魂都被摧毁后才会出现。如果巫妖被摧毁，下界卡随之消失，灵魂塔罗卡变为一套普通的塔罗卡，不再具有任何特性，不过其中包含了一张由DM设计的新卡。

entries.name: 鲁芭夫人与维斯塔尼人
entries: 魂之塔罗卡的创造者鲁芭夫人曾是维斯塔尼人中最有影响力的领导者之一。在无数个时代里，维斯塔尼人游荡于堕影冥界之中，其中包括了如同被吸血鬼所困扰的领域——巴洛维亚之类的恐惧半位面。这些旅行者们知晓关于这些领域的许多秘密，遭遇过无数其他游荡于堕影冥界之惊惧中的事物。绝大多数维斯塔尼部族接受以不同方式旅行、不同出身的善意旅行者，他们欢迎那些想要在无尽路途中，在迷雾之后的朦胧幻象中觅得一处家园的人。

作为一名半身人维斯塔尼人，鲁芭夫人领导着堕影冥界中最大的一支维斯塔尼部族。她来自施特拉德伯爵与伊娃夫人所来自的相同的世界，而她创造了一个善良的、坚韧的社区——在阴影位面之中极为少见。她带着她的族人欢迎着旅行者，为饥饿者提供食物，反抗着残忍之人。她与伊娃夫人曾是友人，直到伊娃夫人与那些属于黑夜的生物做起了交易。"我们或许会与阴影之中游荡，"鲁芭夫人说，"但我们必须成为那些与我们同样在阴影中游荡的旅行者们的希望之光。"
数年之前，鲁芭夫人消失在了迷雾之中，仅仅留下了魂之塔罗卡。有人说若你抽出了"迷雾"之卡，你就能听到她善意的耳语声。

item.name: Lute crafted of exotic wood with mother-of-pearl inlay and zircon gems (Brazen Coalition)
Luxon Beacon
entries: This dodecahedron of faintly glowing crystal is heavier than it appears. A set of handles are affixed to its sides, and it pulsates and thrums when touched.

entries.name: Fragment of Possibility
entries: A creature that touches the beacon and concentrates for 1 minute receives a Fragment of Possibility, which looks like a Tiny, grayish bead of energy that follows the creature around, staying within 1 foot of it at all times. The fragment lasts for 8 hours or until used. Once the beacon grants a Fragment of Possibility, it can't grant another until the next dawn. A creature with a Fragment of Possibility from a Luxon Beacon can't gain another Fragment of Possibility from any source.

When a creature with a Fragment of Possibility makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it can expend its fragment to roll an additional {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use. Alternatively, when an attack roll is made against the creature, it can expend its fragment to roll a {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use, the one it rolled or the one the attacker rolled.
If the original {@dice d20} roll has advantage or disadvantage, the creature rolls its {@dice d20} after advantage or disadvantage has been applied to the original roll.

entries.name: Soul Snare
entries: If a follower of the Luxon who has undergone a ritual of consecution dies within 100 miles of a Luxon Beacon, their soul is ensnared by it. This soul will be reincarnated within the body of a random humanoid baby developing within 100 miles of the beacon.

item.name: 建筑里拉琴
entries: 当持握这把{@item lyre|PHB}时，你可以用一个动作施展 {@spell 修复术}。当一个距离你300尺内的{@item lyre|PHB}或建筑受到伤害时，你也可以用一个反应弹奏这把里拉琴，使其免疫该此次伤害以及其他同类型伤害，直到你的下个回合开始。
此外，你可以用一个动作弹奏这把{@item lyre|PHB}以施展 {@spell 鬼斧神工}, {@spell 地动术}, {@spell 穿墙术} 或 {@spell 构装体召唤术|TCE}，直到下次黎明前，这个法术不能再以此法施展。

item.name: 瓦解之锤
entries: 当你以这把魔法武器命中一个邪魔或不死生物时，该生物将受到额外的{@dice 2d6}光耀伤害。若该目标在承受该伤害之后剩下25点或更低的生命值，则它必须成功通过一次DC 15的感知豁免，否则将被摧毁。若豁免成功，该生物将因你而陷入{@condition 恐惧}状态，持续直到你的下个回合结束。
当你持握这把武器时，它将散发出20尺半径的明亮光照和再延伸20尺的微光光照。

item.name: 打击之锤
entries: 你在使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+1加值。当你使用这把硬头锤攻击一个构装体时，这个加值将增加至+3。
当你在以这把武器进行的攻击检定中骰出了20，目标将受到额外的7点钝击伤害，或若目标为构装体，则为额外的14点钝击伤害。若一个构装体在承受该伤害之后剩下25点或更低的生命值，则它将被摧毁。

item.name: 恐惧之锤
entries: 这把魔法武器含有3发充能。当持握它时，你可以使用一个动作并消耗1发充能以释放出一股恐惧波动。每个距离你30尺内且你所选择的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的感知豁免，否则因你而陷入{@condition 恐惧}长达1分钟。当它因这个方式而陷入{@condition 恐惧}时，该生物必须花费它的动作以尽可能的移动远离你，且无法自愿移动到距离你30尺内的空间。它也无法采取反应。它唯一能采取的动作只有{@action 疾走}动作，或是尝试从防止它移动的效果中逃脱。若它无处可逃，则该生物可以使用{@action 闪避}动作。在它的每个回合结束时，该生物可以重复进行这个豁免检定，豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。
这把硬头锤会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d3}发已消耗的充能。

item.name: Mace of the Black Crown
entries: This mace has a haft of black iron and a ruby head with a fiendish countenance. Carrying the boon of Asmodeus, it is fit for the most powerful servants of the Nine Hells.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Mace of the Black Crown is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intelligence of 20, a Wisdom of 12, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common and Infernal.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A greedy {@creature erinyes} named Xartaza lives within the Mace of the Black Crown. Xartaza wants to recruit more souls for Asmodeus, so the weapon pushes its wielder toward lawful evil actions by manipulating the wielder's dreams. A former Blood War general, Xartaza hates demons and relishes crafting sound battle plans in any conflict.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The mace grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Infernal.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

While holding the mace, you can use a bonus action to speak its Infernal command word, causing flames to erupt from the head. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the mace is ablaze, it deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you are no longer holding the mace.

While holding the mace, you can use an action to summon an {@creature imp}. Any devil you summon with this mace is friendly to you and your companions for the duration. The imp obeys any verbal commands that you issue to it and returns to the Nine Hells 10 minutes after you summoned it. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the mace reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 2d6}.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature bearded devil}.
You have resistance to poison damage while holding this weapon.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the mace reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 3d6}. Fire damage dealt by the mace ignores resistance to fire damage.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature barbed devil}.
You have resistance to fire damage while you hold this weapon.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Macuahuitl
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this longsword, which is made of laminated wood, and inset with jagged teeth of obsidian. It deals an extra {@dice 2d6} damage to any creature of the plant type.

item.name: Maddgoth's Helm
entries: While you wear this helm and are inside Maddgoth's castle, on its roof, or in its courtyard, you have immunity to all damage. If the helm is taken from the castle, it turns to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: 放大镜
entries: 这面透镜可以助你看清楚小东西。它也可以在生火时用来代替碎石和打火铁。使用放大镜生火需要聚焦如同阳光一般明亮的光线、可以点燃的火种、以及大约5分钟的时间以点燃火焰。一面放大镜可以让你在任何用以评估或审视小型或精细物体的属性检定中获得优势。

item.name: 孔雀石
entries: 带纹深浅绿混色的不透光宝石。

item.name: 怨恨
entries: 受害于这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的体质豁免，否则陷入{@condition 中毒}状态长达1小时。陷入中毒状态的生物同时也将陷入{@condition 目盲}状态。

item.name: 镣铐
entries: 这组金属拘束器可以束缚住小型或中型的生物。从镣铐中逃脱需要成功通过一次DC 20的敏捷检定。破坏它们则需要成功通过一次DC 20的力量检定。每一组镣铐都附有一把钥匙。一个熟练于{@item 盗贼工具}的生物可以不使用该钥匙，而借由成功通过一次DC 15的敏捷检定将镣铐的锁打开。镣铐具有15点生命值。

item.name: 法术抗性披肩
entries: 当你穿戴这件斗篷时，你在对抗法术的豁免检定中具有优势。

item.name: 强身健体手册
entries: 这本书记载着关于健康和饮食的诀窍，且它的文本充满着魔力。若你在6天或更短的期间内花费了总共48小时的时间研读这本书的内容，并实践它的指示，则你的体质值和体质值上限都将增加2点。这本手册接着将失去它的魔力，并在一个世纪之后恢复。

item.name: 黏土魔像手册
entries: 这本手册记载着制造特定种类魔像所需要的知识和咒语。其种类由DM选择或随机决定。你必须要是一名拥有至少二个5环法术位的施法者，才能够解读并使用这本手册。一个无法使用魔像手册，但尝试阅读它的生物将受到{@dice 6d6}心灵伤害。
要制造一个{@creature 黏土魔像}，你必须消耗30天的时间，在不受打扰的情况下工作，手持着这本手册且每天不能休息超过8小时。你同时必须花费65,000金币以购买其所需的物资。一但你完成该魔像的制造，这本书将会在一阵魔焰中被消耗。当这本手册烧成的灰烬撒在该魔像身上，它将会随之活化。它将处于你的控制下，且它能理解并服从你的口头命令。

item.name: 血肉魔像手册
entries: 这本手册记载着制造特定种类魔像所需要的知识和咒语。其种类由DM选择或随机决定。你必须要是一名拥有至少二个5环法术位的施法者，才能够解读并使用这本手册。一个无法使用魔像手册，但尝试阅读它的生物将受到{@dice 6d6}心灵伤害。
要制造一个{@creature 血肉魔像}，你必须消耗60天的时间，在不受打扰的情况下工作，手持着这本手册且每天不能休息超过8小时。你同时必须花费50,000金币以购买其所需的物资。一但你完成该魔像的制造，这本书将会在一阵魔焰中被消耗。当这本手册烧成的灰烬撒在该魔像身上，它将会随之活化。它将处于你的控制下，且它能理解并服从你的口头命令。

item.name: 增益锻炼手册
entries: 这本书记载着如何适当的锻炼的诀窍，且它的文本充满着魔力。若你在6天或更短的期间内花费了总共48小时的时间研读这本书的内容，并实践它的指示，则你的力量值和力量值上限都将增加2点。这本手册接着将失去它的魔力，并在一个世纪之后恢复。

item.name: 钢铁魔像手册
entries: 这本手册记载着制造特定种类魔像所需要的知识和咒语。其种类由DM选择或随机决定。你必须要是一名拥有至少二个5环法术位的施法者，才能够解读并使用这本手册。一个无法使用魔像手册，但尝试阅读它的生物将受到{@dice 6d6}心灵伤害。
要制造一个{@creature 钢铁魔像}，你必须消耗120天的时间，在不受打扰的情况下工作，手持着这本手册且每天不能休息超过8小时。你同时必须花费100,000金币以购买其所需的物资。一但你完成该魔像的制造，这本书将会在一阵魔焰中被消耗。当这本手册烧成的灰烬撒在该魔像身上，它将会随之活化。它将处于你的控制下，且它能理解并服从你的口头命令。

item.name: 迅捷行动手册
entries: 这本书记载着如何协调和平衡运动的诀窍，且它的文本充满着魔力。若你在6天或更短的期间内花费了总共48小时的时间研读这本书的内容，并实践它的指示，则你的敏捷值和敏捷值上限都将增加2点。这本手册接着将失去它的魔力，并在一个世纪之后恢复。

item.name: 石魔像手册
entries: 这本手册记载着制造特定种类魔像所需要的知识和咒语。其种类由DM选择或随机决定。你必须要是一名拥有至少二个5环法术位的施法者，才能够解读并使用这本手册。一个无法使用魔像手册，但尝试阅读它的生物将受到{@dice 6d6}心灵伤害。
要制造一个{@creature 石魔像}，你必须消耗90天的时间，在不受打扰的情况下工作，手持着这本手册且每天不能休息超过8小时。你同时必须花费80,000金币以购买其所需的物资。一但你完成该魔像的制造，这本书将会在一阵魔焰中被消耗。当这本手册烧成的灰烬撒在该魔像身上，它将会随之活化。它将处于你的控制下，且它能理解并服从你的口头命令。

item.name: 地图或卷轴筒
entries: 这个圆筒状的皮套可以容纳最多10张卷起的纸或5张卷起的羊皮纸。

item.name: Marble font with gold inlay (Legion of Dusk)
Mask of the Beast
entries: This wooden mask is shaped in the likeness of a beast's visage and has 3 charges. While wearing the mask you can expend 1 charge and use the mask to cast the {@spell 化兽为友} spell as an action. The mask regains all expended charges at dawn.

item.name: Mask of the Dragon Queen
entries: Individually, the five dragon masks resemble the dragons they are named for. When two or more of the dragon masks are assembled, however, they transform magically into the Mask of the Dragon Queen. Each mask shrinks to become the modeled head of a chromatic dragon, appearing to roar its devotion to {@creature Tiamat|RoT} where all the masks brought together are arranged crown-like on the wearer's head. Below the five masks, a new mask shapes itself, granting the wearer a draconic visage that covers the face, neck, and shoulders.

While you are attuned to and wear this mask, you can have any of the properties from any one mask. Additionally, you gain the Damage Absorption from each of the five dragon masks, and you gain five uses of the Legendary Resistance property.

item.name: 泥瓦匠工具
additionalEntries: 泥瓦匠工具允许你制造石质或砖制建筑。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 泥瓦匠工具包括泥刀、锤子、凿子、刷子、和角尺。

additionalEntries.name: 历史
entries: 你的专业知识有助于你确定一座石质建筑的建造日期和用途，以及可能是谁建造了它。

additionalEntries.name: 调查
entries: 当你检查石质建筑中的区域时，你具有额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 察觉
entries: 你可以在石墙或地板上发现不规则的地方，从而更容易找到陷阱门和秘密通道。

additionalEntries.name: 拆迁
entries: 你对砖石结构的知识可以让你发现墙壁的薄弱点。你的武器攻击会对这种建筑造成双倍伤害。

additionalEntries.caption: Mason's Tools
rows: 在石墙上开个小洞
找出石墙的薄弱点

item.name: 伪装刺青
entries: 该魔法刺青用一根特殊的针制作，显现为你所想要的样子。

entries.name: 刺青同调
entries: 同调此物品时，你需要将针持握，并抵在你想要让刺青出现的那处皮肤上。当同调完成时，针头会化为墨水再变成刺青。若你与刺青的同调结束，刺青会消失，针头会再次出现在你的位置中。

entries.name: 液态油墨
entries: 作为一个附赠动作，你可以将刺青变为任意颜色或图纹，并移动到你皮肤上的任意区域。无论其有着什么形态，它看起来总是一个刺青。它的尺寸最小可为一枚铜币，大则可复盖你的全身。

entries.name: 易容自我
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以使用刺青施展 {@spell 易容术} 法术（识破DC 13）。使用刺青施展这道法术后，直到下次黎明前，不能再次用刺青施展。

item.name: Masquerade Tattoo
entries: This tattoo appears on your skin as whatever you desire. As a bonus action, you can shape the tattoo into any color or pattern and move it to any area of your skin. Whatever form it takes, it is always obviously a tattoo. It can range in size from no smaller than a copper piece to an intricate work of art that covers all your skin.

entries.name: Disguise Self
entries: As an action, you can use the tattoo to cast the {@spell 易容术} spell. Once the spell is cast from the tattoo, it can't be cast from the tattoo again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Master's Amulet
entries: Every {@creature shield guardian} has an amulet magically linked to it. A shield guardian can have only one corresponding amulet, and if that amulet is destroyed, the shield guardian is {@condition incapacitated} until a replacement amulet is created. A shield guardian's amulet is subject to direct attack if it isn't being worn or carried. It has AC 10, 10 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Crafting an amulet requires 1 week and costs 1,000 gp in components.

A shield guardian's solitary focus is to protect the amulet's wearer. The amulet's wearer can command the guardian to attack its enemies or to guard the wielder against attack. If an attack threatens to injure the wearer, the construct can magically absorb the blow into its own body, even at a distance.

A spellcaster can store a single spell within a shield guardian, which can then cast the spell on command or under specific conditions. Many a wizard has been rendered helpless by enemies, only to surprise those foes when its shield guardian unleashes potent magical power.

item.name: Masterpiece painting in mahogany frame with gold inlay (Legion of Dusk)
Mastix, Whip of Erebos
entries: Erebos wields Mastix, a whip capable of extending like an impossibly long shadow. In the hands of the god of the dead, the whip snares the reluctant dead and drags them into his realm. When Erebos grants his weapon to a mortal follower, it's typically to reclaim a powerful soul or to humiliate Heliod.

entries.name: Whip of the Dead
entries: Erebos's whip seethes with the enervating energy of the Underworld. This magic whip grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using this whip, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Additionally, when you make an attack with the whip on your turn, you can increase the range of the attack to 300 feet. This property of the weapon can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Blessing of the Dead
entries: If you are a worshiper of Erebos, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 1+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property—a burden Erebos imposes to test his faithful.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Erebos, the whip has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Erebos's Claim
entries: While carrying the whip, you can use an action to cast either {@spell 死亡之环} or {@spell 支配怪物} (targeting only undead) from the whip. The save DC for these spells is 18. Once you use the whip to cast a spell, that spell can't be cast from it again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Whip
entries: To destroy the whip, it must be taken to the heights of Mount Hiastos in Nyx, unraveled by a Returned, and left to bask in continual daylight for one month.

item.name: Matalotok
entries: Matalotok, the Frost Father, is an ancient hammer fashioned by Thrym, the god of frost giants. The favored weapon of the demon lord {@creature Kostchtchie|BGDIA}, Matalotok is frigid to the touch and wreathed in mist.

You are immune to cold damage while holding Matalotok. Whenever it deals damage to a creature, the hammer radiates a burst of intense cold in a 30-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) cold damage.

item.name: Matchless Pipe
entries: A switch made of flint is built into the bowl of this fine wooden smoking pipe. With a few flicks of the switch, the pipe lights itself.

item.name: 读心勋章
entries: 这枚勋章含有3发充能。当配戴它时，你可以使用一个动作并消耗1发充能以从它施放{@spell 侦测思想}法术（豁免DC 13）。这枚勋章会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d3}发已消耗的充能。

item.name: Menga leaves (1 ounce)
entries: The dried leaves of a menga bush can be ground, dissolved in a liquid, heated, and ingested. A creature that ingests 1 ounce of menga leaves in this fashion regains 1 hit point. A creature that ingests more than 5 ounces of menga leaves in a 24-hour period gains no additional benefit and must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition 昏迷} for 1 hour. The {@condition 昏迷} creature awakens if it takes at least 5 damage on one turn.
A healthy menga bush usually has {@dice 2d6} ounces of leaves. Once picked, the leaves require 1 day to dry out before they can confer any benefit.

item.name: 商用天秤
entries: 一副天秤包括了秤、盘面、以及总重最多2磅的各式砝码。你可以使用天秤精准地测量小型物体的重量，像是贵金属或贸易商品，以帮助你判定它们的价值。

item.name: 野炊工具组
entries: 这个锡盒内装有一个杯子和一组简单的餐具。这个盒子两面被钳在一起，且其中一面可以被当作烹饪锅、而另一面则作为餐盘或浅碗被使用。

item.name: 午夜之泪
entries: 服用这种毒药的生物不会受到任何影响，直到午夜的钟声响起。若此毒药在这之前尚未被中和，该生物将必须进行一次DC 17的体质豁免，若豁免失败则受到31 ({@dice 9d6})毒素伤害，若豁免成功则只受到一半的伤害。

item.name: 琉克欧的非凡机仆
entries: {@creature Mighty Servant of Leuk-o|TCE} 是一台具有非凡的力量，身高10尺的机器，以使用它的那位臭名昭著的军阀命名，当有人驾驶时，它会变成一个活化的构装生物。它的身躯由一种来历不明的黑色合金打造，在常见的描述中，它就像一个比例失调的矮人和一只巨型甲虫的结合。机仆内部的空间足够容纳1吨的载重和一个内置的舱室，两个中型生物能够从这里控制它——并带来一场势不可挡的毁灭。
关于机仆来历的传说更多仅是猜测而非事实，其中通常会提及异界的存在，奥斯世界神秘的屏障峰，以及被称为"{@i Machine of Lum the Mad}）"的相关装置。关于这台装置的起源和操作的细节能够在一本名为《金属意志》的书中寻得。这本书是一本奇械师的秘卷，由疯子卢姆的后代卢姆大师（Lum the Maestro）撰写，当时她正在试图重组被拆散已久的{@i 琉克欧的非凡机仆}。

entries.name: 危险同调
entries: 两个生物能同时与机仆进行同调。如果第三个人试图和机仆同调，则无事发生。
机仆的控制舱室可以通过其背部的一扇舱门进入，当没有生物与之同调时，这扇舱门很容易开启。与这件神器同调需要两个小时，可以作为长休的一部分进行。
在此期间，你必须进入机仆的内部，调试它的控制设备。当驾驶员进行同调时，任何在机仆外部和其50尺内的生物或建筑都有50%可能在同调过程中被其毁灭铁拳攻击意外击中一次。每当有一个生物试图将自己与之同调时，都会发生这一过程。

entries.name: 控制机仆
entries: 当有任何生物与神器同调时，同调的生物能够像打开其他们一样轻松地打开舱门。其他生物则需要通过DC 25的{@item 盗贼工具|PHB}检定才能打开舱门。一道对舱门施展的 {@spell 敲击术} 法术能够让舱门在施法者下个回合开始之前开启。
一个生物能够以10尺移动力进出舱门。在机仆内部的生物和物件对源自外部的效应具有全掩护。内部的控制舱能够让内部的生物毫无阻挡地看到外面的景象。
当你在机仆内部时，你能通过控制系统控制其行动。在你（每一个与之同调的生物）的回合中，你能以以下方式命令机仆：

items: 打开或关闭舱门（不需要动作，一回合一次）
让机仆移动最大为其速度的距离（不需要动作）
以一个动作，你能命令机仆执行其数据版中的动作或之外的其他动作。
当一个生物触发来自机仆的借机攻击时，你能以你的反应动作命令机仆对该生物进行一次毁灭铁拳攻击。

entries: 当没有生物与之同调时，神器只是一件不会活动的物件。

entries.name: 械中幽灵
entries: 在迎来死亡时，强大的军阀琉克欧的灵魂被吸入这台神器之中，并成为能让它活化的力量。机仆会采取特别是能造成破坏自行攻击和移动。每24小时一次，由DM决定，无人驾驶的机仆会进行一次这样的动作。
如果机仆失去其一半或一半以上的生命值，每个与之同调的生物必须成功通过DC 20的感知豁免，否则被 {@condition 魅惑} 长达24小时。当因此被 {@condition 魅惑} 时, 生物会纵情破坏，试图毁灭一切建筑并攻击一切机仆视野中未与之同调的生物。如果可能的话，它会尽量操作机仆，并从那些威胁到神器的生物开始攻击。

entries.name: 自毁
entries: 通过拉动一系列的杠杆并按下按钮，机仆的两位驾驶员能够令它自爆。当机仆的驾驶员与之同调时，自毁密码并不会被透露给他们。如果密码被找到（由DM决定如何发现），则需要与之同调的驾驶员从机仆内部，在连续三回合耗费他们的动作输入密码。但是，如果驾驶员们开始输入自毁密码的过程，机仆会使用其械中幽灵特性并令两位驾驶员相互对立。

如果船员们成功输入了密码，第三轮结束时，机仆会自爆。以机仆为中心半径100尺球状区域内每个生物必须进行DC 25敏捷豁免检定。豁免失败的情况下，生物会受到87 ({@damage 25d6}) 力场伤害, 87 ({@damage 25d6}) 闪电伤害和 87 ({@damage 25d6}) 雷鸣伤害。 豁免成功的情况下，该生物受到一半的伤害。范围内的物件和建筑受到三倍伤害，机仆体内的生物会立即被杀死，并不会留下任何遗骸。
自毁不会立即破坏机仆。相反， {@dice 2d6} 日后， 它的部分—：左臂，左腿，右臂，右腿，上部躯干和下部躯干会在爆炸1000里内的随机地点从天空落下。如果这些部分被带到彼此的5尺内，它们会重新连接并再度组装成机仆。

entries.name: 破坏机仆
entries: 机仆能够被两种方式破坏。在其自毁之后，它散落的碎片能够在它古代奥尔曼人创造者的一座锻造神庙中被融化。如果机仆与卢姆的机器相撞，两件神器都会在规模范围和伤害是机仆自毁的三倍的爆炸中毁灭。

item.name: 军用鞍座
entries: 军用鞍座支撑着骑手，帮助你在战斗中活动的坐骑上保持坐姿。它让你在任何为了维持骑乘时所做的检定中获得优势。

item.name: Mind Flayer Skull
entries: While you have the skull in your possession, you are {@condition 隐形} to mind flayers, as is anything you are wearing or carrying.

item.name: 心灵之鞭
entries: 当在任何除了{@creature 夺心魔}以外的生物手中时，心灵之鞭的功能就如同一把普通的鞭子。若它在一名夺心魔的手中，则这把魔法武器将如同撕扯下生物血肉一般剥夺它的求生意志，对任何它所命中的目标造成额外的{@dice 2d4}心灵伤害。任何受到来自心灵之鞭的心灵伤害的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15的感知豁免，否则将在智力、感知、魅力豁免中承受劣势长达1分钟。该生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复进行这个豁免检定，豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。

item.name: 摄心魔镜
entries: 当这个4尺高的镜子被间接观察时，它的表面将显现出生物们模糊的影像。这面镜子重50磅，且它具有AC 11和10点生命值，且具有对钝击伤害的易伤。它将在生命值被归零时破裂并被摧毁。
若这面镜子被悬挂在一个垂直表面上且你距离它5尺之内，则你可以使用一个动作以说出它的命令语并启动它。它将维持被启动的状态直到你使用一个动作再次说出其命令语。
任何除了你以外，在这面镜子处于启动状态时在距离镜子30尺内看见自己镜面倒影的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15的魅力豁免，否则将连同任何它正穿戴或携带的事物一起被囚禁在镜子内十二个异次元牢房之一。若该生物知晓这面镜子的性质，则进行该豁免检定时将具有优势。构装体将自动通过这个豁免检定。
一间异次元牢房是一个充斥着厚重浓雾的无限区域，且其能见度被浓雾降低至10尺。被囚禁在镜中牢房的生物不会衰老，且它们不需要进食、饮水、或睡眠。一个倍囚禁在牢房内的生物可以使用允许其进行位面旅行的魔法从中逃脱。除此之外的状况，该生物将被限制在牢房内直到被释放。
若这面镜子囚禁住一个生物，但其十二个异次元牢房都已经被占据，则这面镜子将随机释放一个被囚禁的生物以容纳新的囚犯。一个被释放的生物将出现在处于镜子视线范围内的一处未被占据空间，但背对着镜子。若这面镜子被打碎，则所有它囚禁的生物将被释放，并出现在其附近的未被占据空间中。
当距离镜子5尺之内时，你可以使用一个动作以说出一个被囚禁在其中的生物的名子、或说出特定的牢房编号。被指名、或者被囚禁于指定编号牢房内的生物将以影像的形式出现在镜子的表面。接着，你和该生物将可以如常沟通。
以类似的方式，你可以使用一个动作以说出第二个命令语，并释放一个被囚禁于镜中的生物。被释放的生物将连同它的所有物一同出现在镜子附近的一处未被占据空间，且背对着镜子。

item.name: Mirror of the Past
entries: The holder of this platinum hand mirror can learn something about the history of a specific object or creature by taking an action to gaze into the mirror and think of the target. Instead of the holder's reflection, the mirror presents scenes from the target's past. Information conveyed is accurate, but it is random and cryptic, and presented in no particular order. Once it is activated, the mirror gives its information for 1 minute or less, then returns to normal. It can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mizzium Apparatus
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: Innovation is a dangerous pursuit, at least the way the mages of the Izzet League engage in it. As protection against the risk of an experiment going awry, they have developed a device to help channel and control their magic. This apparatus is a collection of leather straps, flexible tubing, glass cylinders, and plates, bracers, and fittings made from a magic-infused metal alloy called mizzium, all assembled into a harness. The item weighs 8 pounds.

While you are wearing the mizzium apparatus, you can use it as an arcane focus. In addition, you can attempt to cast a spell that you do not know or have prepared. The spell you choose must be on your class's spell list and of a level for which you have a spell slot, and you must provide the spell's components.

You expend a spell slot to cast the spell as normal, but before resolving it you must make an Intelligence ({@skill 奥秘}) check. The DC is 10 + twice the level of the spell slot you expend to cast the spell.

On a successful check, you cast the spell as normal, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability modifier. On a failed check, you cast a different spell from the one you intended. Randomly determine the spell you cast by rolling on the table for the level of the spell slot you expended. If the slot is 6th level or higher, roll on the table for 5th-level spells.
If you try to cast a cantrip you don't know, the DC for the Intelligence ({@skill 奥秘}) check is 10, and on a failed check, there is no effect.
