item.name: Mizzium Mortar
entries: This short tube, about 2 feet long and 6 inches in diameter, is made from mizzium, a magically enhanced metal alloy forged by the Izzet League. The end that's pointed toward a target is open, and a glowing ball of molten metal can be seen at the other end as long as the mortar has at least 1 charge remaining.
The mortar has 4 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Molten Spray
entries: You can expend 1 charge as an action to loose a 30-foot cone of molten mizzium. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@dice 5d4} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Mizzium Bombard
entries: You can expend 3 charges as an action to launch a hail of molten projectiles in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 5d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Breastplate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, you have resistance to fire damage. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Half Plate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, you have resistance to fire damage. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Plate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, you have resistance to fire damage. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks.

item.name: Monster Hunter's Pack
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item chest|phb}
a {@item crowbar|phb}
a {@item hammer|phb}
three wooden stakes
a {@item holy symbol|phb}
a {@item holy water (flask)|phb|flask of holy water}
a set of {@item manacles|phb}
a {@item steel mirror|phb}
a {@item oil (flask)|phb|flask of oil}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
3 {@item torch|phb|torches}

item.name: Moodmark Paint
entries: This thick, black paint is stored in a small jar, containing enough paint to apply moodmarks to one creature. The paint is dabbed on the face in spots or markings that often resemble the eyes of insects or spiders. Applying the paint in this way takes 1 minute.

For the next 8 hours, the marks change to reflect your mental state. A creature that can see you and makes a successful DC 10 Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check can discern whether you are happy, sad, angry, disgusted, surprised, or afraid, as well as the main source of that emotion. For example, you might communicate fear caused by a monster you just saw around the corner, grief at the loss of a friend, or happiness derived from pride in your performance in combat. A dark elf has advantage on this check.

item.name: 月刃
item.reqAttune: by an elf or half-elf of neutral good alignment
entries: 在所有精灵所制造的魔法武器中，月刃是最具价值，也最被谨慎守护的。在远古时期，几乎每个精灵贵族家庭都拥有这么一把长剑。几个世纪以来，其中一些月刃已经从这个世界上消失，它们的魔法也随着家族血脉的灭绝而消散。还有一些则伴随其持用者消失在履行崇高使命的过程中。因此，只有寥寥几把月刃被保存了下来。
月刃由亲代传给子女，代代相传。这把剑会选择它的持有者，并与这个人保持终生的联系。若持有者死亡，则其另一名继承人将可以继承这把剑。若是没有任何适合的继承人存在，则这把剑将进入休眠状态，其功能等同一把普通长剑，直到一个配得上它的灵魂发现它，并要求获得它的力量。
一把月刃同时只会服侍于一个主人。与它同调的过程需要在一名精灵摄政王的王宫、或在崇拜精灵诸神的神殿中举行一种特殊的仪式。
月刃不会服侍于任何它认为懦弱、乖僻、堕落、或不愿保护精灵一族的人。若这把剑拒绝了你，则你在接下来的24小时内所进行的属性检定、攻击检定、和豁免检定中都具有劣势。若这把剑接受了你，则你将与之同调，且一个新的符文将出现在它的刀刃上。你将维持与这把武器的同调直到你死亡，或是这把武器被摧毁。
月刃每服侍过一个主人，它的刀刃上就会浮现一个符文（通常会有共计{@dice 1d6+1}个符文）。第一个符文永远是让使用这把武器所进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上获得+1加值。在这之后的每一个符文都将赋予该月刃一个额外的特性。由DM自行选择每个特性或从月刃特性表中随机决定。

entries.caption: 月刃特性
rows: 将它在攻击检定和伤害骰上的加值提升1点，最高到+3。若这把月刃已经具有+3加值，则重新掷骰。
这把月刃获得一个随机决定的弱效特性（参见《地下城主指南》第143页的「特殊性质」）。
这把月刃获得灵巧属性。
这把月刃获得投掷属性（射程20/60尺）。
这把月刃具有如同一把{@item 防御者}的功能。
这把月刃会在骰出19或20的时候造成重击。
当你使用这把月刃以一次攻击命中目标时，该攻击将造成额外的{@dice 1d6}挥砍伤害。
当你使用这把月刃命中一个特殊类型的生物（像是龙、邪魔、或不死生物）时，目标将额外受到{@dice 1d6}点下列其中一种类型的伤害：强酸、冷冻、火焰、闪电、雷鸣。
你可以使用一个附赠动作以让这把月刃发出耀眼的闪光。每个距离你30尺内且可以看见你的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的体质豁免，否则将陷入{@condition 目盲}长达1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复进行这个豁免检定，豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。这个特性直到你在与这把武器同调时完成一次短休之前都不能再被使用。
这把月刃具有如同一枚{@item 法术保存戒指}的功能。
只要你尚未唤出精灵阴影，你就可以使用一个动作以唤来一个精灵阴影。这个精灵阴影将出现在距离你120尺内的一处未被占据空间。它使用{@creature 阴影}的游戏数据，但其阵营为绝对中立，免疫于驱散不死的效果，且无法创造新的阴影。这个生物处于你的控制下，由你决定它将如何行动和移动。它将持续存在直到它的生命值归零，或你以一个动作将它解消。
这把月刃具有如同一把{@item 斩首之剑}的功能。

entries.name: 智能
entries: 月刃是一把中立善良的智能魔法武器，它具有12点智力、10点感知、和12点魅力值。它具有听觉和120尺范围的黑暗视觉。
当它想要传达某个它所感觉到的事物时，这把武器会通过传递情绪、并通过持用者的手传送一阵刺痛般的感觉来进行交流。当持用者处于冥想或睡眠时，它也可以通过梦境或影像以进行更细致的交流。

entries.name: 个性
entries: 每一把月刃都寻求着精灵族的进步和理想。勇气、忠诚、美丽、音乐、和生命都是这些追求的一部份。
这把武器与其决心侍奉的家族血脉紧紧联系在一起。一旦它与一名和它有共同理想的持有者创建联系，它的忠诚就不会动摇。
若说月刃有什么缺点，那就是它的过度自信。一旦决定了自己的持有者，它就认定只有对方能够持用自己，即使其持有者并不符合精灵的理想也一样。

item.name: 月长石
entries: 淡蓝色光辉的白色透光宝石。

item.name: Moorbounder
entries: Beasts of burden are common throughout Xhorhas, and often horses and other riding animals are the best or only option. For those who require speed and have a little more coin to spend, the best option is often a moorbounder. However, moorbounders that haven't undergone proper training or established bonds of trust with their masters tend to attack and even eat their riders.
Moorbounders can cost anywhere from 300 to 500 gp each. They're often cheaper and more abundant in towns on the wastes than in cities like Rosohna.

item.name: 苔纹玛瑙
entries: 带灰或绿色藓状斑纹的粉红色或黄白色透光宝石。

item.name: Mummy Rot Antidote
entries: White dust swirls constantly within this pale gray potion. When you drink the potion, it cures you of mummy rot.

item.name: Muroosa Balm
entries: This paste made from the muroosa bush is known to help prevent sunburn, but it is also a fire retardant. After spending 1 minute applying a quarter pint of muroosa balm to your skin, you gain resistance against fire damage for 1 hour.
A dose of muroosa balm sufficient for treating sunburn costs 1 gp.

item.name: 神秘钥匙
entries: 一个问号被刻在这把钥匙的头部。这把钥匙有{@chance 5}的几率解开任何它所插入的锁。一旦它解锁了什么，这把钥匙将会随之消失。

item.name: 自然斗篷
entries: 这件斗篷能随着你周围的环境改变颜色和材质。当穿戴着斗篷时，你可以使用其作为你施展德鲁伊和游侠法术的法器。
当你处于一处有着轻度遮蔽的区域时，你可以用一个附赠动作进行 {@action 躲藏} 即便你能被直接观察到。

item.name: Navigation Orb
entries: A navigation orb is a hollow, 7-foot-diameter sphere of thin, polished mithral with a large skye (cloud) rune embossed on its outer surface. The orb levitates 10 feet above the ground and is keyed to a particular cloud castle, allowing you to control that castle's altitude and movement while the orb is inside the castle. If the orb is destroyed or removed from its castle, the castle's altitude and location remain fixed until the orb is returned or replaced.
As an action, you can cause one of the following effects to occur if you are touching the orb:

The castle moves at a speed of 1 mph in a straight line, in a direction of your choice, until the castle stops or is made to stop, or until another action is used to change its direction. If this movement brings the castle into contact with the ground, the castle lands gently.
The castle, if it is moving, comes to a gradual stop.
The castle makes a slow, 90-degree turn clockwise or counterclockwise (turning a northerly view into a westerly view, for example). The castle can turn while it is moving in a straight line.
Any creature touching the orb knows the altitude of the base of the castle above the ground or water below it.

item.name: 领航工具
entries: 这一套仪器被用于海上的领航作业。熟练于领航工具让你能够绘制航线图并跟随航线前进。此外，这些工具也能让你将你的熟练加值加到任何你在为了避免于海上迷航时所进行的属性检定中。
additionalEntries: 领航工具熟练项可以帮助你根据星象来导航。它还帮助你研究海图和地图，同时增强你的方向感。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 导航的工具包括六分仪、罗盘、卡尺、直尺、羊皮纸、墨水和鹅毛笔。

additionalEntries.name: 生存
entries: 领航工具的知识有助于避免迷路，也能让你推断最有可能出现道路和定居点的位置。

additionalEntries.name: 观测
entries: 通过仔细测量，你可以确定你在航海图上的位置以及当前的时间。

additionalEntries.caption: 领航工具
rows: 地图导航
海图定位

item.name: 适应项链
entries: 当穿戴这条项链时，你可以在任何环境中正常呼吸,且你在对抗有害气体或蒸气（像是{@spell 死云术}和{@spell 臭云术}效果、吸入式毒药、和某些龙的喷吐武器）时所进行的豁免检定中具有优势。

item.name: Necklace of electrum medallions with red and blue tournalines (Brazen Coalition)
火球项链
entries: 这条项链上挂有{@dice 1d6+3}颗珠子。你可以使用一个动作取下其中一颗珠子，并将它投掷到最多60尺远的地方。当它抵达其投射轨迹的终点时，这颗珠子将会如同3环的{@spell 火球术}法术（豁免DC 15）般爆炸。
你能够以一个动作同时投出复数颗珠子，或甚至将整串项链扔出。当你这么做时，每一颗额外的珠子都会使该{@spell 火球术}的环阶增加1环。

item.name: Necklace of jade and pink pearls (River Heralds)
念珠项链
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or paladin
entries: 这条项链上挂有{@dice 1d4+2}颗由海蓝宝石、黑珍珠、或黄玉制成的魔法珠子。它同时挂有许多非魔法珠子，由像是琥珀、血石、黄水晶、珊瑚、翡翠、珍珠、或石英等石质材料制成。若一颗魔法珠被从这条项链上摘除，则这颗珠子将失去它的魔法。
总共六种魔法珠的存在。DM将选择或随机决定这条项链上每一颗魔法珠的种类。一条项链上可以有着超过一颗相同种类的魔法珠。要使用魔法珠，你必须要先穿戴这条项链。每颗魔法珠内都含有一个法术，且你能够以一个附赠动作从它施放（若需要豁免，则使用你的法术豁免DC）。一旦一颗魔法珠内的法术被施放，则该魔法珠直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

rows: 祝福
{@spell 祝福术}
治愈
{@spell 治疗伤势}(2环) 或 {@spell lesser 次级复原术}
恩赐
{@spell 高等复原术}
打击
{@spell 烙印斩}
召唤
{@spell 异界盟友}
风行
{@spell 御风而行}

item.name: 串着粉红小珍珠的项链
item.ENG_name: Necklace string of small pink pearls

item.name: 黯蚀吸收刺青
entries: {#itemEntry 吸收刺青|TCE}

item.name: Needle of Mending
entries: This weapon is a magic dagger disguised as a sewing needle. When you hold it and use a bonus action to speak its command word, it transforms into a dagger or back into a needle.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with the dagger. While holding it, you can use an action to cast the {@spell 修复术} cantrip from it.

item.name: Nepenthe
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit a fiend or an undead with it, that creature takes an extra {@damage 2d10} radiant damage.

While you hold the drawn sword, it creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around you. You and all creatures friendly to you in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If you have 17 or more levels in the paladin class, the radius of the aura increases to 30 feet.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Nepenthe is a sentient, neutral evil weapon with an Intelligence of 10, a Wisdom of 8, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. It can read and understand Elvish. It can also speak Elvish, but only through the voice of its wielder, with whom the sword can communicate telepathically.

entries.name: Personality
entries: In its lifetime, the sword has beheaded thousands of criminals, not all of whom were guilty of the crimes for which they were convicted. The sword cannot distinguish the guilty from the innocent. With each beheading, it hungers for more justice and blood. The sword is corrupt and irredeemable.

item.name: Nether Scroll of Azumar
entries: Unlike most scrolls, a Nether Scroll of Azumar is not a consumable magic item. It takes 30 days of concentrated study—at least 8 hours per day—to attempt to understand this scroll. After completing this study, you must make a DC 25 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. If this check fails, you take {@damage 16d10} psychic damage, and you can attempt the check again after another 30 days of concentrated study.
When you succeed on the check, you gain the following benefits:

items: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22. Once you gain this benefit, you can't use this scroll to increase your Intelligence again.
You gain advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries: When you gain the scroll's benefits, a {@creature stone golem} magically appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of you and acts as your ally. If you die, the golem turns to dust.

item.name: Nib
entries: Copper coin about the size of a thumbnail (1 nib = 1 common copper coin)

item.name: Night Caller
entries: This whistle is carved from transparent crystal, and it resembles a tiny dragon curled up like a snail. The name Night Caller is etched on the whistle in Dwarvish runes. If a character succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill 奥秘} or {@skill 历史}) check, the character recalls lore that says the {@creature duergar} made several such whistles for various groups in an age past.

If you blow the whistle in darkness or under the night sky, it allows you to cast the {@spell 活化死尸} spell. The target can be affected through up to 10 feet of soft earth or similar material, and if it is, it takes 1 minute to claw its way to the surface to serve you. Once the whistle has animated an undead creature, it can't do so again until 7 days have passed.
Once every 24 hours, you can blow the whistle to reassert control over one or two creatures you animated with it.

item.name: Nightfall Pearl
entries: Used to summon night, this 6-inch-diameter, jet-black orb is cold to the touch. You can spend 10 minutes to activate it, causing the area within 10 miles of it at the moment of activation to become night even if it is daytime. This night lasts for 24 hours, until you cancel it as an action, or until your attunement to the pearl ends. Once used, the pearl can't be used again for 24 hours.

item.name: Nimblewright Detector
entries: To activate the nimblewright detector, a character must hold down its trigger. When the activated device comes within 500 feet of a nimblewright other than Nim, the umbrella begins to spin, whir, and click. The spinning, whirring, and clicking accelerates as the distance to the target lessens, reaching maximum velocity and volume when a nimblewright other than Nim is within 30 feet of the device.

item.name: 诺泽尔的惊奇颜料
entries: 这些颜料通常会被发现于{@dice 1d4}个罐子内，并被与一支画笔一起装在一个精美的木制盒子内（总重1磅）。这些颜料让你能够借由使用它们在二次元平面上绘画以创造出三次元的物体。当你专注于你所想物体的形象时，颜料将从笔刷流绘而出，并形成该物体。
每罐颜料都足以覆盖一个1,000平方尺的表面，并让你创造出最大10,000立方尺的无生命物体或地形特征，例如一扇门、一个坑洞、花朵、树木、隔间、房室、或是武器。绘制100平方尺的东西将会花费10分钟的时间。
当你完成一次绘画时，你所描绘的物体或地形特征将会变为真实、非魔法的物体。因此绘制在墙上的门将会创造出一扇真正的门，并可以被正常打开并被通过。绘制在地板上的坑洞将会创造出一个真实的坑洞，且其深度将被计入你创造物体的空间总体积中。
借由这些颜料所创造的事物无法具有超过25金币的价值。若你绘制一件有着在这支上价值的物体（例如钻石或金块），则尽管该物体看起来真实可信，但仔细观察便会揭露它是由石膏、骨头、或其他不值钱的材料所制成。
若你绘制出某种形式的能量（像是火焰或闪电），则其能量将会在你完成绘制的那一瞬间出现并立刻消散，且不会对任何事物造成伤害。

item.name: 誓仇弓
entries: 当你将箭搭在这把弓上时，它将以精灵语悄声低语：「速歼我敌。」当你使用这把武器以进行一次远程攻击，你可以作为命令语诵念：「速亡负我之人。」直到它死亡、或直到七日后的日出之前，你所攻击的目标将成为你的仇敌。你同时只能拥有一个这样的仇敌。当你的仇敌死亡，你可以在下次日出之后再选择一个新的仇敌。
当你使用这把武器对你的仇敌进行一次远程攻击检定，你在该检定中具有优势。此外，你的目标将无法得益于全掩护以外的掩护，且你不会因为长射程而承受劣势。若该攻击命中，你的仇敌将受到额外的{@dice 3d6}穿刺伤害。
只要你的仇敌仍然活着，你将在使用所有其他武器的攻击检定中具有劣势。

item.name: 黑曜石
entries: 黑色的不透光宝石。

item.name: Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to AC and resistance to poison damage while you wear this armor. In addition, you gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition 被擒} condition on yourself.

item.name: 镶有金饰和嵌物的黑曜石雕像
item.ENG_name: Obsidian statuette with gold fittings and inlay

item.name: Obviator's Lenses
entries: Also at rank 2, you gain the use of an uncommon magic item taking the form of a pair of spectacles, a spyglass, a monocle, or any other device with one or two lenses. When you look through the obviator's lenses, you use a bonus action to make them function as {@item eyes of minute seeing} or {@item eyes of the eagle}. Once you make this choice, it cannot be changed until the next dawn.

entries.name: Enhanced Lenses
entries: At rank 4, your obviator's lenses gain additional power and become a rare magic item. The lenses now function as both {@item eyes of the eagle} and {@item eyes of minute seeing}.

Additionally, you can focus the power of the lenses to gain accuracy in combat, gaining advantage on a weapon attack roll (no action required). If that attack hits, roll one additional weapon damage die. This property of the lenses can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Occultant Abacus
entries: Head office grants you the use of a unique item known as an occultant abacus (sometimes just referred to as an occultant), whose beads resemble tiny skulls.

entries.name: Read the Kill
entries: Also at rank 1, your occultant abacus not only tracks your franchise's kills, it helps you determine the impact of those kills on the franchise's fate. Over a period of 1 minute, you can study a creature killed by someone in your franchise within the last 24 hours, then grant the character who slew it a {@dice d10}. Once within the next hour, that character can add the {@dice d10} to an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. If it's not clear who administered the killing blow, you grant this benefit to a random creature involved in the fight. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

rows: Using a tiny bellows to pump one last breath into a corpse.
Reading the entrails with special reading-the-entrails glasses.
Burning a small piece of the body and looking for shapes in the smoke.
A cautious, reasoned, professional guesstimate.
Careful measurements. The distance between nostrils. The difference between the index finger and the middle finger. The elasticity of the ear lobe.
You take a long, careful look, and then decide based on which fellow franchisee has been nice to you lately.

entries.name: Eldritch Occultant
entries: Starting at rank 2, your occultant abacus becomes an uncommon magic item that can track lives both eliminated and saved. While holding your occultant abacus within 5 feet of a creature killed within the past 24 hours, you can cast the {@spell 卜筮} spell. The course of action you inquire about with the spell does not need to have any connection to the dead creature. This property of the occultant abacus can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Bring Out Your Dead
entries: Also at rank 2, you regain the use of your Read the Kill feature after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Bead of Instant Karma
entries: At rank 3, one of the beads on your occultant abacus channels the power of instant karma, turning the occultant abacus into a rare magic item. As a reaction, you can target one creature you can see that is about to attempt an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, either granting advantage or imposing disadvantage on the roll. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Bead of Diverted Karma
entries: At rank 4, one of the beads on your occultant abacus allows you to divert karma to where it's needed, turning the occultant abacus into a very rare magic item. While the bead is unused, you know automatically when any creature you can see is about to make an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw with disadvantage. When such a roll is made, you can use a reaction to grant a {@dice d10} to a different creature you can see. That creature can add the {@dice d10} to any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes within the next minute. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Correct the Balance
entries: As a rank 4 occultant, you learn that sometimes the death of a creature has unintended consequences. Within seven days of a creature's death, you can use your occultant abacus to divine ways to reverse or mitigate events resulting from that death. As an action, make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill 宗教}) check. On a success, you learn the relevant information based on the nature of the creature and its place in the world.
If you fail the check, this property of the occultant abacus can't be used again until the next dawn. If you succeed on the check, this property can't be used again until dawn seven days later.

item.name: 灯油(扁瓶装)
entries: 灯油通常以可以容纳1品脱的陶制扁瓶贩售。以一个动作，你可以将灯油泼在一个距离你5尺内的生物上、或投掷它最远20尺，让它在冲击中破碎。对一个目标生物或物体进行一次远程攻击，将灯油视作临时武器。若命中，目标被灯油覆盖。若目标在灯油干涸之前（约1分钟）受到任何火焰伤害，则目标将因燃烧的灯油而受到额外的5点火焰伤害。你也可以将扁瓶中的灯油倒在地面，只要该表面为平面，灯油将可以覆盖一块5尺平方的区域。若被点燃，则灯油将燃烧持续2轮，并对任何进入该区域或在该区域结束它回合的生物造成5点火焰伤害。一个生物每回合只会受到此伤害一次。

item.name: 乙太化之油
entries: 这瓶混浊的灰色油珠会在容器外成形并迅速蒸发。这瓶油膏可以涂抹一个体型为中型或更小的生物以及它所穿戴和携带的装备（体型每比中型大一级，就需要再额外使用一瓶）。涂抹乙太化之油需要花费10分钟的时间。被影响的生物将获得{@spell 跨入乙太界}法术的效果，持续1小时。

item.name: 锋锐之油
entries: 这瓶透明的胶状油中闪烁着微小、极细的银色碎片。这瓶油膏可以涂抹一把挥砍或穿刺武器、或最多5发挥砍或穿刺弹药。涂抹这瓶油膏需要花费1分钟的时间。持续1小时，被涂抹的物品将变为魔法物品，且在攻击检定和伤害骰中具有+3加值。

item.name: 滑溜之油
entries: 这瓶黏稠的黑色油膏在容器内显得厚实而沉重，但在倾倒时却会轻快的流动。这瓶油膏可以涂抹一个体型为中型或更小的生物以及它所穿戴和携带的装备（体型每比中型大一级，就需要再额外使用一瓶）。涂抹这瓶油膏需要花费10分钟的时间。被影响的生物将获得{@spell 行动自如术}法术的效果，持续8小时。
或者，这瓶油膏能够以一个动作被倒在地上，覆盖一片10尺平方的区块，并在该区域内拷贝{@spell 油腻术}法术的效果，持续8小时。

item.name: 腐精油
entries: 受害于这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 13的体质豁免，否则陷入{@condition 中毒}状态长达24小时。陷入{@condition 中毒}状态的生物同时也将陷入{@condition 昏迷}状态。该生物将在它受到伤害时清醒。

item.name: Olisuba Leaf
entries: These dried leaves of the Olisuba tree, when steeped to make a tea, can help a body recover from strenuous activity. If you drink a dose of Olisuba tea during a long rest, your {@condition 力竭} level is reduced by 2 instead of 1 at the end of that long rest.

item.name: 缟玛瑙
entries: 黑白相间、纯黑、或纯白的不透光宝石。

item.name: 蛋白石
entries: 带绿和金点的淡蓝色透光宝石。

item.name: Opal of the Ild Rune
entries: This triangular fire opal measures about three inches on each side and is half an inch thick. The ild (fire) rune shimmers within its core, causing it to be slightly warm to the touch. The opal has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Ignite
entries: As an action, you can ignite an object within 10 feet of you. The object must be flammable, and the fire starts in a circle no larger than 1 foot in diameter.

entries.name: Fires Friend
entries: You have resistance to cold damage.

entries.name: Fire Tamer
entries: As an action, you can extinguish any open flame within 10 feet of you. You choose how much fire to extinguish in that radius.

entries.name: Gift of Flame
entries: You can transfer the opal's magic to a nonmagical item—a weapon or a suit of armor—by tracing the ild rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the opal is destroyed, and the rune appears in red on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Weapon.
items.entry: The weapon is now an uncommon magic weapon. It deals an extra {@dice 1d6} fire damage to any target it hits.

items.name: Armor.
items.entry: The armor is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. You have resistance to cold damage while wearing the armor.

item.name: Opal of the Ild Rune
entries: This triangular fire opal measures about three inches on each side and is half an inch thick. The ild rune—the rune of fire—shimmers within its core. Grasping this object causes a split second of searing, fiery pain to pass through you. That pain quickly fades, giving way to a warming glow.

entries.name: Ignite (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the ild rune using ash onto a flammable object. That object immediately bursts into flame. While it burns, the fire extends 1 foot out from the rune you scribed.

entries.name: Fire Tamer (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you touch an open flame and scribe the ild rune within it with a hand motion. This causes the flame to immediately extinguish. For a large blaze, the fire is extinguished in a 10-foot radius around you. You can extend this distance by expending a spell slot when using the ild rune in this manner. The radius extends by 20 feet per level of the expended spell slot.

entries.name: Fire's Friend (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you have resistance to cold damage.

entries.name: Combustion (Complex Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune using ash onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The creature automatically takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage plus {@damage 1d10} fire damage per level of the expended spell slot.

entries.name: Flame Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using ash onto a melee or ranged weapon, or onto up to 20 pieces of ammunition. The weapon or ammunition gains a ghostly aura of yellow flame and deals fire damage instead of piercing, slashing, or bludgeoning damage.
In addition, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon or ammunition a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Flame Stoker (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, your fire attacks are deadlier. Whenever you roll fire damage from an attack or a spell you cast, you can reroll that damage and use the higher result.

item.name: 方向宝珠
entries: 当持握这个宝珠时，你可以使用一个动作以得知哪个方向是北边。这个特性只会在物质位面发挥效果。

item.name: Orb of Dragonkind
entries: Ages past, on the world of Krynn, elves and humans waged a terrible war against evil dragons. When the world seemed doomed, the wizards of the Towers of High Sorcery came together and worked their greatest magic, forging five Orbs of Dragonkind (or Dragon Orbs) to help them defeat the dragons. One orb was taken to each of the five towers, and there they were used to speed the war toward a victorious end. The wizards used the orbs to lure dragons to them, then destroyed the dragons with powerful magic.

As the Towers of High Sorcery fell in later ages, the orbs were destroyed or faded into legend, and only three are thought to survive. Their magic has been warped and twisted over the centuries, so although their primary purpose of calling dragons still functions, they also allow some measure of control over dragons.
Each orb contains the essence of an evil dragon, a presence that resents any attempt to coax magic from it. Those lacking in force of personality might find themselves enslaved to an orb.
An orb is an etched crystal globe about 10 inches in diameter. When used, it grows to about 20 inches in diameter, and mist swirls inside it.

While attuned to an orb, you can use an action to peer into the orb's depths and speak its command word. You must then make a DC 15 Charisma check. On a successful check, you control the orb for as long as you remain attuned to it. On a failed check, you become {@condition 魅惑} by the orb for as long as you remain attuned to it.

While you are {@condition 魅惑} by the orb, you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it, and the orb casts {@spell 暗示术} on you at will (save DC 18), urging you to work toward the evil ends it desires. The dragon essence within the orb might want many things: the annihilation of a particular people, freedom from the orb, to spread suffering in the world, to advance the worship of Takhisis ({@creature Tiamat|RoT|Tiamat's} name on Krynn), or something else the DM decides.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: An Orb of Dragonkind has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}

entries.name: Spells
entries: The orb has 7 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you control the orb, you can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 治疗伤势} (5th-level version, 3 charges), {@spell 昼明术} (1 charge), {@spell 防死护咒} (2 charges), or {@spell 探知} (3 charges). You can also use an action to cast the {@spell 侦测魔法} spell from the orb without using any charges.

entries.name: Call Dragons
entries: While you control the orb, you can use an action to cause the artifact to issue a telepathic call that extends in all directions for 40 miles. Evil dragons in range feel compelled to come to the orb as soon as possible by the most direct route. Dragon deities such as {@creature Tiamat|RoT} are unaffected by this call. Dragons drawn to the orb might be hostile toward you for compelling them against their will. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again for 1 hour.

entries.name: Destroying an Orb
entries: An Orb of Dragonkind appears fragile but is impervious to most damage, including the attacks and breath weapons of dragons. A {@spell 解离术} spell or one good hit from a +3 magic weapon is sufficient to destroy an orb, however.

item.name: Orb of Gonging
entries: This common wondrous item is a hollow, 5-inch-diameter orb that weighs 5 pounds. Its outer shell is composed of notched bronze rings, which can be turned so that the notches line up. Aligning the notches requires an action, and doing so causes the orb to gong loudly until the notches are no longer aligned. The sounds are spaced 6 seconds apart and can be heard out to a range of 600 feet.

item.name: Orb of the Stein Rune
entries: This orb of granite is about the size of an adult human's fist. The stein (stone) rune appears on it in the form of crystalline veins that run across the surface. The orb has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Indomitable Stand
entries: As an action, you can channel the orb's magic to hold your ground. For the next minute or until you move any distance, you have advantage on all checks and saving throws to resist effects that force you to move. In addition, any enemy that moves to a space within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be unable to move any farther this turn.

entries.name: Stone Soul
entries: You can't be {@condition 石化}.

entries.name: Earthen Step
entries: You can cast {@spell 融身入石} as a bonus action. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Stone
entries: You can transfer the orb's magic to a nonmagical item—a shield or a pair of boots—by tracing the stein rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the orb is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Shield.
items.entry: The shield is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While you wield it, you have resistance to all damage dealt by ranged weapon attacks.

items.name: Boots.
items.entry: The pair of boots is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. While you wear the boots, you have advantage on Strength saving throws, and you can use your reaction to avoid being knocked {@condition 伏地}.

item.name: Orb of the Stein Rune
entries: This spherical chunk of granite is about the size of a human fist. The stein rune—the rune of stone—appears on the orb as crystalline veins that play across its surface. When first grasped, the stone feels impossibly heavy, as if even a titan could not lift it. That feeling passes after a moment, allowing you to carry the stone with ease.

entries.name: Indomitable Stand (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the stein rune onto the ground at your feet. Until you move, you have advantage on all ability checks and saving throws to resist effects that would force you to move. In addition, any creature that moves within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have its movement immediately end.

entries.name: Stone Soul (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you cannot be {@condition 石化}.

entries.name: Stone's Secrets (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune onto a stone wall or floor. You learn the location and size of all creatures standing on or touching that surface within 30 feet of you, though only for the moment when the property is used.

entries.name: Crushing Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using dirt or crushed stone onto one weapon that deals bludgeoning damage. The weapon gains a ghostly brown aura, and bludgeoning damage dealt by the weapon ignores resistance and immunity. If you roll the maximum on the weapon's damage die or dice, the target of your attack is knocked {@condition 伏地} if it is a creature.
In addition, you can expend a spell slot to grant the weapon a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Earthen Step (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast meld into stone as a bonus action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

entries.name: Overwhelming Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune using dirt or crushed rock onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 12 + the level of the expended spell slot). On a failure, the creature takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage per level of the expended spell slot and is knocked {@condition 伏地}. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition 伏地}.

item.name: Orb of the Veil
entries: This onyx sphere bears deep, spiraling grooves and dangles from an iron chain. While the orb is on your person, you gain the following benefits:

items: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, as does your maximum for that score.
You gain {@sense 黑暗视觉} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense 黑暗视觉}, the orb increases its range by 60 feet.
You have advantage on Wisdom checks to find hidden doors and paths.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The orb is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the orb, keeping it on your person at all times. All nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you automatically extinguish, and fire damage dealt by you is halved.

item.name: 时间宝珠
entries: 当持握这个宝珠时，你可以使用一个动作以得知外面现在的时间是早晨、下午、傍晚、还是午夜。这个特性只会在物质位面发挥效果。

item.name: Orc Stone
entries: I saved the life of an orc, who gave me a stone with the symbol of the Many-Arrows tribe (a humanoid skull pierced by three arrows) carved into it. The stone is an uncommon magic item that requires attunement, and only I can attune to it.

As an action, I can use the stone to summon the spirit of an orc warrior, which appears within 30 feet of me. The spirit uses the {@creature orc war chief} stat block in the Monster Manual and disappears after 10 minutes or when reduced to 0 hit points. The spirit understands any language I speak and obeys my commands.
After the stone is used three times, it turns to dust. (See Appendix B of Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden)

item.name: 兽人肢解者
item.reqAttune: by a dwarf, fighter, or paladin of good alignment
entries: 兽人肢解者是矮人国王托希尔德·火舌(Torhild Flametongue)很久以前挥舞的一把威力巨大的斧头。乍一看，它是一件看起来不起眼的武器。它的头上用矮人符文雕刻着「兽人」（ORC）字样，但符文上有一个缺口或一条斜线，使得兽人这个词从字面上被分成了两半。
当你持握此魔法武器时，你获得以下好处：

items: 你在使用它所进行的攻击检定和伤害骰上具有+2加值。
当你用该武器对{@creature 兽人}所进行的攻击检定骰出20时，该兽人必须成功通过一次DC 17的体质豁免，否则生命值将直接归零。
当你未处于{@condition 无力}状态时，你不会被兽人突袭。此外，你能够意识到距离你120尺内，且不在全掩护后方的兽人的存在，尽管你不会因此知道他们的位置。
你和距离你30尺内的任何盟友在你未{@condition 无力}时都不会陷入{@condition 恐惧}。

entries.name: 智能
entries: 兽人肢解者是一把守序善良的智能魔法武器，它具有6点智力、15点感知、和10点魅力值。它具有听觉和120尺范围的黑暗视觉。它能够通过传递情绪的方式与其持用者进行交流，但在罕见的情况下，它会通过有限的心灵感应为持用者的心灵带来一段古代矮人诗歌的对句或小节。

entries.name: 个性
entries: 兽人肢解者冷酷、沉默、顽固。它只怀有一个小小的愿望，就是在战斗中对付兽人，并服务于勇敢且正义的持用者。它蔑视懦夫，以及任何形式的口是心非、欺骗或不忠。该武器的目的是保护矮人，并作为矮人决心的象征。它憎恨所有的矮人仇敌——巨人、地精、以及其中最重要的，兽人，并会在战斗中无声地敦促它的主人与这些生物相遇。

item.name: Orcus Figurine
entries: Carved from an ogre's {@condition 石化} heart, the gray figurine depicts the Demon Prince of Undeath in ghastly detail, clutching his skull-topped wand in one hand and three severed heads by the hair in the other. The figurine smells like decaying flesh, and this scent is detectable out to a range of 5 feet.

The figurine is a Tiny object with AC 17, 3 hit points, and immunity to all types of damage except radiant damage. A {@spell detect evil and good} spell or similar magic reveals that the figurine has been desecrated. As long as it has at least 1 hit point, the figurine has the following magical properties:

items: Undead within 30 feet of the figurine can't be turned.
Dead creatures within 30 feet of the figurine can't be brought back to life.

A creature that holds the figurine while praying to Orcus for at least 1 hour has a 10 percent chance of summoning a smoky avatar of the demon lord. Once this avatar is summoned, it can't be summoned again for 30 days. Orcus's avatar has the statistics of a {@creature wraith} except that it's chaotic evil. It attacks all non-undead creatures it encounters, and it disappears after 1 hour or when reduced to 0 hit points.

item.name: Order of the Silver Dragon +2 Shield
entries: While holding this shield, you have a +2 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

The shield is emblazoned with a stylized silver dragon that is the emblem of the Order of the Silver Dragon (see {@adventure {@i Curse of Strahd}, chapter 7|CoS|7|The Order of the Silver Dragon}). The shield whispers warnings to its bearer, granting a +2 bonus to initiative if the bearer isn't incapacitated.
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

item.name: Orrery of the Wanderer
entries: This delicate and exquisitely crafted clockwork orrery features multiple geared components whose sweeping hands and dials represent the complex interplay of planar and magical realms. Standing two feet high, the orrery housing is a wondrous device imbued with magic of its own, but the power of its six clockwork components makes the artifact even more potent.

The Orrery of the Wanderer was created by a renowned clockwork mage known only as Lottie. She crafted the relic as a means of tapping into the power of the planes, and to channel the divination and foretelling powers of the stars. But Lottie soon realized that her creation was far more powerful than she had intended. As it tapped into planar magic, the orrery began to manifest the darkness and malevolence inherent to some of the planes. Eventually, it would impress upon its owner a desire to open portals into the most cursed and dangerous worlds, including the Far Realm.

To prevent the orrery from ever being so used, Lottie scattered the components that powered it, secreting them across the world. But the orrery's instinct for survival is strong, and its components have a way of inexorably coming together over decades or centuries, found by treasure hunters, stolen by monsters, found and stolen again—and moving closer to each other all the time.
Random Properties. The orrery has the following randomly determined properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental properties}

entries: The random properties of the orrery might function only when all its components are installed, or might function sporadically if any components are missing.

entries.name: The Sum of Its Parts
entries: Each of the six components that powers the Orrery of the Wanderer is a powerful magic relic in its own right:

items: The {@item chronolometer|AI}
The {@item dimensional loop|AI}
The {@item far gear|AI}
The {@item rotor of return|AI}
The {@item timepiece of travel|AI}
The {@item wheel of stars|AI}

entries: Creatures can attune to the orrery's components individually. If attuned to an individual component, a creature must hold the component to make use of its features. A creature can also attune to the orrery and all the components installed in it. Attuning to an installed component doesn't count against the number of magic items you can normally attune to.
While a component is not installed in the orrery, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

entries.name: Future Echoes
entries: With or without its components, the orrery lets you catch momentary glimpses of the future that warn you of danger. As long as the orrery is within 30 feet of you, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Into the Void
entries: With or without its components, the attuned orrery infuses your spirit with the tumultuous energy of the planes. Over time, your alignment changes to chaotic neutral, and you are compelled to engage with and explore the most dangerous planar realms.

entries.name: Master of Travel
entries: While all six components of the Orrery of the Wanderer are installed, the artifact has 7 charges. While touching the orrery, you can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 17): {@spell 异界探知} (3 charges), {@spell 创造半位面} (6 charges), {@spell 异界之门} (7 charges), {@spell 异界传送} (5 charges), or {@spell 传送法阵} (3 charges). The orrery regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Orzhov Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Orzhov, allows you to cast {@spell 命令术}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Orzhov's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Orzhov Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Orzhov guild
entries: This keyrune is carved from white marble with veins of black. The end is shaped like a thrull's head, with a gold faceplate affixed. On command, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature winged thrull|GGR} for up to 2 hours. If you don't come from an Orzhov oligarch family, it serves you grudgingly, clownishly aping your movements and mannerisms while carrying out your orders.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature winged thrull|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 闪避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 外界精粹碎晶
entries: 这块闪烁着的水晶蕴含着一处外层位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。
骰一个 {@dice d4} 并根据外界精粹碎晶晶表格来决定碎晶的精粹类型和属性。当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以应用该属性。

entries.caption: 外界精粹碎晶
rows: 守序
{@item 外界精粹碎晶（守序）|TCE}
混乱
{@item 外界精粹碎晶（混乱）|TCE}
善良
{@item 外界精粹碎晶（善良）|TCE}

{@item 外界精粹碎晶（邪恶）|TCE}

item.name: 外界精粹碎晶（混乱）
entries: 这块闪烁着的水晶蕴含着一处外层位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。
当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以应用该属性。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 选择一个受到此法术伤害的生物。目标在你的下个回合开始前进行的攻击检定、属性检定具有劣势。

item.name: 外界精粹碎晶（邪恶）
entries: 这块闪烁着的水晶蕴含着一处外层位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。
当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以应用该属性。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 选择一个受到此法术伤害的生物。目标受到额外 {@damage 3d6} 黯蚀伤害。

item.name: 外界精粹碎晶（善良）
entries: 这块闪烁着的水晶蕴含着一处外层位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。
当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以应用该属性。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 你或一个你选择的一个距离你30尺内且你可见的生物获得 {@dice 3d6} 临时生命值。

item.name: 外界精粹碎晶（守序）
entries: 这块闪烁着的水晶蕴含着一处外层位面的精粹。作为一个动作，你可以将碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一块珠宝）或摘下。当同调结束时它会掉落下来。当你持握或穿戴碎晶时，你可以将其作为法器使用。
当你持握或穿戴碎晶，并在一道法术上应用一种超魔法选项时，你可以应用该属性。

entries.name: 属性
entries: 你可以终止正影响你或距离你30尺内且你可见的一个生物的下列状态之一：{@condition 魅惑}, {@condition 目盲}, {@condition 耳聋}, {@condition 恐惧}, {@condition 中毒}, 或 {@condition 震慑}。

item.name: Oversized Longbow
entries: This unique weapon can be used only by a Medium or larger creature that has a Strength of 18 or higher. The bow shoots oversized arrows that deal piercing damage equal to 2d6 + the wielder's Strength modifier.

item.name: 画家工具
additionalEntries: 画家工具熟练项代表了你的素描和绘画能力。你也会对艺术史有所了解，这有助于你鉴赏艺术作品。

additionalEntries.name: 组件
entries: 画家工具包括画架、画布、颜料、画笔、炭笔，还有调色板。

additionalEntries.name: 奥秘、历史、宗教
entries: 你的专业知识有助于你了解任何与艺术有关的知识，比如一幅画作的魔法属性或在地下城中发现的奇怪壁画的来历。

additionalEntries.name: 调查、察觉
entries: 当你检查一幅画作或类似的图画类艺术作品时，你的绘画功底可以给你额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 作画
entries: 作为短休或长休的一部分，你可以创作一件简单的艺术品。虽然你的画作可能不够精细，但你可以展现出一副图像或场景，或者快速还原出你所见过的一幅艺术品。

additionalEntries.caption: 画家工具
rows: 画一幅精确的肖像画
创作带有隐藏信息的画作

item.name: Pair of engraved bone dice (Brazen Coalition)
苍白酊剂
entries: 受害于这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 16的体质豁免，否则受到3 ({@dice 1d6})毒素伤害且陷入{@condition 中毒}状态。陷入{@condition 中毒}状态的生物每经过24小时都必须再重复进行这个豁免检定，若豁免失败则受到3 ({@dice 1d6})毒素伤害。直到此毒药结束前，此毒素所造成的伤害无法被任何手段治疗。在豁免成功七次后，此毒药的效果结束，且该生物可以被如常治疗。

item.name: 纸(一张)
entries: 纸(一张)

item.name: Paper Bird
entries: After you write a message of fifty words or fewer on this magic sheet of parchment and speak a creature's name, the parchment magically folds into a Tiny paper bird and flies to the recipient whose name you uttered. The recipient must be on the same plane of existence as you, otherwise the bird turns into ash as it takes flight.

The bird is an object that has 1 hit point, an Armor Class of 13, a flying speed of 60 feet, a Dexterity of 16 (+3), and a score of 1 (−5) in all other abilities, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage.

It travels to within 5 feet of its intended recipient by the most direct route, whereupon it turns into a nonmagical and inanimate sheet of parchment that can be unfolded only by the intended recipient. If the bird's hit points or speed is reduced to 0 or if it is otherwise immobilized, it turns into ash.
Paper birds usually come in small, flat boxes containing {@dice 1d6 + 3} sheets of the parchment.

item.name: 羊皮纸(一张)
entries: 羊皮纸(一张)

item.name: Pariah's Shield
entries: Soldiers of the Boros Legion consider it an honor to bear this shield, even knowing that it might be the last honor they receive. The front of the shield is sculpted to depict a grieving human face.
You gain a +1 bonus to AC for every two allies within 5 feet of you (up to a maximum of +3) while you wield this shield. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.
When a creature you can see within 5 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage, instead of the creature taking it. When you do so, the damage type changes to force.

item.name: Pathfinder's Greataxe
entries: When you wield this +1 greataxe, you always know the way to the nearest passage leading from underground toward the surface, as well as the approximate depth the axe is underground.

item.name: 珍珠
entries: 带光泽的白色、黄色、或粉红色不透光宝石。

item.name: 法力再生珍珠
entries: 当你持有这颗珍珠时，你可以使用一个动作以说出它的命令语，并恢复一个已消耗的法术位。若该被消耗法术位的环阶为4环或更高，其新法术位的环阶将变为3环。一旦你使用这颗珍珠，则它直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: Pearl of Undead Detection
entries: This black pearl glows faintly when undead are within 120 feet of it.

item.name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
entries: This blue pennant is crafted from silk and is five feet long and whips about as if buffeted by a wind. The vind (wind) rune appears on its surface, looking almost like a cloud. The pennant has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Wind Step
entries: As an action, you fly up to 20 feet. If you don't land at the end of this flight, you fall unless you have another means of staying aloft.

entries.name: Comforting Wind
entries: You can't suffocate.

entries.name: Winds Grasp
entries: As a reaction when you fall, you can cause yourself to take no damage from the fall. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Wind Walker
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast {@spell 浮空术} as a bonus action. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Wind
entries: You can transfer the pennant's magic to a nonmagical item—a suit of armor, a pair of boots, or a cloak—by tracing the vind rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the pennant is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Armor.
items.entry: The armor is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. You gain a bonus to speed of 5 feet while you wear the armor, and if it normally imposes disadvantage on {@skill 隐匿} checks, it no longer does so.

items.name: Boots/Cloak.
items.entry: The pair of boots or cloak is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing the item, you can convert up to 20 feet of your movement on each of your turns into flight. If you don't land at the end of this flight, you fall unless you have another means of staying aloft. You can also cast {@spell 羽落术} once from the item, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

item.name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
entries: This five-foot-long blue pennant is crafted from silk and whips about as if buffeted by a strong breeze. The vind rune—the rune of wind—flickers across its surface like a shimmering cloud. Grasping the pennant causes you to feel a powerful gust of wind wash over you, tearing at your clothes and gear. Anyone watching you sees nothing out of the ordinary, and the sensation passes after a moment.

entries.name: Comforting Wind (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you cannot suffocate or drown, and you gain advantage on saving throws against poisonous gases, inhaled poisons, and similar effects.

entries.name: Wind Step (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the vind rune in the air around you and immediately fly 20 feet. If you do not land at the end of this flight, you fall.

entries.name: Wind's Grasp (Simple Property)
entries: As a reaction when you fall, you can scribe this rune in the air around you to take no damage from the fall.

entries.name: Howling Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune in the air above one ranged weapon. The weapon gains a ghostly blue aura and has its normal and maximum range doubled. The weapon's attacks do not suffer disadvantage due to range.
In addition, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Shrieking Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune in the air between you and a creature you can see while you expend a spell slot. The creature must make a Strength saving throw (DC 12 + the spell slot's level). On a failure, it takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage per level of the expended spell slot, and is pushed in a straight line directly away from you for 10 feet per level of the expended spell slot. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half as much damage and is not pushed away from you.

entries.name: Wind Walker (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast levitate as a bonus action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

item.name: Peregrine Mask
entries: While wearing this winged helm, you have a flying speed of 60 feet. In addition, you have advantage on initiative rolls.

item.name: 迷醉香水
entries: 这个小瓶内装有魔法香水，分量足够一次使用。你可以使用一个动作将这瓶香水用在自己身上，且它的效果将持续1小时。在这段持续期间内，你在所有直接对一名挑战等级为1或更低的类人生物所进行的魅力检定中具有优势。这些受到香水效果影响的生物不会意识到他们被魔法所影响。

item.name: 健康护身符
entries: 当穿戴这个坠饰时，你将免疫于感染任何疾病。若你已经染上一种疾病，则该疾病的效果将在你穿戴这个坠饰时被压抑。

item.name: 辟毒护身符
entries: 这条精致的银链上挂着一个切工精美的黑色宝石坠饰。当你穿戴它时，毒素将不会对你造成任何影响。你免疫于{@condition 中毒}状态且免疫于毒素伤害。

item.name: 愈合护身符
entries: 当你穿戴这个坠饰时，每当你在你的回合开始时处于濒死状态，你的伤势将会稳定。此外，每当你骰生命骰以回复生命值时，将它所回复的生命值变为二倍。

item.name: 橄榄石
entries: 贵橄榄绿色的透光宝石。

item.name: Petrified Grung Egg
entries: While this egg is on your person, you can use an action to speak its command word and regain one expended spell slot. If the expended slot was of 4th level or higher, the new slot is 3rd level. Once you have used the egg, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
Additionally, while you are attuned to the egg, you gain resistance to poison damage.
The egg turns to dust and is destroyed if it leaves the Tomb of the Nine Gods.

item.name: Pewter mug with green spinels (Brazen Coalition)
迷情媚药
entries: 在你饮用这瓶药水之后的10分钟内，你将被你第一眼看见的生物{@condition 魅惑}长达1小时。若该生物是你原本会喜欢的物种和性别，则你将在{@condition 魅惑}期间视它为你的真爱。这瓶药水冒泡的玫瑰色液体包含着一颗容易被忽略的心形气泡。

item.name: Piercer
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

A character attuned to the sword regains the maximum possible number of hit points from expended Hit Dice. However, the attuned character must eat twice as much food each day (a minimum of 2 pounds) to avoid {@condition 力竭} (see "The Environment" in chapter 8 of the Player's Handbook.)

item.name: Pipe of Remembrance
entries: This long, delicate wooden pipe features a bowl made from smooth river stone. When the pipe is lit, smoke exhaled from it does not dissipate, instead lingering around the bearer. After 10 minutes, the smoke forms moving shapes that reenact the bearer's most impressive and heroic achievements for 5 minutes. When this realistic performance is complete, the smoke dissipates. The pipe can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

item.name: 怪物烟斗
entries: 当使用这个烟斗抽烟时，你可以使用一个动作以吐出一团烟雾，并使其呈现一个单一生物的外型，像是一条龙、一个呋噜、或一只沼喉怪。这个外型的大小必须足以容纳于1尺边长立方体内，并会在数秒之后失去其外型，消散成一团寻常烟雾。

item.name: 颤栗之笛
entries: 你必须熟练于管乐器才能使用颤栗之笛。颤栗之笛含有3发充能。你可以使用一个动作以演奏它们并消耗1发充能以创造出一阵怪异、含有魔法的旋律。每个距离你30尺内且可以听见你演奏的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15的感知豁免，否则将因你而陷入{@condition 恐惧}长达1分钟。若你希望，所有范围内对你没有敌意的生物将自动成功通过这个豁免检定。一个豁免失败的生物可以在它的每个回合节淑是重复进行这个豁免检定，豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。一个成功通过这个豁免检定的生物将在接下来24小时内免疫于颤栗之笛的效果。颤栗之笛会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d3}发已消耗的充能。

item.name: 唤鼠排笛
entries: 你必须熟练于管乐器才能使用唤鼠排笛。当你同调于唤鼠排笛时，寻常{@creature 老鼠}和{@creature 巨鼠}对你的态度为冷漠，且除非你威胁或伤害牠们，否则牠们将不会主动攻击你。

唤鼠排笛含有3发充能。若你以一个动作演奏唤鼠排笛，则你可以使用一个附赠动作消耗1到3发充能，只要距离你半里内的范围内有足够的鼠群可以被这样召唤（由DM决定），则你每消耗1发充能就可以唤来一群{@creature 老鼠群|mm}。若该处没有足够的老鼠以形成集群，则该发充能将被浪费。被召唤的老鼠群将以最短可能路径向着音乐的方向移动，但并不处于你的控制下。唤鼠排笛会在每天日出时恢复{@dice 1d3}发已消耗的充能。

在你演奏唤鼠排笛的期间，每当一群不处于其他生物控制下的{@creature 老鼠群|mm}来到距离你30尺的范围内时，你就可以进行一次对抗该集群感知检定的魅力检定。若你在该次对抗中落败，则该集群将如常行动，且在接下来24小时内都不会被唤鼠排笛给影响。若你在该次对抗中胜出，则该集群将被唤鼠排笛的音乐影响，且只要你在每轮以一个动作持续演奏唤鼠排笛，牠们便会对你和你的同伴友善。一群对你友善的集群将服从你的命令。若你不对它们交代任何指令，则它们将在面对敌对生物时自我防卫，除此之外不采取其他动作。若一群对你友善的集群在开始它的回合时无法听见唤鼠排笛的音乐，则你对这个集群的控制结束，且该集群将如常行动，且在接下来24小时内都不会再被唤鼠排笛给影响。

item.name: 水罐
entries: 一个水罐可以容纳1加仑的液体。

item.name: Piwafwi (Cloak of Elvenkind)
entries: This dark spider-silk cloak is made by {@creature drow}. It is a {@item cloak of elvenkind}. It loses its magic if exposed to sunlight for 1 hour without interruption.

While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) checks made to see you have disadvantage. and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

item.name: Piwafwi of Fire Resistance
entries: This dark spider-silk cloak is made by {@creature drow}. It is a {@item cloak of elvenkind}. It also grants resistance to fire damage while you wear it. It loses its magic if exposed to sunlight for 1 hour without interruption.

While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) checks made to see you have disadvantage. and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

item.name: Pixie Dust
entries: A pinch of this dust can substitute for the material components of any enchantment spell of 3rd level or lower. If a pinch of pixie dust is sprinkled on a creature, roll percentile dice and consult the Pixie Dust table to determine the effect.

entries.caption: Pixie Dust
rows: The creature sprinkled with dust gains a flying speed of 60 feet for 10 minutes.

The creature sprinkled with dust must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 1 minute. The creature awakens if it takes damage or if it is shaken or slapped as an action.
The creature sprinkled with dust must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by a {@spell 困惑术} spell.

The creature sprinkled with dust becomes {@condition 隐形} for 1 hour. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is {@condition 隐形} as long as it is on the creature's person. The effect on the creature ends if it attacks, deals any damage, or casts a spell.

item.name: 异界行访录
entries: 这本书的书页由邪魔的皮革装订，封面上绘制着多元宇宙巨轮的图样。 这本书在被找到时，包含了以下法术： {@spell 放逐术}, {@spell 寻获魔宠}, {@spell 异界之门}, {@spell 防护法阵}, {@spell 异界誓缚}, 和 {@spell 元素召唤术|TCE}。你可以将其作为法术书。
当你持握这本书时，你可以将其作为你法师法术的法器。
书具有3发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 发已消耗的充能。你持握它时，可以通过以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花费1分钟时间研究这本书，你可以消耗1发充能来将你的一道已准备法术替换为书中的另一道法术。新法术必须是咒法学派的法术。
当你施展一道召唤或创造一个生物的咒法系法术时，你可以消耗1发充能使该生物在攻击检定时具有优势，持续1分钟。

item.name: 乙太化板甲
entries: 当你穿着此护甲时，你能够以一个动作说出它的命令语，并获得{@spell 跨入乙太界}法术的效果，持续长达10分钟或直到你移除这件护甲或再次以一个动作说出命令语。此护甲的这个功能直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 铂金币(pp)
entries: 一般的货币会有数个不同的币值单位在市面上流通，且其面额会根据铸造它们所使用的金属的相对价值来决定。三种最常见的货币是金币(gp)、银币(sp)、和铜币(cp)。
一枚金币，可以让一个角色购买一个腰包、50尺的优质绳索、或一头山羊。一名纯熟（但并不杰出）的工匠每天可以赚取一枚金币。尽管金币本身并不常被直接使用，但黄金仍然是衡量财富的标准单位。当商人们商谈着的交易涉及价值千百金币的货物或服务，其交易本身通常不会涉及货币的交换。更确切的说，金币只是衡量价值的标准，而实际交易中使用的则是金条、信用状、或其他值钱的商品。
一枚金币值十枚银币，银币是普通人之间最盛行的货币。一枚银币可以雇佣一名劳动者工作一整天、购买一扁瓶的灯油、或是在简陋旅馆的一夜休眠。
一枚银币值十枚铜币，铜币则常见于劳动者和乞丐之间。一枚铜币能买一根蜡烛、一支火炬、或是一支粉笔。
除此之外，使用其他贵重金属铸造的罕见货币有时也会出现在宝藏中。珀金币(ep)和铂金币(pp)源自于衰落帝国和失落的王国，且当它们被用于交易时也偶尔会引起猜忌与怀疑。一枚珀金币价值五枚银币，而一枚铂金币则价值十枚金币。
一枚标准货币的重量约为三分之一盎司，所以五十枚货币重约一磅。

item.name: 镶有一颗蓝宝石的铂金手镯
